1122233719007202--.name:
$MyPCName$, I'm sorry to bother you all of the sudden.
<font color="#00aaef"><font size="20">(Note: The following content takes place after the events of the epic quest "$quest:20002263$.")</font></font>

1122233719007203--.name: I'd ask you how you are, but I know that no one's been quite themselves since the attack on Tria.

1122233719007204--.name: Farmlands were trampled by the enemy, industrial facilities are on the verge of shutting down... Even the merchants have ceased their trade for fear of their safety. As a result, we're facing food and supply shortages throughout the city.

1122233719007205--.name: So I was hoping you might assist me in a matter that might help address the situation.

1122233719007206--.name: I'll explain further in person. I'll be waiting for you at $map:02000153$.

1122233719007210--.name: Thank you for joining us on short notice.

1122233719007211--.name: Well, now that our key asset is here, shall we begin?

1122233719007212--.name: We need to go over the plan.

1122233719007213--.name: No time better than the present.

1122233719007214--.name: Ever since the assault on Tria, Dark Wind, the Green Hoods, the Order of the Eclipse, and the Royal Guard have held countless meetings on addressing the crisis at hand.

1122233719007215--.name: We've discussed the topic of how best to defend Maple World and aid in its recovery, but ultimately...

1122233719007216--.name: There's no one magic solution. So we decided that everyone should focus on what they do best. The Royal Guard will see to the well-being and safety of the people, the Green Hoods will gather and redistribute supplies...

1122233719007218--.name: And the Order of the Eclipse... Err, Allon, what is it exactly that they do again?

1122233719007219--.name: They keep an eye on the gates to the Shadow World, and root out any traces of the darkness in our own—though in the end these efforts were for naught.

1122233719007220--.name: Well... it's not like Dark Winds' efforts came to much either, with Katvan at the helm. Or so we thought.

1122233719007221--.name: There was only one good thing to come from his treachery...

1122233719007222--.name: Since his disappearance, Dark Wind has collected every scrap of information they can about the traitor Katvan, but we still don't know how or when he might return.

1122233719007223--.name: But our investigation did uncover Katvan's secret data server hidden within Dark Wind HQ.

1122233719007224--.name: And what we found on that server was more than just data...

1122233719007225--.name: We also found the blueprints for Project Aegis: the Sky Fortress. It's a next-generation airborne aircraft carrier.

1122233719007226--.name: It's a large vessel, intended to be used as Dark Wind's mobile command center.

1122233719007227--.name: The story goes that Katvan was concerned with HQ's safety after the Black Mushroom incident, and saw the need for a mobile command center that could continue operating even if Kerning City was plunged into chaos.

1122233719007228--.name: Of course, that was all just a pretext for his true motives. Nevertheless, he kept both the empress and Prime Minister Vidrem in the dark about his plan.

1122233719007229--.name: It's obvious for whom Katvan was really constructing Sky Fortress.

1122233719007230--.name: So... Are you going to destroy the carrier?

1122233719007234--.name: We would never destroy such a valuable asset!

1122233719007235--.name: Dark Wind has already taken the liberty of securing both the carrier and its construction facility.

1122233719007236--.name: It wasn't much of a challenge. With Katvan gone, it seems the engineers abandoned the facility.

1122233719007237--.name: We have on our hands a unique opportunity. Maple World has always been under siege, but so rarely do we stumble upon tools we can use to strike back.

1122233719007238--.name: That's why Dark Wind has retrofitted the carrier as the new base of operations for the alliance.

1122233719007240--.name: The Maple Alliance, composed of the allied factions of Dark Wind, the Order of the Eclipse, the Green Hoods, and the Royal Guard.

1122233719007241--.name: Sky Fortress will be our flagship.

1122233719007242--.name: The Alliance will be able to travel quickly and safely wherever its aid is needed. We will be able to deliver supplies with precision and without harassment from monsters or our enemies.

1122233719007243--.name: This fortress will become the shield of the skies—Maple World's last line of defense.

1122233719007244--.name: This is the plan we called you here to discuss: the operation of Sky Fortress.

1122233719007245--.name: The ship has nearly everything it needs. Firepower, a command center, and a plan of action. But it's missing the most important component.

1122233719007247--.name: Haha. The most important component is...

1122233719007250--.name: Empress Ereve made only one request regarding our plan for the Sky Fortress.

1122233719007251--.name: You are to serve as the heart of Sky Fortress.

1122233719007252--.name: It took me a while to come around to the empress's line of thinking myself, but now I get it.

1122233719007253--.name: I, Blackeye, Oska, and Frey may possess outstanding skills, and our forces may be well-trained, however...

1122233719007254--.name: Our methods are very different, and this alliance is very young. It will not be easy to coordinate our efforts.

1122233719007255--.name: However, you have worked alongside each of our organizations. You understand how we operate.

1122233719007256--.name: Therefore, there is no one better suited to serve as an intermediary between us! The empress was wise enough to see the potential of your contributions to our new enterprise.

1122233719007258--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm sorry to put you on the spot like this, but we need to start setting plans into motion.

1122233719007259--.name: Will you answer the call, and serve as the vanguard of the Maple Alliance?

1122233719007260--.name: I will give you some time to think it over. Let me know once you have decided.

1122233719007261--.name: I will give you some time to think it over. Let me know once you have decided.

1122233719007262--.name: Hm, you've made up your mind already?

1122233719007263--.name: I suppose the empress wouldn't have recommended you, if you hadn't already proven yourself a determined defender of our world.

1122233719007264--.name: Very well, then. $MyPCName$, from this day forward, I welcome you to the vanguard of the Maple Alliance.

1122233719007265--.name: Now is your chance to prove yourself before all of Maple World. Make us proud.

1122233719007268--.name: To the Maple Alliance's new base of operations, the Sky Fortress, of course.

1122233719007269--.name: Preparations for launch are nearly complete, hence the urgency of this meeting.

1122233719007270--.name: Couldn't you have given me a little heads up?

1122233719007271--.name: Haha, I'm sorry but this whole operation is top secret.

1122233719007272--.name: Now, enough whinging! The hangar is quite a long ways from here.

1122233719007274--.name: Haha... I'll let you see for yourself. Sometimes the answer is right beneath your feet.

1122233719007275--.name: Haha... I'll let you see for yourself. Sometimes the answer is right beneath your feet.

1122233719007276--.name: Leave it to Dark Wind to transform Revoldic Dam into a secret weapons facility.

1122233719007277--.name: To think that Katvan managed to build all this right under our noses, a stone's throw from Tria.

1122233719007278--.name: It's ours now, so there's no point in worrying.

1122233719007279--.name: It seems we have some new faces. I suppose introductions are in order.

1122233719007280--.name: I'm Veliche Martini of Tria's Royal Navy.

1122233719007281--.name: Hm... Veliche? You've been selected to captain the Sky Fortress?

1122233719007282--.name: Do you have a problem with that?

1122233719007283--.name: Hmph. You're just as brusque as your father.

1122233719007284--.name: Captain Veliche, it's a pleasure. Our associate here was personally recommended by the empress.

1122233719007286--.name: There will be time for pleasantries later. Right now, we've got to finish preparations for takeoff.

1122233719007287--.name: Our tactical officer should be waiting at the front of the airship. She'll give you a quick rundown of things, and then you can be on your way.

1122233719007288--.name: The operation will be carried out by your proteges.

1122233719007289--.name: ...Hmph, she really is her father's daughter.

1122233719007290--.name: We've got work to do. Hurry to our tactical officer for a mission briefing. Dismissed.

1122233719007291--.name: Hello everyone! I'm Nairin, the tactical officer for Sky Fortress!

1122233719007292--.name: And you must be $MyPCName$! I hear you're taking a central role in this operation. I look forward to working with you!

1122233719007294--.name:
<font color="#909090">(She whispers angrily.)</font>
<font size="20">Nairin, focus! You're a representative of the Green Hoods!</font>

1122233719007296--.name: Allow me to begin the briefing on the Sky Fortress, and the alliance's operational plan!

1122233719007297--.name: HMS-001, the capital-class airborne carrier Sky Fortress.

1122233719007298--.name: The airship was constructed under the direction of Dark Wind's previous leader, Katvan—

1122233719007299--.name: Erm... Nairin? Everyone here has been well briefed on Katvan's involvement. Let's skip the history lesson, shall we?

1122233719007301--.name: Right! Then on to the task force's mission—

1122233719007302--.name: Working in concert with $MyPCName$, alliance representatives and the crew of the Sky Fortress will travel the globe eliminating threats and aiding the populace.

1122233719007303--.name: ...Or at least that's what we've been told. Right, Oska?

1122233719007305--.name: Why not allow the tactical officer to explain, herself?!

1122233719007307--.name: Well... Looks like everyone's been briefed... I'll just...

1122233719007308--.name: Tactical Officer Nairin, I have a question.

1122233719007309--.name: I'm curious about the tactical capabilities of this vessel. Perhaps you could tell us about that?

1122233719007312--.name: Well, there's forward and aft cannons, air-to-surface and anti-aircraft weaponry. It's got hull plating, a squadron of attack ships, oh, and infantry! There's radar, scanners, and a comms array. I can also tell you about engine output and general flight logistics!

1122233719007314--.name: Erm, Nairin, I think that will suffice...

1122233719007315--.name: Why don't you start by telling us about the guns?

1122233719007317--.name: Hah. I think this is going to take a while. $MyPCName$, why don't you go and meet the other representatives of the alliance?

1122233719007318--.name: Each of the leaders of the Maple Alliance hand-picked one officer to represent their interests aboard the Sky Fortress. Tactical Officer Nairin was Oska's choice.

1122233719007319--.name: As you will be working closely together, now would be a good time to make your introductions.

1122233719007320--.name: Hey there, $MyPCName$. Nice to officially meet you! I'm Schatten, representative and officer of Dark Wind.

1122233719007321--.name: Hey there, $MyPCName$. Nice to officially meet you! I'm Schatten, representative and officer of Dark Wind.

1122233719007322--.name: Hey there, $MyPCName$. Nice to officially meet you! I'm Schatten, representative and officer of Dark Wind.

1122233719007323--.name: You know, you're pretty cute up close. Not as tall as I thought you were though... I guess everyone looks bigger in a giant robot!

1122233719007324--.name: You were there during the invasion?

1122233719007325--.name: Of course. I've been keeping tabs on you since you first showed up in Lith Harbor. You didn't notice me?

1122233719007326--.name: You really should keep your eyes open. Hahaha!

1122233719007327--.name: I know everything there is to know about you. I used to be a member of the Shadow Walkers, so that's no surprise.

1122233719007328--.name: Heck, there's plenty of things I wish I didn't know. But it's all part of the job! We have eyes and ears all over the world.

1122233719007330--.name: Well, I can tell you, but I'll have to shoot you. Do you still want to know?

1122233719007331--.name: Ahahaha! Just kidding. You're adorable when you're terrified.

1122233719007332--.name: I'll be happy to tell you all about the Shadow Walkers... after you've earned my trust.

1122233719007334--.name: Anyways, Dark Wind's new marching orders are to fly around the world busting criminals, working undercover to gather intel, and hunting down Katvan's remaining followers, all from the comfort of a giant airship!

1122233719007335--.name: I look forward to working closely together, and getting to know you, hehe!

1122233719007336--.name: Oh, you're going around meeting the officers, right? If you head around that corner you'll find $npcName:11003583$, the head of Tria's Imperial Vanguard.

1122233719007337--.name: Hehe, you probably should've spoken with him first, considering his notoriety. Well, good luck! I'll see you around, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$.

1122233719007338--.name: Are you the sorry excuse for a warrior who pulled strings with the empress to get a spot on the task force?

1122233719007339--.name: Are you the sorry excuse for a warrior who pulled strings with the empress to get a spot on the task force?

1122233719007340--.name: Are you the sorry excuse for a warrior who pulled strings with the empress to get a spot on the task force?

1122233719007341--.name: P-pulled strings? I was recommended for this post!

1122233719007342--.name: Ha! What nonsense! Back in my day, no one would've stood for that sort of politicking. If you wanted a spot in the guard, you had to earn it! Hmph, kids today...

1122233719007344--.name:
What if I am?
<font color="#909090">(This introduction's off to a terrible start... Maybe it's time for a different approach.)</font>

1122233719007345--.name: I well, I just thought you must be, since you're so, uhh, buff and confident. I know you're the sort of person I'd want in charge, if I were in the Royal Guard!

1122233719007348--.name: I like you, kid. You're okay!

1122233719007349--.name: Yes, you had the right of it! I'm $npcName:11003583$, former guard captain and current leader of the Imperial Vanguard. We represent Tria's interests within the Maple Alliance.

1122233719007350--.name: It's only been a handful of years since I passed the title of guard captain to Frey, and already things in the city have completely fallen apart.

1122233719007351--.name: After the attack on Tria, when I heard Frey was planning to abandon his duties to run off and play hero with the Maple Alliance, I knew it was time I had words with him.

1122233719007352--.name: The first duty of the captain of the guard is to protect Tria and the empress! What he had proposed to do wasn't just unheard of, it was an insult to the order!

1122233719007353--.name: And that is why I took up my sword once again to lead the Imperial Vanguard, leaving Frey to uphold his duty as the guardian of Tria.

1122233719007356--.name: Bahahaha! I see what you're doing. Angling for a spot in the vanguard are you?

1122233719007358--.name: Well, if you want to earn your place in the Imperial Vanguard, you'd better know what you're getting into.

1122233719007359--.name: It is our duty to travel the globe, protecting people from danger—not just Tria! We also deliver provisions to those in need.

1122233719007360--.name: To that end, any expertise you have in Life Skills will be tremendously valuable.

1122233719007361--.name: Of course, the ultimate decision on whether you've got what it takes to join the vanguard is mine. I'll be keeping an eye on you!

1122233719007362--.name: Well, you'd better introduce yourself to the other officers. Even if they are young, inexperienced buffoons. That fellow over on the bridge represents the Order of the Eclipse.

1122233719007363--.name: Look at him standing there with his coat dangling from his shoulders like an idiot. No decorum! If the guard's regulations on attire were enforced here, I'd give him an earful!

1122233719007364--.name: This vessel is far bigger than I could have imagined...

1122233719007365--.name: This vessel is far bigger than I could have imagined...

1123183219007541--.name: Sky Fortress is beyond anything I envisioned... The idea that something like this was built by human hands and ingenuity is simply amazing.

1123183219007542--.name: Of course, it's quite small compared to our headquarters—which is understandable, as the Eye of Providence was created by the goddess of light.

1123183219007543--.name: Are you the leader of the Order of the Eclipse?

1123183219007544--.name: The Order of the Eclipse... Yes, I suppose that's what they called us.

1123183219007545--.name: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Mason, templar and representative of the Lumiknights.

1123183219007547--.name: That's the official name of the Order of the Eclipse. Now that the security blackout regarding our organization has been lifted, there's no sense referring to it by other names.

1123183219007548--.name: For quite some time, the Lumiknights have worked in the shadows, observing the world without getting involved.

1123183219007549--.name: Just as we did during the War of Light and Darkness...

1123183219007550--.name: But things are going to be different. I'm glad to see that my superiors have learned from their mistakes.

1123183219007551--.name: The Lumiknights will work alongside the Alliance to investigate the Shadow World and defend Maple World against the forces of darkness.

1123183219007552--.name: Anyways, I look forward to working with you.

1123183219007553--.name: Do you know where I can find the captain?

1123183219007554--.name: Just continue this way and take the corridor to the left. Until we meet again.

1122233719007392--.name: Hm? Do you have business with me?

1122233719007393--.name: Hm? Do you have business with me?

1122233719007394--.name: Hm? Do you have business with me?

1122233719007395--.name: I just wanted to introduce myself.

1122233719007396--.name: That wasn't enough of an introduction before? Very well.

1122233719007397--.name: Welcome to the alliance, $MyPCName$. I'm Captain Veliche Martini of the Tria Navy.

1122233719007398--.name: <font color="#909090">(What's with her suddenly acting nice? Only a few minutes ago, she seemed so mean.)</font>

1122233719007402--.name: You've met with the officers of the different factions and heard about their roles, and now you're looking to learn about the Maple Alliance. Am I wrong?

1122233719007404--.name: Hm. It's understandable for you to be nervous in the face of the big mission ahead of us.

1122233719007405--.name: The component factions of the Maple Alliance each have their own goals and responsibilities, but there are also duties which belong to the union as a whole.

1122233719007406--.name: As the alliance's representative aboard the Sky Fortress, I will be dispatching you on special missions in service of the organization.

1122233719007407--.name: These assignments may range from dealing with threats throughout the world to testing experimental weapons aboard the ship, or even eliminating foes within dungeons.

1122233719007408--.name: Of course, you'll need to prove yourself qualified to take on such missions.

1122233719007409--.name: I don't care that you were hand-picked for this assignment by the empress. The simple fact is that I don't know you, and I don't want anyone I can't trust on my vessel.

1122233719007410--.name: You'll have plenty of opportunities to prove yourself just as soon as we launch.

1122233719007411--.name: Each representative within the Alliance will task you with more advanced missions as you prove yourself qualified.

1122233719007412--.name: Hm. Perhaps that wasn't the right thing to say to someone that's already nervous.

1122233719007413--.name: Actually, I'm feeling pretty good about this operation.

1122233719007414--.name: That's good to hear. We can talk more later. Report to tactical officer Nairin for a status update on launch preparations. That will be all.

1122233719007415--.name: ...And finally, Green Hoods will temporarily redirect their efforts from the battlefield, to focus on support tasks for the rest of the alliance.

1122233719007416--.name: ...And finally, Green Hoods will temporarily redirect their efforts from the battlefield, to focus on support tasks for the rest of the alliance.

1122233719007417--.name: ...And finally, Green Hoods will temporarily redirect their efforts from the battlefield, to focus on support tasks for the rest of the alliance.

1122233719007418--.name: Then I presume the Green Hoods oversee the Radar System you mentioned earlier?

1122233719007419--.name: Excellent memory! The answer is yes.

1122233719007420--.name: I didn't know Frey was so interested in military matters...

1122233719007421--.name: Perhaps that's why he became a soldier.

1122233719007422--.name: Sky Fortress's multi-spectral radar imaging system is linked right into my data tablet. We're actually running a systems test right now. Would you like to see it?

1122233719007423--.name: Oh, what great timing! The radar caught something.

1122233719007424--.name: These dots represent radar contacts. Red represents biological entities without transponders for friend-or-foe identification, so it's a safe bet they're enemies...

1122233719007427--.name: Your first assignment is to subdue the monsters within the $map:02000011$.

1122233719007428--.name: As you may know, Pyrros Fard has taken refuge there. If the monsters there were to aggravate him, things could get real bad.

1122233719007429--.name: A good opportunity to test your skills, right? But you need to be careful because the consequences are quite real. I've got a transport ship ready to take you straight there.

1122233719007430--.name: Your first assessment mission is to subdue the monsters within the $map:02000011$.

1122233719007431--.name: Let's see... monster activity has dropped below the maximum threat threshold! I'd call that a successful mission, $MyPCName$.

1122233719007432--.name: Oh! And after you complete a mission, you can check your current standing with each faction from the Reputation window, under the character menu.

1122233719007433--.name: From the Reputation window, you can also see comments about your performance from other members of the task force. You should check it often to see how you're doing!

1122233719007434--.name: Hey Nainai, are you trying to hog $MyPCName$ all for yourself? It's my turn to talk with $male:him,female:her$!

1122233719007435--.name: What are you talking about? That's not my name, I'm Nairin!

1122233719007437--.name: Anyways $MyPCName$, there's something I could use your help with too.

1122233719007438--.name: There's some robots stirring up trouble near the site of your last mission.

1122233719007440--.name: $npcNamePlural:21000135$ are combat drones designed by the $map:02000163$ a long time ago for operation in hazardous areas. Somehow they got out of the lab and started attacking people.

1122233719007441--.name: Nobody knows exactly what happened, but I've always speculated that the guys from MSL intentionally released the robots into remote areas to test their battle capabilities, without regard for human life.

1122233719007442--.name: I want to arrest all of them and make them chew on dirty gym socks... but I don't have any evidence.

1122233719007443--.name: Aaaaaaaaaaaanyways, I want you to go blow up some prizboxes to protect unsuspecting tourists.

1123203319007557--.name: ENGAGE THE SHORT-RANGE TELEPORTER! ...I'm just messing with you. But that would've been totally hilarious, right? Now get to the hangar, there's a transport ship waiting.

1122233719007445--.name: Find the mission location on the World Map and complete your mission.

1122233719007446--.name: Woo-hoo! You did it! How about a kiss on the cheek to celebrate your first field operation for Dark Wind?

1122233719007449--.name: So, that last mission was pretty reasonable, right?

1122233719007450--.name: Once we set sail, you'll be able to see the location of daily field missions right on the World Map!

1122233719007451--.name: And if you ever get in over your head on a mission or you need to take a break, there's no shame in leaving the area.

1122233719007452--.name: Your mission progress will be saved, up until midnight when the mission expires.

1122233719007454--.name: We have unidentified lifeforms approaching from all directions... They're moving fast!

1122233719007455--.name: I know what this is... I've seen beings approach this quickly just once before.

1122233719007459--.name: I'm sorry, why is he here again?

1122233719007460--.name: ...M-mason! Now is hardly the time for jokes!

1122233719007462--.name: Oh...! We've got a visual from the exterior base cameras!

1122233719007464--.name: The Rooks? Katvan must have told them about this place...

1122233719007465--.name: Captain, there's too many of them! We won't win a head-on battle!

1122233719007466--.name: Presuming their objective is to take back the Sky Fortress, there's no need for us to defeat them.

1122233719007467--.name: We simply need to move where they can't reach us.

1122233719007470--.name: The reactor is only at 60% output! We need more time, Captain!

1122233719007471--.name: We'll buy as much time as you need.

1122233719007472--.name: That's right. You just focus on getting the ship ready to launch.

1122233719007473--.name: I suppose we'll have to finish our briefing later. All right everyone, there's work to be done.

1122233719007474--.name: $MyPCName$, this won't be an easy battle.

1122233719007475--.name: Nevertheless, we must defend the ship for the good of the world, and in honor of those who fell in Tria.

1122233719007476--.name: That's what Joddy would have wanted.

1122233719007477--.name: I will defend the Sky Fortress! For Joddy, for all of Maple World!

1122233719007479--.name: All hands, defend the ship until we're ready for takeoff!

1122233719007481--.name: Was that the last transport? It looks like everyone made it aboard.

1122233719007482--.name: I still don't understand what happened... How did we all survive the explosion?

1122233719007483--.name: ...I'm afraid I can't explain it myself.

1122233719007484--.name: Perhaps it was the $skill:10100081$ between us and the blast.

1122233719007485--.name: I'm sure the shield might have helped, but I doubt anyone would have survived if we had used the real guns.

1122233719007486--.name: That was an XR-class prototype, a non-lethal thermobaric weapon.

1122233719007487--.name: It was designed to simulate the appearance of a high-yield explosion, but is not particularly destructive. It is primarily a deterrent, to be used as a show of force.

1122233719007488--.name: Ah...! Tactical Officer Nairin mentioned the device in her briefing! It creates a large atmospheric shockwave, but is largely harmless.

1122233719007489--.name: That's the one! It's basically just scary fireworks.

1122233719007490--.name: How about I launch some fireworks at you, and you can tell me whether it hurts?

1122233719007491--.name: I suppose it would be painful for ordinary folk, but to a Lumiknight it's hardly a scratch.

1122233719007492--.name: It sounds like we have a volunteer!

1122233719007493--.name: ...Ahem. Setting aside personal feelings, considering how the device sent the Rooks running for their lives, I think we can agree it was a solid plan.

1122233719007494--.name: $MyPCName$, I was quite impressed with your performance. You maintained your composure in the face of overwhelming odds.

1122233719007495--.name: I'm sure you're exhausted. You should head to the bunks and get some rest.

1122233719007496--.name: ...Hm. I can see that Captain Veliche disagrees.

1122233719007497--.name: Now more than ever, we must prepare for the coming mission. This is no time to let our guard down.

1122233719007498--.name: With that in mind, I'd like the leaders of the alliance to return to Tria and update the empress on what's transpired.

1122233719007499--.name: Sky Fortress is secure, but Maple World is in greater danger than ever before.

1122233719007500--.name: The captain is right. Our enemies have grown bold after the attack of Tria. We should set out at once.

1122233719007501--.name: $MyPCName$, I apologize but there's no time for rest.

1122233719007502--.name: The moment we have completed our system checks and set a course, we will begin your mission-readiness assessment.

1122233719007503--.name: But don't think recent events will influence my exacting standards of excellence.

1122233719007504--.name: With the growing threats to our world, it's imperative that I be able to rely fully on every member of my crew. The stakes for failure are too high.

1122233719007505--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm sure you feel like you've already proven yourself time and again, but consider this assessment an opportunity to earn the respect of Captain Veliche and the rest of the crew. You should do everything within your power to make yourself indispensable to them.

1122233719007506--.name: I never expected I'd say this to anyone other than Lennon, but...

1122233719007507--.name: I wish you luck, my friend.

1122233719007508--.name: I wanted to make sure you heard this from me, because I don't trust that kid to give you the right information.

1122233719007510--.name: It's the truth. If you don't like it, then stop being such an incomprehensible weirdo.

1122233719007511--.name: Anyways, I'll be teaching you about Faction Shops so he doesn't have the opportunity to screw it up.

1122233719007512--.name: Faction officers such as myself sell specialized items you may find quite useful.

1122233719007514--.name: By order of the captain, you may only purchase items for which you have clearance. Your reputation with a given faction will determine which items you can buy.

1122233719007515--.name: The good news is, you don't need to spend your hard-earned mesos, but rather a special currency called Faction Tokens.

1122233719007516--.name: Really, it's a sensible decision. High quality provisions are in short supply, so it's crucial that they be available to those who would make the best use of them, rather than some foolish cadet fresh out of boot camp.

1122233719007517--.name: Of course, if you want to join the Imperial Vanguard and be recognized as a hero, you'll probably need top-shelf equipment from our Faction Shop. Bahahahaha!

1122233719007518--.name: Of course, if you want to join the Imperial Vanguard and be recognized as a hero, you'll probably need top-shelf equipment from our Faction Shop. Bahahahaha!

1122233719007519--.name: Anyhow, you can check out the Faction Shop later if you're curious. It looks like the other officers have just received a fresh shipment of goods, so you ought to see what they have for sale.

1122233719007520--.name: Hey Officer Nairin! If the Green Hoods have any extras, how 'bout you make a trade with the vanguards?

1122233719007521--.name: You know, I'd really love to help you out since we're allies and all, but I really don't think you have anything we'd want.

1122233719007523--.name: $MyPCName$, I've received preliminary reports on your mission performance thus far...

1122233719007524--.name: And I've come to a decision regarding your presence on this ship.

1122233719007525--.name: And I've come to a decision regarding your presence on this ship.

1122233719007526--.name: You are hereby cleared for field duty.

1122233719007527--.name: Your performance thus far has been adequate, but the officers have yet to render a final assessment.

1122233719007528--.name: Therefore, I will be objectively monitoring you for the time being.

1122233719007529--.name: I hope you won't take any of this personally. As you've seen, our assessments are not swayed by reputation or personal feelings.

1122233719007530--.name: You may come highly recommended by Empress Ereve herself, but I will not put the lives of my crew in your hands until you've proven yourself capable.

1122233719007531--.name: Instead, you must rise through the ranks like everyone else, on merit. In time, I hope to see you grow into a hero and trusted guardian of Maple World.

1122233719007532--.name: To that end, it is my pleasure to officially welcome you to the crew of the Sky Fortress.

1122233719007534--.name: If you want to know where you are, just pop open the World Map and take a look!

1122233719007535--.name: All right, now that you've got your bearings, it's time for you to go bust up some robots!

1122233719007537--.name: If you want to know where you are, just pop open the World Map and take a look!

1122233719007538--.name: I'm detecting way less drone chatter on the RF spectrum. I'd say your work there is done, $MyPCName$!

1122233719007539--.name: I can use data from your fight with the Prizboxes to analyze their weaknesses. Then we can dispatch Dark Wind agents to deal with the threat on a larger scale.

1122233719007540--.name: Anyways, good work out there. Now come on home!

1226205419008193--.name: If the captain called us all here at once, this can't be good news. What do you think, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$?

1226205419008194--.name: Not necessarily. Maybe she's gathered us all so she can publicly profess her love?

1226205419008195--.name: "My dear sweet Nairin, I can't keep my feelings for you a secret any longer! You're so beautiful in the dingy glow of your tablet. You are the captain of my heart. Set sail with me on a voyage of love!"

1226205419008197--.name: Hehe! If the captain won't say it, then I will! You know how I feel about you, don't you Nainai?

1226205419008198--.name: If you really like me, then quit it with the teasing!

1226205419008200--.name: Attention! We have important matters to discuss.

1226205419008201--.name: It's time we went over the alliance's most pressing mission.

1226205419008202--.name: With the launch of the Sky Fortress, mastery of the skies belongs once more in the hands of the forces of light.

1226205419008203--.name: This newfound sense of security has allowed the resumption of airborne trade, something not seen in Maple World since the last golden age.

1226205419008204--.name: Haha! That's great news! That means supplies will be able to quickly make their way exactly where they're needed.

1226205419008206--.name:
$MyPCName$, you really don't know the fascinating history of airship trade in Maple World? Hmm. Why don't you swing by my quarters sometime for some private tutoring?
<font color="#909090">(She winks.)</font>

1226205419008207--.name: The Orbis-class Aerial Transport was the workhorse of the skies!

1226205419008208--.name: It was a beautiful craft, and a symbol of human ingenuity. They were used both for transporting goods and passengers.

1226205419008209--.name: During the last great war, the skies became so dangerous that the forces of light could no longer guarantee the safety of private citizens. So, the ships were decommissioned.

1226205419008210--.name: It's wonderful to hear that Sky Fortress is already serving as a symbol of hope and nostalgia for better times...

1226205419008211--.name: But it seems unlikely that you called this meeting just to tell us this. Why don't we move onto the real reason we're here?

1226205419008212--.name: I wish it were only good news we were here to discuss.

1226205419008213--.name: I'm afraid there are other matters that need our attention.

1226205419008214--.name: Unfortunately, we've already received disheartening news.

1226205419008215--.name: We have reports of four different trading vessels going missing, and we've already found the wreckage of one.

1226205419008216--.name: Who would dare destroy a ship under the protection of the Maple Alliance?

1226205419008217--.name: How did this happen in the first place? We've got a whole array of sensors to serve as an early warning system.

1226205419008218--.name: Realistically, there's only so much distance our sensors can cover. And there's only one Sky Fortress to police the skies.

1226205419008219--.name: There's also the possibility that whatever destroyed the ship doesn't exist in our database. The sensors can only recognize what they know to look for.

1226205419008220--.name: It may also be that we're beginning to see the consequences of our emergency launch. We didn't have time to properly test either the sensor array, or our weapon systems. This is something that must be remedied before we engage in battle.

1226205419008221--.name: However, we can't just sit on our hands. In order to protect the rest of the merchant fleet, we must investigate the destroyed airship, and the whereabouts of those still missing.

1226205419008222--.name: Each of you have a role to play in this investigation.

1226205419008225--.name: The Imperial Vanguard will travel to Tria and the surrounding cities to track down information on the missing ships.

1226205419008229--.name: Dark Wind will identify and secure the trade routes of the missing airships. This won't be an easy task, but you may use any methods at your disposal.

1226205419008230--.name: Uh, are you sure about that Captain? The other members of the alliance have never approved of Shadow Walker tactics...

1226205419008232--.name: Don't forget that you're no longer a member of that group. You are to conduct yourself as a representative of the Maple Alliance at all times.

1226205419008233--.name: Aww...! I can't even do some light torturing?

1226205419008236--.name: Utilize the Green Hoods' contacts in the Barrota Trading Company. See if they know anything that can help us.

1226205419008240--.name: The Lumiknights will investigate the unusual conditions of the crash site.

1226205419008241--.name: Do you mean to say there were traces of dark energies found at the site? That is concerning...

1226205419008245--.name: You will provide on-site support for each faction's mission.

1226205419008246--.name: No doubt your unique abilities will prove necessary in dealing with the task at hand.

1226205419008247--.name: Assist each officer in any way necessary.

1226205419008249--.name: I'll be working with our analysis team to try and salvage the data on the crashed ship's black box.

1226205419008250--.name: But considering the device's severely damaged state, our search for answers may rest entirely upon your collective efforts.

1226205419008251--.name: You all have your orders. Dismissed!

1226205419008252--.name: Hey, cadet! How'd you like to be a pawn of the Imperial Vanguard?

1226205419008253--.name: I'm ready for any mission you can throw at me. Consider me Strike Team Condor!

1226205419008254--.name: Bwahahaha! I like the way you think, kid!

1226205419008255--.name: All right! Just as the captain ordered, you'll be asking around to see what you can dig up on the missing airships.

1226205419008256--.name: And considering these are trading ships we're after, there's no better place to start than $map:02000062$. You know, since it's a popular trading hub.

1226205419008257--.name: That sounds like a great idea.

1226205419008258--.name: You're not just agreeing with me to get on my good side, are you?

1226205419008259--.name: I'd never patronize you, sir. You're far too smart for that.

1226205419008260--.name: Exactly! I'm glad we're on the same page.

1226205419008261--.name: While you gather information at the harbor, I'll reach out to my friends in the Royal Guard.

1226205419008262--.name: Tria's a big place, but the people talk, and the guards are always listening. If there are any foul plots afoot in the city, they'll be the first to know.

1226205419008263--.name: ...Well, what are you waiting for?! Get a move on, "Strike Team Condor!" Bahahaha!

1226205419008264--.name: What are you doing? You've got work to do in $map:02000062$!

1226205419008265--.name: Seriously, you're just getting back now? How could someone so young be so slow?!

1226205419008266--.name: Well, what did you learn from the people of $map:02000062$?

1226205419008267--.name: It seems like any airships traveling by sea are fine, but those that fly over land are at risk of vanishing.

1226205419008268--.name: Hmm... This is unsettling but useful information.

1226205419008270--.name: Well, we've got to sip while the soup is hot! It's time we moved our investigation to $map:02000001$.

1226205419008271--.name: According to my informant, there's an unsettling rumor going around $map:02000001$. They didn't, uh, actually know what the rumor was, but it could pertain to our missing airships.

1226205419008273--.name: Do I have informants? I have so many you might as well call them an infor-mountain. Bahahaha!

1226205419008276--.name: Ahaha. Ahahaha. Infor-mountain. I just got it. Whew, that's a good one boss.

1226205419008277--.name: Please, that was just comedic instinct. If I told you one of my real jokes you'd split your sides! Hahaha!

1226205419008278--.name: Anyways, I've got a ship waiting to take you to $map:02000001$. Speak with the populace and look into this meta-rumor of ours.

1226205419008279--.name: What are you doing? You're supposed to be in $map:02000001$ investigating the missing airships!

1226205419008280--.name: So, what was the unsettling rumor going around Tria?

1226205419008281--.name: <font color="#909090">(You hand him the photo you got from $npcName:11000373$.)</font>

1226205419008282--.name: Hm? What is this blurry monstrosity? It looks like a messed up bird with a weird neck!

1226205419008283--.name: Do you want someone to go and fetch your reading glasses? I believe you're looking at it upside down.

1226205419008284--.name: Quiet, you! It's a bad photo to begin with. It's not my fault some loser with a camera couldn't get a closer shot.

1226205419008285--.name: Closer... to the sky? Hmm. But that silhouette looks familiar. If that is what I think it is, the people are right to be scared...

1226205419008286--.name: I've had just about enough of your logic. Anyway, something serious is clearly going on here.

1226205419008287--.name: If even the citizens of Tria have seen this much, then surely the royal court knows something. It's weird that they've been completely silent...

1226205419008288--.name: Hey, Strike Team Condor, I've got one last mission for you. Speak with officials from the royal court and get to the bottom of things.

1226205419008289--.name: As the ruling body of Tria, surely the court is privy not only to the rumors circulating, but the truth behind them.

1226205419008291--.name: There's no rush. You should take it easy, maybe do some shopping while you're there. Well, what are you waiting for? The transport's waiting.

1226205419008292--.name: Didn't you just get on a transport to Tria? What are you doing here?

1226205419008293--.name: Ah, you're back. Surely you've learned something useful?

1226205419008294--.name: <font color="#909090">(You relay the information you've gathered.)</font>

1226205419008295--.name: A being even the goddess of light couldn't destroy? Doesn't that mean we're in trouble?

1226205419008296--.name: Well, Karl said it doesn't exist anymore...

1226205419008297--.name: That's a relief. Did you say that $npcName:11003566[gender:0]$ said something about a former captain</font>?

1226205419008299--.name: Don't tell me he's back... There's no way...

1226205419008301--.name: All this talk of demons roaming the skies, and a great threat approaching... I don't like it.

1226205419008302--.name: Good job, cadet. I'll relay our findings to the captain.

1226205419008303--.name: Hey there, $male:handsome,female:gorgeous$! Ready for a thrilling adventure?

1226205419008304--.name: We've been tasked with identifying airship trade routes. That way, we can see if there's an correlation between their cargo, where they were heading, and where they disappeared.

1226205419008305--.name: Can't we just ask the various trade organizations involved for that sort of information?

1226205419008306--.name: In a perfect world, sure... For the most part, the merchants have mostly been cooperative, but the Barrota Trading Company has been less than helpful.

1226205419008307--.name: They claim they can't open up their records because it would expose trade secrets. With the recent cloud of scandal surrounding the company, I'm sure that's only part of their concern.

1226205419008308--.name: They're just worried about covering their own butts, and they don't seem to care that human lives are on the line. They can expect a full investigation as soon as we've located the missing ships!

1226205419008309--.name: But that's a problem for Dark Wind. I have a special job I need your help with.

1226205419008310--.name: All of their records concerning their airship fleet and trade routes are hosted on MSL's cloud servers. So, we're going to hack MSL's network!

1226205419008311--.name: Well, not MSL directly. They're too secure. We're going to hack one of the communications arrays their data passes through.

1226205419008312--.name: Unfortunately for us, the array only communicates with the outside world in scheduled bursts, for security reasons. That's why we're going to need direct access to the device. Don't worry! You don't need to do anything fancy.

1226205419008313--.name: You just need to manually power the array and connect this data storage device I've loaded up with a virus thingy. I'll take care of the rest. Ready for some morally justifiable crime?

1226205419008314--.name:
Oh hey, you're back. That's weird, I'm still waiting for a signal from the communications array. You did what I asked, right?
(<font color="#909090">She stares at you.)</font>

1226205419008315--.name: Good work! The array's signal is coming in loud and clear! I'm dumping the device's data cache to our computers as we speak.

1226205419008316--.name: Blargh! I'm seeing some chunks that look useful, but the data's incomplete...

1226205419008317--.name: They must be breaking up their data transfers and routing them through multiple arrays, so that no one transmission contains the complete files. These guys are smarter than I expected...

1226205419008318--.name: New plan! Since they're breaking up the data, we'll have to compromise multiple arrays if we're going to reconstruct the files we need.

1226205419008319--.name: Let's see... It looks like the array at the $map:02000162$ has been transmitting on the same schedule as the array we already hit. Odds are, more of our data is cached there!

1226205419008320--.name: Hmm... I'm detecting RF band interference consistent with $npcNamePlural:21000134$... That's going to be a problem.

1226205419008321--.name: $npcNamePlural:21000134$ are equipped with signal jammers. They'll be sure to muck up any unscheduled data pulses. But, if you bust up a few of them, the transmission should be strong enough to get through.

1226205419008322--.name: I know this is turning into more of a goose chase than we expected. When all this is over, how about I make it up to you with a nice massage? Anywho! There's a ship waiting to take you to the research station.

1226205419008323--.name: What are you doing back? We haven't intercepted any data pulses. I made it pretty clear, no data, no massage!

1226205419008324--.name: Ugh, even after harvesting the new array's cache, we still don't have the complete files. I'm starting to get frustrated.

1226205419008326--.name: Well, the good news is we've cobbled together roughly half the data!

1226205419008328--.name: Based on the data we have so far, it looks like Barrota's airships have at least 5 trade routes. It looks like the departure and arrival locations have remained constant, so I'm guessing these particular routes are safe.

1226205419008329--.name: We're almost done. I just need your help a little longer, sweetie.

1226205419008330--.name: All right! Let's have a look at the map and see where my little kitten is going this time.

1226205419008331--.name: You know, maybe it's time we gave something else a try. Why don't I just go talk to the president of Barrota Trading Company in person?

1226205419008332--.name: Oh, no! If my little kitten goes off-book, $male:he,female:she$ could jeopardize not just the data we've collected so far, but the entire operation.

1226205419008333--.name: I can only imagine how the captain would react. She seems nice on the surface, but a terrible rage burns inside her. But, you might be all right! I guess she hasn't thrown anyone out the airlock recently.

1226205419008336--.name:
I see. Excuse me.
<font color='#909090'>(You can't be sure, but the captain almost seems disappointed.)</font>

1226205419008337--.name: It's like the captain has an alarm that goes off whenever someone's talking about her. How does she always appear at just the right times?

1226205419008339--.name: I was so startled that I almost forgot to give my little kitten an errand!

1226205419008340--.name: That would have been a tragedy.

1226205419008341--.name: Theres a multi-antenna array that needs a good hacking at the $map:02000277$! Get a move on, $MyPCName$ your ship's waiting.

1226205419008342--.name: Is my little kitten expecting a treat, when I'm still waiting for a the data transfer? Run along and finish your errand.

1226205419008344--.name: Argh! Just how many deliveries did they split their data into? I'm all for digital security, but this is overkill.

1226205419008345--.name: If I was handling this mission as a Shadow Walker, I'd have already gotten the information we need with nothing but my eye-gouging spoon and some creatively-placed electrical clamps.

1226205419008346--.name: <font color="#909090">(Just what kind of organization are the Shadow Walkers running?)</font>

1226205419008347--.name: Just a little further! Extrapolating from the data we've collected, there's just one more location we need to hit!

1226205419008348--.name: Time to go in for the kill! Err, metaphorically speaking. It looks like there's a computer connected directly to this last array. That's even better. Next stop, $map:02000269$!

1226205419008349--.name: Once you get the final data chunk, we'll be able to reconstruct their airships' trade routes. Plus, we'll be able to harvest any juicy communications between Barrota and one of their customers.

1226205419008350--.name: Great! I'll be back in a flash!

1226205419008351--.name: Oh... Are you in a hurry to complete our mission? That's too bad, I was hoping to spend more time with you. Well, fly safe!

1226205419008352--.name: Did you forget something? Or are you here to see me? I'd love to play with you, but this place is a little too public.

1226205419008353--.name: Whew... We've finally got all the data! I'll pore over any information regarding the trade routes and see if I can't learn something.

1226205419008354--.name: The new president of Barrota Trading Company is something else. I've never seen such a sophisticated approach to data security. I'm not sure if I should be amazed or worried.

1226205419008355--.name: They didn't make this mission easy.

1226205419008356--.name:
Yes, you've been through quite the ordeal. How about a little reward for your efforts?
<font color="#909090">(She kisses you on the cheek.)</font>

1226205419008358--.name: Oh my, you've turned bright red. Do you have a fever? Come back to my quarters and I'll take care of you.

1226205419008359--.name: Excuse me. I just remembered, I have to... go to... place...

1226205419008360--.name: Haha. Why are you running away? Well, thanks for all your help!

1226205419008362--.name: I've reached out to our contact in the Barrota Trading Company, and he's agreed to smuggle us the ledger documenting the company's business transactions, and more importantly, cargo manifests.

1226205419008363--.name: It may be that the missing airships were attacked by someone after the goods they were carrying.

1226205419008364--.name: But we'll need the ledger to prove that hypothesis.

1226205419008365--.name: Your job will be to meet with our contact at $map:02000139$. I'll monitor the situation from above, just in case there are any complications.

1226205419008366--.name: Oh! And you don't need to worry about getting there. I've already arranged travel for you!

1226205419008367--.name:
Guardian Six, this is the bridge. Begin pre-flight checks. Destination $map:02000139$. $MyPCName$ will be aboard momentarily.
<font color="#909090">(She gestures you toward the flight deck.)</font>

1226205419008368--.name: $MyPCName$, you're back already? Where's the ledger?

1226205419008370--.name: You're $MyPCName$, right? What brings you here?

1226205419008371--.name: I'm here as a representative of the Maple Alliance.

1226205419008372--.name: So you're the one the Green Hoods sent! Well, I'm glad it's a familiar face, considering everything that's been going on.

1226205419008374--.name: Sigh... Where do I start? The Barrota Trading Company got a new president after what happened to $npcName:11000526[gender:0]$. The position's been vacant for a long time, so initially people were pretty happy.

1226205419008375--.name: But the new president is a complete mystery. I've certainly never seen them, and I don't even know their name. And as if that weren't weird enough, the whole company's gotten so secretive.

1226205419008376--.name: We're doing a crazy amount of business in arms sales right now, with the times we live in. It might even be our main source of revenue. But every single transaction gets entered into a single paper ledger by hand.

1226205419008378--.name: There's local records, but the ledger is the only document with the whole picture. Whatever secrets they're hiding are gonna ruin this company someday. That's why I took the ledger, only it's protected by some kind of magic.

1226205419008379--.name: I figure if there's anyone with Victoria Island's best interest at heart, it's the alliance. That's why I reached out. Please, find someone who can unseal this magicked ledger.

1226205419008380--.name: Does taking the ledger place you in any danger?

1226205419008381--.name: I'll be fine. I intercepted the ledger while it was in transit from the president's office to somewhere else. There's no way anyone would know it was me who swiped the ledger.

1226205419008382--.name: You never know. You should be careful.

1226205419008383--.name: Thanks for the concern. Well, I'm putting my trust in you!

1226205419008384--.name: So this is the secret ledger! Unghh. Solvay was right, the cover won't budge!

1226205419008385--.name: We'll need a skilled wizard in order to get past the magical seal on this book. I don't supposed you happen to know any, $MyPCName$?

1226205419008386--.name: $npcName:11000033[gender:0]$ in $map:02000023$ might be able to help us.

1226205419008387--.name: Oh wow! I'm glad you actually know someone. Researching where to find skilled wizards could've taken a while.

1226205419008388--.name: Is that... something you can just research?

1226205419008389--.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$. I'll charter a transport to $map:02000023$ right now.

1226205419008390--.name: Well, did you have any luck? I'm getting a little nervous, because Condor has started talking about busting the ledger open with a sword.

1226205419008394--.name: Well, this is new. It's usually me who comes to you for help. Tell me what the problem is, and I'll see if I can't help.

1226205419008395--.name: This ledger has been sealed by magic. I was hoping you could help me get it open.

1226205419008396--.name: Where did you get this? I sense this book is enchanted with an extremely complex spell.

1226205419008398--.name: Oh, I was simply curious. $MyPCName$, I'm sorry to say but I'm afraid protection magic is not my specialty.

1226205419008399--.name: However, I do know an expert in the subject.

1226205419008401--.name: Why, it's someone with whom you are well acquainted. The class president of Ellinel Magic Academy!

1226205419008402--.name: You're in luck, $MyPCName$. It just so happens that she's here in $map:02000023$.

1226205419008403--.name: I believe she would have no trouble overcoming magic like this.

1226205419008405--.name: More often than not, just outside the $map:02000109$. She said she goes there to think. You should start your search there.

1226205419008406--.name: She can usually be found outside of $map:02000109$. You should look there.

1226205419008407--.name: Well, if it isn't $MyPCName$. What brings you here?

1226205419008408--.name: I came looking for some help with a magic problem.

1226205419008409--.name: Well, you've certainly come to the right wizard for that!

1226205419008410--.name: Are you really an expert in protection magic?

1226205419008411--.name: There's little magic I wouldn't consider myself an expert in.

1226205419008413--.name: I can't just sit around all day helping just anyone, but I suppose I can make time for you.

1226205419008414--.name: So what is this magical problem you need my help with?

1226205419008415--.name:
I need to get this book open so I can see what's inside.
<font color="#909090">(You hand her the ledger.)</font>

1226205419008416--.name: What is this book? The charm-work on this seal is meticulous... I can see why a lesser wizard would have trouble opening it. Of course, for me it would be childsplay.

1226205419008417--.name: That's great! Go ahead and open it.

1226205419008418--.name: Patience! You can't break a seal like this just by waving a magic wand. Undoing a protection charm is extremely intricate work.

1226205419008419--.name: This charm isn't particularly difficult to undo so much as it is a chore. I'll need a number of reagents for my work, including several vials of the $itemPlural:30001033$.

1226205419008421--.name: As any capable student of magic would know, $item:30001033$ can be found in the springs of the $map:02000090$. Now, hurry along.

1226205419008422--.name: You know, it would probably save us a lot of time if you could teleport me there.

1226205419008423--.name: Of course I could teleport you there! I'm a first-rate wizard.

1226205419008425--.name:
Sigh. Well, if I must do everything myself. Ready?
<font color="#909090">(She raises her staff in the air and magical energies begin to flow forth.)</font>

1226205419008426--.name: You should be more grateful that I'm helping you.

1226205419008427--.name: Did you bring what I asked for? Ah yes, this should be enough.

1226205419008428--.name: Great! What say we crack open this bad boy?

1226205419008429--.name: You can't rush good magic! This is just one of the reagents needed. We still have a long way to go before we can see what's inside this book of yours.

1226205419008430--.name: The particular charm we are dealing with has two components that must be defeated.

1226205419008432--.name: $MyPCName$, you really should expand your magical knowledge if you want to get anywhere... Very well, I'll explain. Just remember to tell Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ how big a help I've been to you with this matter.

1226205419008434--.name: Good. Now, as I've said, the protection charm on this book has two components. The first is the seal preventing the book from being opened.

1226205419008435--.name: Unfortunately, once we finally get the book open, we encounter a problem with the content of the book: the second component of the charm. Do you know what that is?

1226205419008436--.name: No! Remember, this is a magical problem, not a logistical one. Try again.

1227104719008723--.name: ...At any point in your entire life, has there ever been a time where an answer became less wrong when repeated?

1226205419008437--.name: That's right. The second component of the book's protective charm is a vanishing spell. Opening the book does us no good if we can't see the words inside it.

1226205419008439--.name: Good! Now, naturally, the reagent we'll need to outwit the charm is...?

1226205419008441--.name: It's $item:30001034$, of course! There should be plenty at $map:02000019$. Go and bring some back.

1226205419008442--.name: Would you mind teleporting me there?

1226205419008443--.name: ...I suppose. But next time you see Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$, you should let him know how nice I've been to you.

1226205419008444--.name: There's no reading what's in this book without $item:30001034$. I suggest you go get some.

1226205419008447--.name: Perfect! There's one more thing I need you go get.

1226205419008448--.name: Now, there's one more thing I need you to get.

1226205419008449--.name: Didn't you say there were only two components to the protective charm?

1226205419008451--.name: Then don't we have everything we need to remove the charm?

1226205419008452--.name: I said I needed it, I never said it was for the spell. Do you want to be able to read your book or not?!

1226205419008453--.name: Relax, I'll get it! Just tell me what you need.

1226205419008458--.name: They have other applications! Now, are you going to get them or not?

1226205419008461--.name: If you want to see what's on this ledger, you'll bring me $itemPlural:30000232$!

1226205419008463--.name: I'm going to use the cherries to conjure up a cake for Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$...

1226205419008465--.name: Even though I came back to work with him, Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ has been different ever since the incident with Pathos.

1226205419008466--.name: I just want things to go back to the way they were before... Agh, why am I even talking about this with you?

1226205419008469--.name: ...Thanks. Now let's remove that protection charm!

1226205419008471--.name: Essentially, what we're doing is reversing each part of the charm. With a little incantation, the $item:30001033$ shows me how they sealed the book. I just perform the spell backwards and it'll pop right open! And then we coat the pages with $item:30001034$ to render the text visible.

1226205419008473--.name: <font color="#909090">(You open the book with ease, and its text slowly reveals itself before you.)</font>

1226205419008474--.name: Surprised? You should've expected nothing less from such a skilled Wizard.

1226205419008475--.name: Thanks! I'd better get this back to the Sky Fortress.

1226205419008477--.name: Remember, if Professor $npcName:11000032[gender:0]$ asks about me, tell him how indispensable I've been!

1226205419008478--.name: $MyPCName$, you're back! Did you find someone who could unseal Barrota's secret ledger?

1226205419008479--.name:
I did!
<font color="#909090">(You hand her the ledger.)</font>

1226205419008480--.name: Fantastic! Good work, I'll take it from here.

1226205419008481--.name: ...Huh? I was expecting to spend hours combing through the numbers looking for suspicious transactions... But I guess when your ledger is magically sealed, you can just leave the shady business out in the open.

1226205419008483--.name: It looks like Barotta's been skimming goods from their munitions deals and re-selling them! But there's no mention of who they're selling to. And most of these goods are banned for export.

1226205419008484--.name: Top-of-the-line infantry armor from Nerman Forge... Lightweight alloys used in airship and weapons construction... and a large number of floatstones.

1226205419008485--.name: Considering the quantity of goods being offloaded, they could easily form a small airship fleet.

1226205419008486--.name: Hm... It looks like shipments have been going missing on a regular basis. But they've been able to cover their losses because of the high price of their goods.

1226205419008487--.name: Why are shipments getting lost so frequently? I'll report our findings to the captain and continue my investigation.

1226205419008488--.name: $MyPCName$, thank you for all your hard work! I'll let you know what I learn when my analysis is complete.

1226205419008490--.name: I suppose I have an assignment you could help with.

1226205419008492--.name: As per the captain's orders, the Lumiknights will investigate the $map:52010053$ for any anomalies in the region.

1226205419008493--.name: As we've detected a large number of monsters nearby, I would like you to fulfill your duty as a guardian of Maple World and secure the area.

1226205419008494--.name: Me? What happened to dispatching the Lumiknights?

1226205419008495--.name: While the existence of the Lumiknights has been declassified, it is still advantageous to operate in secret. To that end, we avoid large-scale public operations.

1226205419008496--.name: Therefore, I'd like you to accompany me to discreetly investigate the crash site.

1226205419008497--.name: Sure. But why do you need my help? You seem plenty capable with your magic floating sword and all.

1226205419008498--.name: You speak of Deireadh, the unbreakable sword. I had it forged by a blademelder I met in the firelands during my travels through the astral plane.

1226205419008499--.name: The blade is sentient, and its magical enchantments allow it access to the secrets of the universe... which has proven to be something of a burden.

1226205419008500--.name: As a consequence of this, Deireadh has developed a sort of death wish. But being indestructible, it must content itself with the demise of others. You can see how this would be a problem.

1226205419008501--.name: Thankfully, it is bound to my will. But should I give the order for it to strike, it may be difficult to stop the blade before it has unleashed unspeakable devastation and bloodshed.

1226205419008502--.name: ...Okay then, so I guess I'll be taking care of any monsters at our destination.

1226205419008503--.name: Excellent. Now, shall we descend to the crash site?

1226205419008504--.name: What are you waiting for? There's work to be done at the crash site.

1226205419008505--.name: You're as skilled as I had heard. It's good I brought you with me.

1226205419008506--.name: The monsters here seem even more aggressive than usual. I believe something here is causing it.

1226205419008507--.name: It's faint, but I sense... darkness.

1226205419008509--.name: This energy is unlike the darkness we usually encounter. But it's hard to say any more without a more concentrated sample.

1226205419008510--.name: I need a conduit to the darkness. Please bring me any debris you suspect may be tainted by darkness to inspect.

1226205419008511--.name: You're not going to help me look?

1226205419008512--.name: That would be inadvisable. Ever since I was cursed to feed on darkness by the bloodwitch of the distant Eastwilds, I find it quite difficult to control myself around the stuff. I'd hate to eat myself into a frenzy.

1226205419008513--.name: On second thought, I'll see what I can find on my own.

1226205419008514--.name: Excellent. I'll leave it to you.

1226205419008515--.name: Please bring me any objects you suspect may be tainted with the darkness, so I may inspect them.

1226205419008516--.name: Ah, yes. I sense a concentrated darkness coming from your general direction.

1226205419008517--.name: Let me see what you've found.

1226205419008518--.name: Should you be inspecting these... considering what you said earlier?

1226205419008519--.name: Hmm? I don't know what you mean. Now, let's have a look.

1226205419008525--.name: The samples you found are infused with dark energy, but... I'm at a loss for words.

1226205419008526--.name: It's like nothing I've ever sensed...

1226205419008528--.name: This is... no ordinary darkness. It belongs to an ancient evil. Perhaps one not seen since the time of the two goddesses.

1226205419008529--.name: Could it be remnants of the goddess of darkness?

1226205419008530--.name: Unfortunately, no. There is no aura of divinity to this dark energy.

1226205419008531--.name: I need to report our findings to the captain and the Lumiknights' high command immediately.

1226205419008532--.name: $MyPCName$, thank you for your help. Let's return to the ship.

1226205419008533--.name: It appears everyone has finished their investigations.

1226205419008534--.name: We should gather and discuss our discoveries.

1226205419008535--.name: I'm convening an officers' meeting. Everyone should join me in the briefing room. That includes you, $MyPCName$.

1226205419008536--.name: Everyone, follow me to the briefing room. That includes you, $MyPCName$.

1226205419008537--.name: First I want to thank you all for making this investigation your top priority, despite your other responsibilities.

1226205419008538--.name: Oh it was no trouble. $MyPCName$ did all the heavy-lifting.

1226205419008539--.name: That's right! My analysis of the Barrota ledger is nearly complete thanks to $MyPCName$'s efforts.

1226205419008540--.name: $male:He's,female:She's$ certainly proven $male:himself,female:herself$ to be a sleuth worthy of the Imperial Vanguard.

1226205419008541--.name: Yes, yes, $MyPCName$ was indispensable to my investigation as well. Now, we have important matters to discuss.

1226205419008542--.name: My findings thus far have left me deeply concerned.

1226205419008543--.name: That makes the two of us, Mason. I've had a pit in my stomach ever since all this began.

1226205419008544--.name: Let's begin by going over each faction's findings.

1226205419008545--.name: Condor, why don't you tell us what the Imperial Vanguard has learned?

1226205419008546--.name: Ahem. Allow me to direct your attention to this photograph.

1226205419008547--.name: We investigated the rumors of missing airships circulating Victoria Island with little to show for it, except ominous tales of an ancient foe, and this blurry picture of a weird-necked bird.

1226205419008548--.name: Uh... That's not like any bird I've ever seen. I think maybe you're looking at it upside down.

1226205419008549--.name: I'm not an idiot! I've looked at it from all angles, and this way makes the most sense. Look, you hold it right-side-up and it's a bird-monster. You turn it this way, and—

1226205419008551--.name: That's no bird! In fact, that looks like a—it can't be...

1226205419008552--.name: I suspect you've reached the same conclusion that I have.

1226205419008553--.name: We discovered traces of dark energy at the crash site. However, it was quite unlike the sort of darkness the Lumiknights generally encounter. Still, it felt familiar...

1226205419008554--.name: That menacing aura, combined with your own discoveries could very well mean... Well, I'll reserve judgment until everyone's had an opportunity to speak.

1226205419008555--.name: All right. Nairin, what was the result of the Green Hoods' investigation?

1226205419008556--.name: After a great deal of effort, $MyPCName$ unsealed the secret ledger of the Barrota Trading Company which we received from Solvay.

1226205419008557--.name: It seems the newly-appointed president of the company was skimming from trade deals with the alliance to resell highly controlled armaments. Infantry armor, lightweight alloys, a tremendous number of floatstones, and so on.

1226205419008558--.name: We haven't determined who the buyer was, but it's clear a great deal of military hardware was illegally traded. What's worse, several tons of the goods are missing. There's a good chance they were lost aboard the missing ships.

1226205419008559--.name: That explains the insane amount of effort Barrota's invested into scrambling their data transmissions across multiple communications arrays.

1226205419008560--.name: Of course, I had no trouble reassembling the data containing their trade routes. And I've learned something quite interesting.

1226205419008561--.name: A few of Barrota's airships have documented departures, but no record of ever arriving. More missing ships!

1226205419008562--.name: Between these and the vessels we already knew about, all our missing airships were at some point within the vicinity of Orbis... Sooo, I think we can rule out coincidence.

1226205419008564--.name: Wasn't Orbis that city that was obliterated during the War of Light and Darkness?

1226205419008565--.name: Oh, the city's still there, it's just uninhabitable. There's a crater at its heart that's still burning to this day.

1226205419008566--.name: In other words, there's no way pirates would have set up some kind of a base there to plunder passing ships. Unless they like watching their skin slough off like hot cheese, hehe.

1226205419008567--.name: But that's assuming our culprits are human... What if the beings attacking these ships were ones that thrive in fire?

1226205419008571--.name: Captain! I've just got word from our analysts that they've finished reconstructing the data from the black box!

1226205419008572--.name: Perhaps now we can finally get to the bottom of this.

1226205419008573--.name: I think we have all of the information we need.

1226205419008574--.name: Have them display the footage on the viewscreen!

1226205419008579--.name: They're processing the footage now, Captain.

1226205419008583--.name: That's it! No wonder they looked so familiar.

1226205419008584--.name: This explains the peculiarities I sensed within the darkness at the crash site.

1226205419008585--.name: It seems at long last we know the face of the enemy.

1226205419008586--.name: I believe we've learned all we need.

1226205419008587--.name: $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, using all of the data we've gathered thus far, construct a search profile and feed it to our scanners. If need be, we'll scour the world for the Crimson Balrogs.

1226205419008589--.name: The Crimson Balrogs can't hide for long.

1226205419008591--.name: Captain, we're getting radar pings. Dozens... no, hundreds of signals!

1226205419008594--.name: After all these years in hiding, why would they suddenly draw attention to themselves with a full-scale assault? I don't know what we're walking into down there, but we have an opportunity today to end a dire threat to this world.

1226205419008595--.name: How dare they threaten my homeland! Give me a ship, and I'll lay waste to them all!

1226205419008597--.name: Get a hold of yourself, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. We will meet this threat with a united front.

1226205419008598--.name: We have our mission. Prepare yourselves to engage the enemy.

1226205419008599--.name: We have our mission. Set a course for Perion, maximum speed!

1226205419008600--.name: Set a course for Perion, maximum speed!

1226205419008601--.name: You arrived in the nick of time. I'm in your debt.

1226205419008603--.name: Allow me to properly introduce myself. I'm $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$.

1226205419008604--.name: You have the gall to show your face here after all this time?!

1226205419008605--.name: It's been a while, $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$. I see you're just as fiery as always.

1226205419008606--.name: Where have you been? And why have you come back now? Is this some stunt to reclaim your lost glory?!

1226205419008607--.name: Why don't we listen to what he has to say...?

1226205419008608--.name: I understand everyone has a lot of questions. I promise I will do my best to answer them.

1226205419008610--.name: That would be me. I am Captain $npcName:11003582[gender:0]$, commander of the Sky Fortress. It seems you are one of $npcName:11003534[gender:0]$'s acquaintances...

1226205419008611--.name: $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ is the former captain of the Royal Knights. One day, out of the blue, he resigned his post and disappeared. I never expected to see him again.

1226205419008612--.name: Current circumstances aside, it's a pleasure to meet you.

1226205419008613--.name: Tell me, $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$, what do you know of the group that attacked Perion, and what were you doing there?

1226205419008614--.name: They call themselves the Crimson Balrogs. Once, they were the servants of Balrog himself. And as for why I was there... That's a bit of a story.

1226205419008615--.name: Why did the Crimson Balrogs attack Perion?

1226205419008616--.name: That is a complicated question. To answer it properly, I'll have to start at the beginning. First, allow me to dispel a common misconception. "Balrog" is not a proper name but rather a title. Simfernals are the species of demons to which the current Balrog and his ilk belong. They value strength above all else.

1226205419008618--.name: Since ancient days, it has been my family's duty to oppose the Balrog. My ancestors were hand-picked by the goddess of light to fight beside her and defend Maple World. Together they battled the immortal demon Infernog, the first Balrog. Unable to destroy Infernog, they drained his blood—the source of his power—and sealed him in another dimension.

1226205419008619--.name: They hid his blood away in Perion's holy mountain, and for a long time the world was peaceful. But after the two goddesses vanished, Infernog's son Beelzebog took up the mantle of Balrog and began wreaking havoc. Time and time again the Balrog laid siege to the world, and each time my ancestors defeated him.

1226205419008620--.name: For centuries the Crimson Balrogs, the order of Simfernals and lesser demons who serve the Balrog, obeyed without question. But each of Balrog's failures lessened their resolve. Eventually, they abandoned Balrog, and hatched a plan to restore their original master.

1226205419008621--.name: If the Crimson Balrogs are to summon Infernog to this world, they'll need his blood. They've searched for it for years without success, until now... I don't know how they found it, but they did. And that is why they attacked Perion.

1226205419008624--.name: What are your thoughts on Tristan's story?

1226205419008625--.name: It's... a lot to take in.

1226205419008626--.name: I'll say. I'm not sure I've ever heard someone talk so much in my life.

1226205419008627--.name: So the Crimson Balrogs went to Perion seeking Infernog's blood? Considering he was only sealed away with the aid of the goddess of light the last time around, we can't afford to let him return.

1226205419008628--.name: Yes, that's the long and short of it.

1226205419008630--.name: Now, can we move on, or are there any other questions?

1226205419008631--.name: I understand everything you've said so far, but there's one question you haven't answered.

1226205419008632--.name: That's right! What were you doing in Perion?

1226205419008633--.name: I was tracking the Crimson Balrogs. When I realized they were heading to Perion, I knew immediately what that meant.

1226205419008634--.name: But how did you know to track them in the first place?

1226205419008639--.name: His family has been fighting off the Balrog for centuries, and magical energies are like fingerprints. It's no surprise that in time they learned to sense his particular brand of evil.

1226205419008641--.name: I'd imagine that sensing Balrog's former servants was not a wholly different talent. Having encountered traces of their evil aura, I can tell you it's quite distinct.

1226205419008642--.name: Now that we've discussed the finer points of aura-tracing, can we please move on to the threat at hand? I was too late to stop the Crimson Balrogs' from recovering their master's blood. We have to stop them before they attempt to summon him!

1226205419008643--.name: Don't worry. We'll make the necessary preparations. The Sky Fortress and her crew are more than equipped to deal with any threat.

1226205419008644--.name: For we are the hand of the alliance, the invincible shield of the sky!
