1226205419008645--.name: $MyPCName$, there's a matter we must discuss with everyone.

1226205419008646--.name: I'll explain everything in the briefing room.

1226205419008647--.name: Ask the officers to meet us there.

1226205419008651--.name: Join me in the briefing room.

1226205419008653--.name: Join me in the briefing room.

1226205419008654--.name: Forgive me, my liege. I was carrying out an order from Madria.

1226205419008655--.name: No matter. Preparations for the unveiling of Madrakan are far more important than this meeting.

1226205419008656--.name: Grr...! Arrogant child, how dare you fail to heed your master's call? Black Mage... is this how you manage your subordinates?

1226205419008657--.name: You would presume to lecture me after being abandoned by your own followers?!

1226205419008658--.name: I've heard enough of your sniveling. You are pathetic.

1226205419008659--.name: It's no wonder his henchmen left him. Weak leaders don't inspire much confidence.

1226205419008660--.name: Why you insolent, feeble human! You dare insult a demon lord?! I am Beelzebog, the mighty Balrog!

1226205419008661--.name: Have you really come all this way just to defend what's left of your pride?

1226205419008662--.name: Or perhaps you came in the hopes I would put you out of your misery?

1226205419008664--.name: You're just as arrogant now as you were as the Mage of Light.

1226205419008665--.name: However... I did not come here to fight.

1226205419008666--.name: As much as it would please me to rend the flesh from your bones and tear you limb from limb, I came here to make a deal.

1226205419008680--.name: Ah, it seems you've managed to awaken the demon lord sleeping within that cowardly shell.

1227205319008725--.name: As much as it would please me to rend the flesh from your bones and tear you limb from limb, I came here to make a deal.

1227205319008726--.name: A deal? I admit I'm curious.

1227205319008727--.name: ...It is as you say. The Crimson Balrogs have forsaken me—both my own kin and those that serve them.

1227205319008728--.name: I'm well aware of your species' fascination with power. It's no surprise your minions would refuse to follow one who has been defeated even by mere adventurers.

1227205319008729--.name: I know it's not like they really have any other demon lords to serve, but I'm surprised it took them this long to leave you.

1227205319008731--.name: That's right! I see you are well informed.

1227205319008732--.name: We speak of Infernog, the Balrog of ancient days, and the demon that sired me.

1227205319008733--.name: Are you saying he's returned to this plane of existence?

1227205319008734--.name: No. If my father had escaped his prison, Maple World would already be in flames.

1227205319008735--.name: ...And my father would have ended me for my failures.

1227205319008736--.name: However, his return is near. Haven't you seen the signs?

1227205319008737--.name: Come to think of it, the Crimson Balrogs have been awfully busy lately. And not just expanding their territory.

1227205319008738--.name: It seems they've found a way to awaken the immortal demon lord.

1227205319008740--.name: So much for your plan, Black Mage. Between the alliance's shiny new plaything, and my father's inevitable encounter with her...

1227205319008741--.name: Do you really think you can prevent the light of destruction from being unleashed?

1227205319008743--.name: Well Beelzy, I'm sure you have a wonderful solution to the problem.

1227205319008745--.name: Black Mage, I have a plan to eliminate both of our mutual problems at once.

1227205319008746--.name: Together we can see to it that meddlesome ship is destroyed, and my father's return does not come to pass!

1227205319008747--.name: I am one of only two living souls who know the whereabouts of that which is required to restore Infernog.

1227205319008748--.name: My followers scramble about on nothing but desperate rumor. We can use this.

1227205319008749--.name: Hmm. That idea's not half bad. A few careful whispers here and there, and we can lead the Crimson Balrogs into a confrontation with the alliance's airship.

1227205319008750--.name: Against the might of the Crimson Balrogs, the defenses of their "Sky Fortress" will crumble.

1227205319008751--.name: Precisely! And when the alliance and those traitors have tired themselves out with battle, I will arrive to obliterate both!

1227205319008752--.name: With the might of the alliance broken and my father's return thwarted, you will have two less annoyances to contend with. And I... I will once more reign supreme as lord of the Simfernals!

1227205319008753--.name: Gahaha! This is the only course, Black Mage. If Infernog is restored, he will attack Maple World as before... When he descends on Tria, what do you think will happen to the Empress?

1227205319008754--.name: If Infernog hurts Ereve... None of us will be safe.

1227205319008755--.name: None of us will escape the light of destruction! This arrangement will save us that fate.

1227205319008757--.name: This is your idea of a fair exchange?

1227205319008758--.name: The return of the immortal demon lord is your problem and yours alone.

1227205319008759--.name: If Infernog is allowed to interfere with my plan, that will spell the immediate extinction of your species.

1227205319008760--.name: The only reason any of you still live is because I've ignored your presence. You are insects crawling in the dirt. Insignificant.

1227205319008761--.name: But if you insist on making yourself a nuisance, then perhaps it's time I exterminated every last one of your kin—starting with you.

1226205419008708--.name: If you halt my father's return... I will give you my Lapenta Shard...

1226205419008709--.name: It may be but a single fragment of the Lapentas entrusted to the divine beasts, but even you cannot resist its power...

1226205419008710--.name: I'm the only one who knows where the shard is hidden. If you kill me, you'll get nothing!

1226205419008711--.name: Ahaha... The great and terrible Balrog begging for his life. Now there's a novel sight. How amusing.

1226205419008712--.name: Very well. I will accept your tribute.

1226205419008713--.name: Bella, let's make a game of it. Search for our friend's hidden Lapenta Shard. If you find it before our work is done, there'll be no more reason to keep him alive.

1226205419008715--.name: Oh Beelzy, I'm jealous of how the Black Mage dotes on you. Hehe.

1226205419008716--.name: <font color="#909090">(Balrog glares, his eyes full of murderous rage.)</font>

1226205419008717--.name: My liege, should I ask Turka to handle this?

1226205419008718--.name: No. Turka has lost my faith.

1226205419008719--.name: Corrupting Katvan was not part of my plan. It was Turka's carelessness that allowed the "Sky Fortress" to fall into the hands of the alliance.

1226205419008720--.name: Bella, I'll leave you to Balrog's care for a while. You will carry out his plan.

1226205419008721--.name: The destruction of the Sky Fortress should prove an amusing diversion. And while you're clipping their wings, make sure they come to regret ever taking to the skies.

1226205419008722--.name: Yes, Black Mage. It will be as you command.

0112150219008763--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$, we have news. Please join us in the $map:52010052$.

0112150219008765--.name: What are you trying to say?

0112150219008766--.name: Thank you all for joining me. Our analysts have been tracking the movement of the Crimson Balrogs and they believe they are closing in on the site where our foe intends to restore Infernog.

0112150219008767--.name: It's time we discussed our plan to infiltrate their stronghold and recover Infernog's blood.

0112150219008769--.name: My apologies, Captain, but I have urgent news.

0112150219008771--.name: Err... I know you're new here, but traditionally the captain leads the briefings.

0112150219008772--.name: What now, Tristan? Not content with your little role on our task force? Maybe it's a promotion you're after. Always had to be the center of attention. I know, why don't you take my job?

0112150219008773--.name: You know, your insecurity is kind of cute. You remind me of my grandpa.

0112150219008775--.name: It's time we talked about contingency plans.

0112150219008776--.name: Without the goddess of light to seal him away again, it will be very difficult to dispatch Infernog. We'll need to find another way to contain him or drive him from Maple World. Otherwise, the world as we know it is over.

0112150219008777--.name: What did you have in mind?

0112150219008778--.name: Why are we talking about contingency plans? I thought the whole point of this meeting was to stop him from being released in the first place?

0112150219008779--.name: That's just it. I told you before that I have the ability to sense Balrog and his kin. Well, I've just sensed an entirely new aura. Something unmistakable.

0112150219008780--.name: Are you saying what I think you are?

0112150219008783--.name: The immortal demon lord $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ has returned.

0112150219008786--.name: Okay fine, so the immortal demon guy is back... What does that mean for us?

0112150219008787--.name: I suppose... the end of all things?

0112150219008788--.name: The end of... what? Are you saying Maple World is doomed?!

0112150219008789--.name: Everyone please calm down! We can't give into fear.

0112150219008790--.name: The situation is grim, I admit. But it's not like we have to face Infernog at full strength. Did I forget to mention that I hid some of his blood away?

0112150219008791--.name: The situation is grim, I admit. But it's not like we have to face Infernog at full strength. Did I forget to mention that I hid some of his blood away?

0112150219008794--.name: Calm down Nainai, or your face might get stuck that way.

0112150219008795--.name: Bahaha! I have to admit, Tristan, I've always admired your resourcefulness.

0112155619008805--.name: I think we're getting off topic here...

0112155619008807--.name: You.. hid some of his blood? How did you even get your hands on that?

0112160419008808--.name: And more importantly, how could the Crimson Balrogs have awakened $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$? You yourself said they needed his blood to revive him.

0112150219008797--.name: Uh, well... It went something like this...

0112182719008811--.name: As I mentioned earlier, just before Infernog was sealed away, he was weakened through the draining of his blood. In an effort to ensure that Infernog would never return to this world, his shed blood was gathered up and stored in two separate locations.

0115104519008818--.name: One of which was a shrine hidden in the holy mountains of $map:02000051$, and the other—

0115104519008820--.name: Well I suppose it no longer matters.

0112182719008812--.name: In any case, during their raid on Perion, the Crimson Balrogs managed to secure half of Infernog's blood. But the rest resides in me. I still don't know how they found it—the sites where the blood was stored were chosen because their holy nature masked any traceable aura emanating from the blood.

0112182719008814--.name: I wish I did, but there are more important things to discuss!

0112182719008815--.name: There are more important matters to discuss!

0112182719008816--.name: $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ has awakened, but he's not at his full strength. This presents us with a unique opportunity.

0115104519008821--.name: Not at his full strength? What exactly do you mean by that?

0115104519008822--.name: It's just as I said. His blood is his power. That was part of the genius of hiding it in multiple locations...

0115104519008824--.name: Maybe just give us the short version? I can see $MyPCName$'s eyes glazing over.

0115104519008826--.name: If you're getting tired, I can think of a few ways to keep you awake.

0115104519008829--.name: The Crimson Balrogs recovered enough of Infernog's blood to summon him to this world, but without the rest he's only at half strength.

0115104519008830--.name: Which mean things are not as dire as they seem.

0115111619008836--.name: In any case, as long as half of $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s power is stored safely inside me, he's half the threat he was before.

0112182719008817--.name: This may be the best opportunity we'll have to stop the immortal demon lord once and for all!

0115105319008831--.name: Hahaha! I never imagined that I might be the one to see my family's ancient duty brought to completion.

0115105319008832--.name: I will defeat $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ with my own two hands!

0115105319008833--.name: I hate to be a downer, but didn't you say he was un-killable?

0115105319008834--.name: If he was at full strength, that would be the case. But I believe in his current state, the demon can be slain.

0115112519008843--.name: In fact, I'm certain of it!

0115105319008835--.name: There's no more time to waste! Whatever the plan was before, it's gone out the window. The time to strike is now!

0115111619008838--.name: Captain $npcName:11003533[gender:0]$, instruct your crew to set a course. Now is the time to wipe $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s evil from this world!

0115111619008840--.name: What...? What are you saying? Is it your plan to let $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ roam freely? He will burn our cities to ash!

0115111619008841--.name: That's not what I'm saying at all. We will defeat $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$.

0115111619008842--.name: However, rushing heedlessly into battle will only end in unnecessary casualties. We need a plan.

0115134319008844--.name: $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$, I understand that $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ is vulnerable now. But that's about all we really know about him. We need a strategy.

0115134319008845--.name: Do you know where $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ is now?

0115134319008847--.name: Can you tell us what abilities $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ possesses, or the scale of his current powers?

0115134319008849--.name: We don't know where $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ is, his weaknesses, even the size of his forces. This puts us at a tremendous disadvantage.

0115134319008850--.name: Don't you think I want to do everything in my power to stop Infernog before he hurts anyone? The lives of every single person on this vessel are in my hands.

0115134319008851--.name: I will not order them to run blindly to their deaths, especially when there is no guarantee our mission will succeed. If $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ has returned in a weakened state, as you say, then our best course of action is to strike when we are fully prepared.

0115134319008853--.name: $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$, I hope you understand. If this is, in fact, the best opportunity we'll ever get to defeat $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$, then we can't afford to throw it away.

0115134319008854--.name: The closest thing to a guarantee we'll get is making sure we're completely prepared to face Infernog.

0115134319008855--.name: Our first step is information-gathering, anything we can use in the battle against $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$. His weaknesses, his capabilities, and so on.

0115134319008856--.name: Aye captain! The Green Hoods will analyze all the data we've gathered on the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$ to see what we can infer about $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s characteristics.

0115134319008857--.name: Of course, there'll be a large margin of error, but it's better than nothing.

0115134319008858--.name: Now is not the time for analysis...

0115134319008860--.name: Dark Wind will be focusing its efforts on reviewing the intelligence we've gathered so far to determine where $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ might be hiding.

0115134319008861--.name: Every moment we wait, innocent lives are in danger!

0115134319008862--.name: Very well, $npcName:11003535$. $npcName:11003786[gender:0]$, what about the Lumiknights?

0115134319008863--.name: We will analyze any and all traces of $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ and his minions to see if we can identify any weaknesses he may possess.

0115134319008866--.name: I will count on the Imperial Vanguard and their brothers in the Royal Guard to once again safeguard $map:02000001$ and the surrounding areas. As we don't know where Infernog might strike, it's imperative we protect the empress.

0115134319008867--.name: Oh—right! Yes, the vanguard will see to it that $map:02000001$ is safe from harm!

0115134319008868--.name: This is your plan? This is how you'll stop Infernog before his reign of destruction begins? I can see now that coming here was a mistake from the start.

0115212719008872--.name: Was Tristan always so impatient? Usually the hotheaded one—

0115212719008874--.name: Right, it's... No I'm not! Why you little—

0115212719008875--.name: I wonder... Tristan said he imbibed some of Infernog's blood, and I've begun to sense the same kind of darkness emanating from him as we found at the crashed airship.

0115212719008877--.name: I don't know anything for certain, besides that I felt it. But it's possible that Infernog's blood is influencing Tristan's behavior.

0115212719008880--.name: You don't think he's going to do something reckless, do you? You know, like something more reckless than drinking the blood of an immortal demon without knowing what would happen...

0115212719008882--.name: Sure he was a little short-tempered, but he didn't seem possessed or anything.

0115212719008883--.name: How do you know, have you met many people possessed by demons?!

0122200419009511--.name: Maybe that's why he was in such a hurry to find Infernog—to deliver the rest of his blood!

0115212719008884--.name: Pull yourself together, Nairin! This is no time for wild speculation.

0115212719008885--.name: Pull yourself together, Nairin! This is no time for wild speculation.

0115212719008886--.name: I may not be Tristan's biggest fan, but I could never see him intentionally putting Maple World in jeopardy.

0115212719008887--.name: Nevertheless, it's important we keep him from doing anything foolish. Nairin, where is Tristan now?

0115212719008888--.name:
Just a moment.
<font color="#909090">(Nairin murmurs fervently into her earpiece, nodding occasionally.)</font>

0115212719008890--.name: Bad news, Captain. I just heard from the hangar deck. Tristan boarded a transport that left a few minutes ago. They're already out of radio distance.

0115212719008894--.name: By the time we arrive, he may be long gone. We need to focus on where he's going, not where he went.

0115212719008895--.name: And we should do it quickly. Considering that half of Infernog's power, and the key to his immortality currently rests within Tristan...

0115212719008896--.name: Then protecting Tristan is the key to protecting Maple World.

0115212719008898--.name: No doubt Tristan thinks he's doing what's best for Maple World.

0115212719008899--.name: But if, as it seems, Infernog's Blood is influencing his thinking, then he endangers us all.

0115212719008900--.name: Considering all the variables, where might he go?

0115212719008902--.name: He sounded pretty fired up to have a go at Infernog. So maybe he went... wherever Infernog's lair is?

0115212719008903--.name: But even Tristan doesn't know where that is. Well, there is one thing we do know. The Crimson Balrogs will be searching for him.

0115212719008904--.name: Which means that time is a factor.

0115212719008905--.name: Well then Mr. Know-it-All, how do we find him? Oh! Hey $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, can't you just, fire up that computer of yours?

0115212719008906--.name: Are you kidding? My predictive algorithm doesn't work without data! And as for the ships' instruments, it's a lot easier to track a giant swarm of Simfernals in the sky than one man on the ground.

0115212719008907--.name: Well... Technically we don't have to find Tristan if we find the Crimson Balrogs, heh.

0115212719008908--.name: That's actually quite clever. $npcName:11003818$ is inside $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$'s body, and $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ can surely sense it. So we can track $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ by tracking the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$.

0115212719008911--.name: I suppose for now that's the best option available to us. We track the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$</font>, then. But hear me, there will be no more room for missteps. We must all work in concert. Nairin, give the order. All hands to their stations!

0116134519008819--.name: I updated our data profile for the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$ in the computer and ran it through the ship's scanners.

0116134519008820--.name: The results are coming back now. Lets see... I'm getting radar matches from all over Maple World, but they're scattered. There's a pretty strong hit coming from this region over here.

0116134519008821--.name: I don't know if you'll find anything there, but it's the best lead we have right now.

0116134519008823--.name: A cave in the mountains near Orbis.

0122204719009512--.name: It'll be a little toasty in there but you should be all right without protective gear. Here, take this camera and document anything that might help our search.

0116134519008826--.name: All right! I've reserved a transport for you. Head to the hangar deck.

0116134519008827--.name: $MyPCName$, did you find anything useful at the $map:52010060$?

0116134519008830--.name: <font color="#909090">(You show her the picture you took at the $map:52010060$.)</font>

0116134519008832--.name: I found them on a wall in the $map:52010060$.

0116134519008833--.name: The way these claw markings are arranged, it almost seems like a pattern... This could be a written language.

0116134519008834--.name: This could be extremely important! Thank you, $MyPCName$.

0116134519008835--.name: I'll upload the image to my tablet and run it through my pictographic analysis program.

0116134519008838--.name: Err... "In the place where hellfire burns, our dark master will return... Our reign of destruction is nigh."

0116134519008839--.name: ...Those scratch mark really form complete sentences?

0116134519008840--.name: Hehe, of course not! But that's what's so great about my Advanced Linguistic Analysis Algorithm.

0116134519008841--.name: The algorithm visually compares input data against a library of ancient hieroglyphics and other symbols from pictograph-based languages whose meanings are known, then generates an iterative series of possible translations, which are automatically sorted based on the translations' coherency. Cool, right?

0116163619008861--.name: "Our dark master" has to refer to $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$, right?

0116163619008862--.name: So "In the place where hellfire burns" must refer to where $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$</font> returned!

0116163619008863--.name: I thought that was pretty clear, yeah.

0116163619008864--.name: Good work, $MyPCName$. This is an important clue!

0116163619008865--.name: Is it though? Where is "the place where hellfire burns?"

0116163619008867--.name: Let's have a look at the map...

0116163619008868--.name: It's got to be somewhere extremely hot, but it's hard to say much beyond that...

0116163619008869--.name: I guess I could make a list of the hottest regions throughout Maple World...

0116163619008870--.name: Isn't that going to be a really big list?

0116163619008871--.name: Well, yes but... I'm sure I can narrow it down somehow.

0116163619008872--.name: I could try checking any data we have on Crimson Balrog movements against that list and see what happens.

0116163619008873--.name: See what happens?! You're not going to get anywhere staring at that stupid monitor all day!

0116163619008875--.name: Hey cadet, why don't you come over here and we can get down to some real investigating!

0116163619008876--.name: So we know $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ appeared somewhere hot, and basically nothing else, right?

0116163619008877--.name: Your listening skills are top notch.

0116163619008878--.name: Bahaha! A true guardsman is always alert.

0116163619008879--.name: Those who've never actually been in the field tend to get all hung up over data, and overestimate its usefulness.

0116163619008881--.name: Oh no, I wasn't talking about anyone here... I was just, uh, speaking generally.

0116163619008883--.name: Don't worry about her. A few balloons and a slice of cake, she'll forget all about this. Now as I was saying, the only way we're going to learn anything useful is to get out into the field and investigate!

0116163619008884--.name: When I was captain of the Royal Guard, I had two soldiers in particular who really loved gossip. $npcName:11000157[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11000158[gender:0]$. These days you'll find them standing guard on the road to $map:02000001$, which is highly trafficked. Why don't you go see if they've heard anything that can help us?

0116163619008886--.name: Sigh. Lucky for you I keep photos of all of my informants secure in my "face book" here. All right, so this is $npcName:11000157[gender:0]$...

0116163619008887--.name: And this guy is $npcName:11000158[gender:0]$. Got it?

0116163619008888--.name: Did you... just show me the same photo twice?

0116163619008890--.name: They look nothing alike! Look, see? $npcName:11000157[gender:0]$</font> has slanty eyebrows.

0116163619008893--.name: Fine, if you want to do things the hard way. But time is of the essence, so get a move on!

0116134519008850--.name: Didn't I just send you on a transport to Tria? What are you doing back here?!

0116200019008895--.name: Don't tell me you came back empty-handed?

0116200019008896--.name: Well, apparently there's this inexplicably hot cave in Orbis full of an endless supply of lava.

0116200019008897--.name: Wow. Lairs don't get much more villainous than that. Good work! Let's tell the captain right now and check it out!

0116200019008899--.name: Can it wait? We've got some urgent heroism to get to.

0116214119008951--.name: You can't just waltz into Orbis.

0116200019008901--.name: Did you forget that it's basically an uninhabitable hellscape?

0116200019008902--.name: We can't just go in there without a plan. We need to make sure anyone we send can survive in the environment.

0116200019008903--.name: We need to send in our best operative. Of course, we'll have to give them special training.

0116200019008904--.name: Who do you mean, and what kind of training?

0116205019008910--.name: I understand your desire to rush off to Orbis and be the hero, but you can't just run in blind.

0116214119008952--.name: I won't have my little kitten hurting $male:himself,female:herself$ by going to Orbis unprepared.

0116205019008911--.name: So I came up with a special training regimen for you! Ta-da!

0116205019008912--.name: I appreciate your concern, but I don't think that's necessary.

0116205019008913--.name: You're going to feel really silly for saying that if you pass out from the heat and fall into a pool of molten lava. I'm not sure there will be anything to fish up for your funeral!

0116205019008914--.name: Actually, a little preparation never hurt anybody.

0116205019008915--.name: Good choice! If time weren't a factor, I would put you through a whole gauntlet of tests... But considering the circumstances, I've had to develop a much more accelerated lesson plan.

0116205019008916--.name: What do you want me to do?

0116205019008917--.name: You're going to skip on over to $map:02000268$ to battle monsters while also not dying of heat exhaustion! I don't really know how hot Orbis is going to be, but we have to do something to prepare you for what's ahead.

0116205019008918--.name: If you can manage to fight in those conditions, then you probably won't collapse the moment you arrive in Orbis. It won't be easy, but if anyone can beat the heat it's you, hot stuff!

0116205019008919--.name: Now is no time for rest! Come back alive after your training, and I'll nurse you back to health.

0116205019008920--.name: You made it back safe! Are you hurt?

0116205019008922--.name: Oh, poor dear!  Let me see... You're right, you do feel hot!

0116205019008924--.name: Oh my, your face is all red. $MyPCName$, did you push yourself too hard?

0116205019008927--.name: Well, it looks like you don't have any serious external injuries. That makes me a little less nervous about you going to Orbis.

0116205019008928--.name: Oh, before we report to the captain, $npcName:11003537[gender:0]$ wants to see you.

0116205019008930--.name: I'm not sure, but he's been staring at us for a while, so he must want something.

0116212919008931--.name: I've been waiting for you. You're later than I'd like.

0117125219008980--.name: I heard Orbis was our top suspect for the site of $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ return to this world. Given all we know, it would be no surprise.

0117125219008982--.name: Funny, the same thought occurred to me.

0117125219008983--.name: In any case, it seems more and more that all roads lead to the ever-burning land of Orbis.

0117125219008984--.name: I sense you've already made up your mind about going there, no matter the danger.

0117125219008986--.name: I've prepared something to aid you. Come a little closer.

0117125219008987--.name: I'm pretty good right here, actually.

0117125219008988--.name: Don't worry. I'm not going to teleport you off somewhere strange.

0117125219008991--.name: Now close your eyes, and open your mind.

0117125219008992--.name: <font color="#909090">(Reluctantly, you close your eyes and focus your thoughts.)</font>

0117125219008994--.name: <font color="#909090">(Did he just... blow in your ear?)</font>

0117125219008996--.name: I placed a 6th-level warding spell on you. It's a secret Lumiknight trick. I believe it should see you mostly un-singed by the flames of Orbis.

0117125219008997--.name: Oh, no need to thank me.

0117125219008999--.name: Your safe return will be thanks enough.

0117125219009000--.name: Now, I believe you should be ready. You may go ahead and report to the captain.

0117125219009001--.name: The other officers have brought me up to speed.

0117125219009002--.name: Of course $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ had to pick Orbis as the place to make his return. This isn't good.

0117125219009003--.name: The terrain in Orbis is too treacherous for the Sky Fortress to land, and the aircraft aboard cannot withstand the intense heat of Orbis's surface.

0117125219009004--.name: However... We should be able to retrofit an escape pod for you, and guide you in remotely. $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, please explain the details.

0117125219009005--.name: Right! Well, they only seat one, but our escape pods are built to withstand nearly anything. If we reinforce the hull plating, it should be able to survive landing on Orbis.

0117125219009007--.name: The craft's specs are certainly up for the challenge! It's built with the same alloy as Sky Fortress, and it's crazy fast.

0117125219009008--.name: All that to say, delivering you to Orbis in one piece should be a piece of cake.

0117125219009009--.name: $MyPCName$, I'm afraid with the pressing matter of time, this is our only option.

0117125219009010--.name: As the escape pod will only hold one person, that individual must be our most capable crewman.

0117130119009027--.name: Therefore, I'm entrusting this mission to you.

0117125219009011--.name: I'm sorry to burden you with this task but I'm confident that with $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$'s training and Mason's protective charm, you will be able to complete this mission and return to us.

0117125219009012--.name: Considering the alternatives, I feel you are the best person for the job.

0117125219009014--.name: You're the captain. You give me an order and I'll follow it.

0117125219009016--.name: Thank you. Then, are you ready?

0117125219009017--.name: I'm ready to go right now!

0117125219009018--.name: Excellent. $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, what's the status of the pod's remote piloting systems?

0117125219009020--.name: Very well. $MyPCName$, the retrofit should be completed in short order. Board the escape pod and prepare for launch!

0117125219009023--.name: I never expected things to go this way... I'm sorry.

0117125219009025--.name: I took on the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$, but they were relentless. They knew $npcName:11003818$ was inside me. They captured me and brought me here to their master.

0830162219009538-FameContents_EP1_02-.name: Aghh... I never imagined I'd see you here.

0117140119009028--.name: Aghh... I never imagined I'd see you here.

0117140119009029--.name:
<font color="#909090">(Tristan breaks into a coughing fit.)</font>
Ugh. I'm sorry, I never should've come here.

0117140119009030--.name: While $npcName:11003818$ was inside my body, I wasn't thinking clearly. All of the rage bubbling up inside me...

0117140119009032--.name: I was so sure that what I was doing was right. I never questioned it for a moment.

0117140119009033--.name: I knew that every moment we wasted put innocent lives in jeopardy. I knew that I could defeat Infernog! I knew I could save this world!

0117140119009035--.name: So much for my so-called destiny.

0117140119009036--.name: I've failed them all. Every single one of my ancestors. So many generations preparing for exactly this day. Today I have ruined their legacy.

0117140119009037--.name: Pull yourself together! It's not over yet. We just need a new plan to stop Infernog.

0117140119009041--.name: It's too late. Infernog has reclaimed the blood that was within me. Before long, he will have recovered his full strength. He can no longer be killed, and the goddess of light isn't here to save us.

0117140119009042--.name: It's all my fault... The end of everything...

0117151719009043--.name: I can't believe I brought the blood straight to them.

0117151719009044--.name: Well let's go and get it back!

0117151719009045--.name: It's too late. $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s already absorbed it into his body. There's no stopping him now. He will rain chaos down upon this world like nothing you've ever imagined.

0117151719009046--.name: <font color="#909090">(No... This can't really be the end, can it? All your friends, all the helpless people counting on you... You can't let them down. There's got to be some way to stop $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$!)</font>

0117151719009047--.name: I ruined everything. It's all my fault.

0117151719009049--.name: Ha... Hahaha! That man is one of the hardest-headed people I've ever met, but from time to time he says something that makes sense.

0117151719009050--.name: Yes, we might be able to stop him.

0117151719009053--.name: It won't be easy, but yes, I think it can be done.

0117151719009054--.name: I realized something after having Infernog's thoughts rolling around my head.

0117151719009056--.name: $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ may be immortal, but that doesn't make him unstoppable.

0117151719009058--.name: We have been so focused on killing $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ that we haven't really thought about anything else. Sure he's immortal, but we don't have to kill him to prevent him from destroying this world.

0117151719009059--.name: The goddess of light isn't here to seal him away in another dimension, true. But surely there's another way to send Infernog somewhere he will never hurt anyone.

0117151719009061--.name: All we need is the right weapon!

0117154419009062--.name: Thank you for braving the ruins of Orbis. $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ is still alive due to your actions.

0117154419009063--.name: I wouldn't have been able to get there without everyone's help.

0117154419009065--.name: No critical physical injuries, but he definitely needs to recover from his ordeal. He's resting in the infirmary right now.

0117181919009067--.name: Indeed. Now, we must discuss our plan for dealing with Infernog's threat. If he is truly immortal once more, then difficult choices must be made. Our first step is to retrieve the empress, and other city leaders, and deliver them to a secure location. Next, we must order a global withdrawal of the alliance's forces to safeguard major population centers.

0117181919009068--.name: Captain, when you said you had a solution, scooping up the royal household and going into hiding wasn't what I had in mind. If we run away what happens to the rest of Maple World?! There's got to be a way to stop Infernog!

0117181919009069--.name: We need to face the reality that we may not be able to stop Infernog in the short term. At least, not before he's wrought untold destruction upon this world. If we don't prepare ourselves for the worst, then—

0117181919009070--.name: But Captain, you're forgetting about our secret weapon, the Ultra-High-Density Magitron Accelerator Cannon! "UHDMAC" for short. Of course, most of us just call it "the Big Gun."

0117181919009071--.name: We cannot rely upon the cannon to solve all our problems, the—

0117181919009072--.name: But the Big Gun has the juice! The cannon breaks down metric tons of magic stones into an excited stream of magitrons—magically charged particles—and then fires them as a focused beam. A fully charged shot can release the equivalent of up to 500 gigajoules of energy.

0117181919009073--.name: That's plenty of power to deal with Infernog! In fact, if the gun were powered electrically, we'd need a battery roughly the size of the Sky Fortress. So, we cut out the middle-man and feed magic stones into a reactor like it's an old-fashioned coal train.

0117181919009074--.name: The only drawback is it takes time to charge, and afterwards we've got to let the gun cool down, and purge the reactor. But honestly, a gun like this you only need to fire once.

0117181919009075--.name: Of course we could improve on all that with enough time and budget. I'd love to have the cannon in a more presentable state before we unveil it to the world, but unfortunately there's no time for that.

0117181919009076--.name: Thank you Nairin, that will suffice.

0117181919009077--.name: Nairin, enough! Yes, it's true in theory that the cannon could blast $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ with enough force to launch him into space. But the weapon isn't ready. We'd need to make numerous modifications just to get it operational!

0117181919009078--.name: And even so, a shot like that is one in a million. If we fire and miss, the consequences could be catastrophic. That's not a risk I'm prepared to take. Even with a more competent—

0117181919009079--.name: I can make the shot, Captain! I can handle the calculations. And the Big Gun's nearly finished! It would only take a few tweaks to get it up to the task! One shot and we'll send $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ sailing through the void for a thousand years! With any luck, he'll end up crashing into the center of a distant star.

0117181919009080--.name: If that's the case, then what are we waiting for? Let's hook up this cannon and take down Infernog!

0117181919009081--.name: Frankly, I'm not sure this crew is up to the challenge. Each of you possess tremendous abilities, but we have continually allowed our flaws to impede our duty. We've wasted time bickering, investigated thin leads, and failed to anticipate the enemy's moves. Our inability to act as a cohesive unit has placed all of Maple World in jeopardy.

0117181919009082--.name: Captain, that's not fair! Yes, things have gone wrong, but what you're suggesting is the same as giving up! You yourself said it's our duty to defend this world from harm, not a select few. If we have a chance to save everyone, then we've got to take it, no matter how hard it is!

0117181919009083--.name:
We must be practical. If we use the cannon, there is no margin for error. If Sky Fortress falls, so too does Maple World. We must marshal our forces and prepare a foolproof plan to defeat Infernog. And though many will perish, civilization will...
<FONT color='#909090'>(Veliche closes her eyes and rests her face in her palm.)</font>

0117181919009084--.name: No... The cost is too great. Nairin, tell the bridge to set a course for Revoldic Dam! Our number one priority is the cannon's completion. But hear me, there can be no mistakes, no distractions! The fate of this world depends upon on each of you working in concert to get the job done. Prepare to disembark!

0118212219009299--.name: The captain's right. I haven't been as focused on the mission as I should've been. And don't get me started on everyone else... But now it has my full attention! No more wasting time.

0118212219009300--.name: Oh, $MyPCName$, this is your first time here since our emergency launch, right?

0118212219009302--.name: Since the Rooks' attack, we've beefed up security, and started using the facility as a place to test new technologies and potential upgrades for the Sky Fortress. We couldn't let this awesome base go to waste!

0118212219009303--.name: What's the status of the Ultra-High... um... the Big Gun?

0118212219009304--.name: The cannon is virtually complete, but there's work to be done on energy output management.

0118212219009305--.name: The plan was to run data simulations using a variety of power sources and firing conditions to determine the optimal operating parameters for the weapon. But we've had to switch to a more expedited plan.

0118212219009307--.name: Overkill is what it is! Basically, we'll be using a magiphobic ore to line the barrel of the cannon to focus the energy and prevent leakage. This will allow us to fire the weapon uncalibrated without the gun, uh, exploding.

0118212219009308--.name: We're actually running a little short on ore at the moment. I could really use your help, if you're not too busy.

0118212219009309--.name: The crystals form almost exclusively in $map:02000104$, near $map:02000076$. I'd like you to gather several more loads. In the meantime, I'll work out how to process them.

0118212219009311--.name: Thank you, $MyPCName$. I will contact the Sky Fortress and arrange a transport for you.

0118212219009312--.name: Did you bring me ore samples from $map:02000104$?

0118212219009314--.name: Great! I think this should be enough.

0118212219009315--.name: By the way, I worked out a good way to separate the usable ore from the surrounding rock. Once it's been processed, $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ can integrate it into the upgraded cannon components.

0118212219009316--.name: $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$? I thought you were the technical one.

0118212219009317--.name: When it comes to software and tactics, I'm the best on the ship! But... I'm embarrassed to say that $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ has more experience when it comes to weapons. In any case, would you mind delivering that extra ore to her? I've got more work to do here.

0118212219009319--.name: Thanks, $MyPCName$! $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$ is just around the corner.

0118212219009320--.name: Oh! Just the $male:man,female:woman$ I wanted to see!

0118212219009321--.name: I knew it was destiny that brought us together, but this is just serendipitous timing! I've got a delicate situation here I'd really like you to take a look at...

0118212219009322--.name: Keep your pants on lady, I've got your extra ore right here.

0118212219009323--.name: You're sweet, sugar, but the ore is the problem. I'm supposed to be lining these panels with the ore sitting over there, but it hasn't even been processed! Nainai left me with this ridiculous manifesto on metallurgy and told me to have the mechanics take care of it, but they're all on their lunch break!

0118212219009324--.name: Anyways, I'm doing the best I can with all the sciencey stuff, but I've been having a little trouble with, uh... accidentally breaking everything.

0118212219009325--.name: So what exactly did you want me to do?

0118212219009326--.name: Listen, as hard as it is to believe, I'm starting to get uncomfortable with all these mechanics gawping at me. You're good with technical stuff, right?

0118212219009327--.name: Surely there's something I can do to persuade you to help poor little me?

0118212219009328--.name: All right, I'll help. Since the fate of the world is at stake.

0118212219009329--.name: Wonderful! Here's Nairin's instruction sheet. All you need to do is process that ore into something I can actually use.

0118212219009330--.name: I don't think you've quite finished processing that ore...

0118212219009332--.name: Nice work! I'm a lucky girl to have such a well-endowed friend. You know, brains-wise.

0118212219009333--.name: Glad I could help. What happens next?

0118212219009334--.name: Next I use the processed ore to line the interior panels of the cannon barrel, and have my friends here install them in the cannon—their break's up any minute now. Hey, $MyPCName$, do you think we could keep your helping me out our little secret?

0118212219009336--.name: Hehe, thanks! I promise I'll make it up to you later. Condor's been staring over here a while. Maybe you should see if he needs something?

0118212219009337--.name: It's time to get to work, cadet.

0118212219009338--.name: See those electronic components in the cargo containers over there?

0118212219009341--.name: I'll take care of it right now!

0118212219009343--.name: I, uh, may or may not have pulled something. Besides, carrying heavy objects is best left to youngsters like yourself.

0118212219009344--.name: You don't have to carry it very far. If you just deliver it to the loading platform, one of our technicians will secure it to a crane for transport.

0118212219009346--.name: Good. Come back when you've finished.

0118212219009347--.name: What are you waiting for? Those containers aren't going to move themselves.

0118212219009348--.name: Ah, good job. I was supervising your work from here.

0118212219009349--.name: Technology sure is a marvel. Just secure a container to the chain on the crane arm, and away they go!

0118212219009350--.name: Yeah. If only we could automate the whole carrying-heavy-things part.

0118212219009351--.name: I know! Imagine if those heavy containers could just carry themselves.

0118212219009352--.name: Hmm... $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, couldn't somebody whip up some kind of robot for that?

0118212219009353--.name: All finished components need to be inspected by a real human being at least once. If we automated everything without any kind of quality control, our secret weapon would be more likely to blow us up than our foes!

0118212219009354--.name: What did the captain just tell us about cutting corners?

0118212219009355--.name: And by the way, did I just see $MyPCName$ moving the cargo you said you'd take care of?

0118212219009357--.name: <font color="#909090">(Maybe it's time to see if anyone else needs your help...)</font>

0118212219009358--.name: Huh? What's that $MyPCName$? You want to hear about my time in the Royal Guard?

0118212219009360--.name: Sorry $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, I've got some things to discuss with $MyPCName$. We'll talk later. Bye!

0118212219009362--.name: Ugh... That girl is going to drive me to an early grave.  Anyways, thanks for the assist.

0118212219009363--.name: Are you okay? Maybe you should lie down.

0118212219009364--.name: No... I'm fine... Why don't  you go see if Mason needs anything?

0118212219009365--.name: This should be a safe distance...

0118212219009366--.name: Even with my fellow templars at my side, it would be good to have someone I know can keep this power in check...

0118212219009368--.name: Ah, $MyPCName$? Did you sense the gravity of my current predicament? Perhaps you have a sixth sense.

0118212219009370--.name: You'll recall that $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$ said the UHDMAC is fueled by vast quantities of magic stones, yes?

0118212219009371--.name: What you might not know is that those stones are actually filled with dark magic. The Lumiknights stockpiled and magically sealed the stones to prevent their darkness from leeching out into the world and endangering people.

0118212219009372--.name: To unleash their power as fuel for our weapon, a high-ranking templar is required to unseal them.

0118212219009377--.name: Removing the magical seal isn't complicated, but I will have to precisely control the flow of dark energy during the unsealing process. Otherwise, this base will be replaced by a smoldering crater that goes on for miles.

0118212219009378--.name: While I'm unsealing the stones, my body will become a conduit for the darkness. If anything goes wrong, someone must be prepared to "shut off the tap," as they say. Thankfully, I know just the person.

0118212219009382--.name: Well, time is of the essence. I'll begin the unsealing process.

0118212219009383--.name: If I become overwhelmed with dark energy, you'll need to sever my connection to the stones.

0118212219009389--.name: <font color='#909090'>(Mason outstretches his arm, and closes his eyes).</font>

0118212219009392--.name: Um... Were you going to do something?

0118212219009393--.name:
<font color='#909090'>(Mason wipes his brow.)</font>
The task is done. It wasn't easy directing so much dark power, but thankfully I managed it without complications.

0118212219009395--.name: $MyPCName$, do you really think me a charlatan? Let us speak candidly then. Have I been known to embellish the minutest detail here or there when it suits me? Perhaps, but no more than any other man. I would never spin falsehoods about matters of such import.

0118212219009396--.name:
How am I supposed to believe that when you say all this crazy stuff, only to wave your arms around and—woah...!
<FONT color='#909090'>(The world seems to whirl around you as something dark and heavy washes over you, before quickly receding.)</font>

0118212219009397--.name: Hmph. I will take that as an apology. In any case, thank you for your assistance. My work here is done. Why don't you check back in with Nairin?

0118212219009398--.name: Retrofitting the weapon went smoothly, thanks to everyone's help!

0118212219009400--.name: What are you staring at me for? I did plenty of stuff before I hurt my back!

0118212219009401--.name: Besides, it's not like I was the only one who wasn't pulling their weight. Even $npcName:11003535[gender:1]$—

0118212219009403--.name: How would you like unsupervised access to Dark Wind's vault of prohibited weapons?

0118212219009405--.name: What are you two mumbling about?

0118212219009406--.name: Just how our technicians had finished installing the new paneling! What were you saying about the Big Gun, Nainai?

0118212219009407--.name: Oh right. Well, that means we're ready to bring the weapon aboard the ship. Let's check in with the Captain.

0118212219009408--.name: Come in Mama Eagle, this is The Roost. Baby Bird is ready to leave the nest.

0118212219009409--.name: What's with all the cutesy call signs? It's not like the Crimson Balrogs have a radio to intercept our call.

0118212219009410--.name: I don't know, I kind of like them. They're clear and simple, a tactically efficient choice.

0118212219009411--.name: I think you might be biased toward the avian theme.

0118212219009412--.name: <font color="#909090">(Seriously, where did they find these people?)</font>

0118212219009413--.name: We read you loud and clear, but now is not the time for such discussions.

0118212219009414--.name: Sky Fortress is currently engaging the $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$. All crew are hereby ordered to return to the ship.

0118212219009416--.name: The $npcNamePlural:11003781[gender:0]$ appear to have grown tired of our interference. Sky Fortress is in peril.

0118212219009417--.name: Any remaining adjustments to the weapon will have to wait. Raise the cannon, and prepare for installation. Over and out.

0118212219009419--.name: You heard the captain! Let's get the cannon aboard!

0118212219009421--.name: The immediate crisis appears to be over.

0118212219009422--.name: Despite the circumstances, everyone performed their roles admirably. I'm proud of each of you.

0118212219009423--.name: Thankfully, there was no damage to the ship that can't be repaired in due time. $MyPCName$, you played a big part in that outcome.

0118212219009424--.name: It's time we began planning our reprisal. $npcName:11003536[gender:0]$, please have $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ report to the briefing room.

0118212219009427--.name: I was just contacted by our chief medical officer. It seems $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ is no longer in the infirmary.

0118212219009428--.name: Check all interior and exterior cameras. Find him.

0118212219009429--.name: I'm scrubbing through the camera footage now... I've got something!

0118212219009430--.name: It looks like he left the infirmary, and then... Went to the hangar deck. He left the ship aboard a small vessel.

0118212219009431--.name: Someone let him board a ship, in his condition?! Where was the Wing Commander?

0118212219009432--.name: According to the casualty report, currently in surgery. Let's watch the footage, shall we?

0126143019009537--.name: We should check the camera logs.

0118212219009434--.name: There's nothing we can do now but ready the cannon. There's still time to use it on $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ before he can do any more harm.

0118212219009435--.name: How long will it take to fire the cannon?

0118212219009436--.name: At least 15 minutes to charge and obtain a firing solution. And we'll need to be within range.

0118212219009437--.name: We can't just fire blindly from half a continent away.

0118212219009438--.name: I can buy you the time you need.

0118212219009439--.name: I won't allow it. $MyPCName$, going up against Infernog alone is too dangerous.

0118212219009440--.name: Don't worry, I'll bring friends. And besides, if I don't, $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ is liable to get himself killed.

0118212219009444--.name: $MyPCName$, locate $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$'s ship and engage Infernog. While he's distracted, we'll direct all of our resources toward readying the cannon to fire.

0118212219009445--.name: If you get in over your head, retrieve $npcName:11000144[gender:0]$ and return here immediately.

0118212219009447--.name: I'm sorry to lay such a heavy burden upon your shoulders.

0118212219009448--.name: A captain never has to apologize to her crew.

0118212219009452--.name: Today was a major victory. We have defeated an immortal demon threatening all of Maple World.

0118212219009453--.name: Thanks to our efforts, the skies are safe once more!

0118212219009454--.name: That might be true for now... But what if Infernog finds his way back here? How many more battles like this can we endure?

0118212219009455--.name: Sitting around worrying about the future is a surefire recipe for a headache. If that demon shows his ugly mug around here again, we'll defeat him, just like before!

0118212219009456--.name: Hah. You're as gruff as ever. But it suits you.

0118212219009457--.name: Captain, I want to thank you, truly, for the assistance of yourself and all of your crew.

0118212219009458--.name: $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ was defeated thanks to all of your efforts, even despite all the trouble I put you through.

0118212219009459--.name: The Sky Fortress and her crew will never back down from their mission to safeguard the heavens. And try not to be so hard on yourself. Everything you did was with noble intent.

0118212219009460--.name: ...Well, maybe he should be a little hard on himself. Anyways, it's not like we could just ignore a giant demon raining down fire and destruction on everyone.

0118212219009461--.name: On that we can agree. As the shield of the alliance, it is our duty to defend against any who seek to harm the people of this world.

0118212219009462--.name: Now and forever onward, we will roam the skies aiding all who need our help.

0118212219009463--.name: For the alliance! For Maple World!

0118212219009464--.name: You certainly are a passionate bunch.

0118212219009465--.name: $MyPCName$, I wanted to say thank you.

0118212219009466--.name: I'm glad everything worked out for the best.

0118212219009467--.name: It's all thanks to you. I'm sorry for burdening you time and again, but... if $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ ever returns, can I count once more on your aid?

0118212219009468--.name: I don't know how I could face him without you.

0118212219009469--.name: I'll do whatever it takes to protect Maple World.

0118212219009472--.name: Still, I can't help but worry.

0118212219009473--.name: $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ will be the first of many.

0118212219009475--.name: I didn't tell you? $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ wasn't the only great being sealed away during the War of Light and Darkness. There were many others. I saw them in an ancient tome handed down by my family.

0118212219009476--.name: And besides, $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s evil aura was so powerful, I'm sure he managed to influence plenty of monsters and divine creatures before he left this world... We'd do well to be prepared.

0118212219009477--.name: This all seems rather vague, and like something you should've brought up sooner.

0118212219009478--.name: Well, maybe I'm worrying over nothing. It's just a gut feeling... Still, I'll keep an eye out for trouble.

0118212219009479--.name: I trust you'll keep us in the loop.

0118212219009480--.name: Of course I will. Now, this is where we part ways, $MyPCName$.

0118212219009482--.name: Yes... I've already troubled everyone enough. Besides, there are things I need to set in order, in case worst comes to worst. It's time I moved on.

0118212219009483--.name: But this isn't goodbye forever. I'll be right here beside you when—err—if $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$ and his ilk ever return.

0118212219009485--.name: Until next time. Fortune be with you.

0118212219009486--.name: Did you actually think that would work?

0118212219009487--.name: Did you actually think that would work?

0118212219009489--.name: I have to admit, the fact you thought a mild inconvenience would save you from the $npcName:11001811[gender:0]$ is pitifully sad.

0124203719009514--.name: Well aren't you snippy, for a complete and total failure?

0124203719009515--.name: Enough. I came for what you promised.

0124203719009518--.name: "The deal is off?" Have you forgotten that your very survival is contingent upon this "deal?"

0124203719009520--.name: Oh no, a loud noise! We'd better retreat!

0124203719009521--.name: You failed to stop $npcName:11003795[gender:0]$'s revival, and return me to my rightful place as ruler of my kind.

0124203719009522--.name: And yet you expect me to hand over the Lapenta Shard? I owe you nothing!

0124203719009523--.name: ...You seem to have a short memory.

0124203719009524--.name: Did Bella, or did she not deliver the location of Infernog's Blood to the Crimson Balrogs?

0124203719009525--.name: Did she not incite them to attack the Sky Fortress? It seems to me we did precisely what we promised.

0124203719009526--.name: It was you who failed to strike when the vessel was under siege and your brethren were distracted. You squandered the perfect opportunity to destroy them both.

0124203719009527--.name: I couldn't risk it! My father was never supposed to awaken so soon. Who could have known that stupid human would deliver his blood directly to him?

0124203719009528--.name: Your cowardice and your weakness are not my concern. Now, I tire of this.

0124203719009529--.name: Do you have any last words before I put you out of your misery?

0124203719009531--.name:
...Just take it.
<font color='#909090'>(Balrog reluctantly surrenders the Lapenta Shard to the Black Mage)</font>

0124203719009532--.name: Hmph. You could have saved some small shred of your pride if you'd only handed it over to begin with.

0124203719009533--.name: Our business here is concluded. Let's go.

0124203719009534--.name: Yes, my liege. And as for the lord without a kingdom, I'll see you around.

0124203719009535--.name: Grr... You won't get away with this.

0124203719009536--.name: You and all those insects in the sky who meddled in my affairs...! Just you wait!

0104192919010134-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, it's good to see you in the flesh. So, what do you think of $map:02020041$?

0104192919010135-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020041$? Is that the name of this place?

0104192919010136-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That is correct. Kritias is a strange new world to us. Any prolonged operations in the area demand a base of operations. This is ours. Humanitas helped us pick out a location to break ground.

0104192919010137-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, none of this would be possible without your aid. Thanks to you, we have made new allies and established a safe haven in Kritias. $MyPCName$, thank you for everything.

0104192919010138-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was just doing my duty.

0104192919010139-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well then, ready for your next assignment?

0104192919010140-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Well that was a fine example of modesty backfiring spectacularly...)</font>

0111103919010658-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're beginning to form a rough understanding of this place, but there is much still to learn.

0111103919010659-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There are enemies here, both familiar and foreign. It falls to us to ensure we are prepared for anything that may come.

0111103919010660-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ may have failed to acquire the Blue Lapenta, but he and his Daemon Army remain a threat to us and to Kritias. We must determine the strength of his forces and their next objective. According to Humanitas, Daemon soldiers have been recently sighted in $map:02020029$.

0111103919010661-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want you to travel to the $map:02020029$ and pick up the Daemon Army's trail.

0104192919010141-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to the $map:02020029$ and pick up the Daemon Army's trail.

0104192919010142-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You've made it to $map:02020029$, but how are you going to locate the Daemon Army's forces?)</font>

0104192919010143-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(This forest is huge, and all the trees look the same...)</font>

0104192919010144-Kritias_2018_12-.name: (Maybe if you make enough of a scene, the Daemon Army will find you.)

0104192919010146-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe if I make enough of a scene, the Daemon Army will find me!

0104192919010147-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe if I make enough of a scene, the Daemon Army will find me!

0104192919010148-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Hm... Violently purging the local wildlife doesn't seem to be helping.)</font>

0104192919010149-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, do you read me? Our aerial surveillance has revealed evidence of a battle in $map:02020029$. Have you engaged the Daemon Army? We have reinforcements standing by to assist you.

0104192919010150-Kritias_2018_12-.name: T-that won't be necessary! I was just making a scene in hopes of getting the Daemon Army's attention...

0104192919010153-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you require assistance completing your mission, do not hesitate to call me.

0104192919010154-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our sensors are detecting movement outside of $map:02020030$. It's possible the Daemon Army is amassing for another attack on our allies. As your current plan has not borne fruit, perhaps it's time to move on.

0104192919010159-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you have a visual on the Daemon Army?

0104192919010160-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes. They have a number of troops in the area.

0104192919010162-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then engage them at once. If you drive them from this area, perhaps we can follow them to their stronghold.

0104192919010165-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, have you succeeded in driving the Daemon Army from $map:02020030$?

0104192919010166-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not all of them, but they should definitely be thinking twice about sticking around.

0104192919010167-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ has an update that may be of interest to you.

0104192919010169-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While you were engaging the Daemon Army soldiers, Sky Fortress's radar detected a large-scale movement of Daemon forces in the vicinity of the $map:02020032$ and $map:02020003$.

0104192919010170-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We believe these two locations are of strategic value to the Daemon Army. If we attack them there once their forces are gathered, we have an opportunity to deal them a crippling blow.

0111104719010662-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
We cannot allow these fiends free rein in Kritias. Engage the Daemon troops at either of these strategic points, and show no mercy!

<font color="#00aaef">(Completing this quest requires you to win one Legion Battle. While exploring the Kritias continent, invitations to participate in Legion Battles will appear as periodic pop-up notifications warning that a region is under siege. When minimized, this notification displays as a red radar screen.)</font>

0104192919010171-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
We've detected an influx of Daemon Army troops in the vicinity of $map:02020032$ and $map:02020003$. Defeating them at either of these locations could deal a devastating blow to their forces.

<font color="#00aaef">(Completing this quest requires you to win one Legion Battle. While exploring the Kritias continent, invitations to participate in Legion Battles will appear as periodic pop-up notifications warning that a region is under siege. When minimized, this notification displays as a red radar screen.)</font>

0104192919010172-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
We've detected an influx of Daemon Army troops in the vicinity of $map:02020032$ and $map:02020003$. Defeating them at either of these locations could deal a devastating blow to their forces.

<font color="#00aaef">(Completing this quest requires you to win one Legion Battle. While exploring the Kritias continent, invitations to participate in Legion Battles will appear as periodic pop-up notifications warning that a region is under siege. When minimized, this notification displays as a red radar screen.)</font>

0104192919010173-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How did $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ raise such an army in so little time...?

0104192919010177-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. There are matters we must discuss. Return to base immediately.

0104192919010180-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I'm glad you made it back safely.

0104192919010181-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tell me, what have you learned from your recent engagement with the Daemon Army?

0104192919010182-Kritias_2018_12-.name: From what I saw, their army is very large. And more importantly, it's made up of skilled warriors.

0104192919010183-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course, there's no telling if the forces I went up against account for the entirety of Turka's army.

0104192919010184-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A fine observation. We should relay your findings to Humanitas. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$, patch us through to $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$.

0104192919010185-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Aye, Captain! Patching you through now!

0111105019010664-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is Captain $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$. We've just engaged with a large contingent of the Daemon Army. Their forces in Kritias are much more substantial than we anticipated. You should caution your troops accordingly.

0111105019010665-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Daemon Army... As though we don't have enough to deal with Tairen and Kharon chipping away at our defenses. We'll make the necessary precautions. Thank you for reaching out to warn us.

0111105019010666-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our journeys in this new land continue to be met with unexpected challenges. We must continue to rise to the occasion.

0111105019010667-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work today, $MyPCName$. Get some rest before your next mission, you've earned it.

0104192919010186-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've been in Kritias for some time now. What do you think of this land?

0104192919010187-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Deadly monsters, evil robots, and dark forces conspiring to take over the world... Kritias may have its quirks, but in a lot of ways, it's just like home.

0104192919010188-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well put. And as it seems Kritias isn't going anywhere any time soon, it may be time to begin considering it just another part of Maple World.

0104192919010189-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, do you have a new mission for me?

0104192919010190-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004401[gender:1]$, the leader of Humanitas has requested our assistance.

0104192919010191-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our resources are somewhat limited at the moment, so I thought it would be best for everyone if I sent you rather than a platoon of cadets.

0104192919010192-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I suspect $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ will have no problems with that decision.

0111105319010668-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ will brief you on the details of the assignment in person. Go and speak with her in $map:02020030$.

0104192919010193-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ will brief you on the details of the assignment in person. Go and speak with her in $map:02020030$.

0104192919010194-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$ to the Captain, do you read me?

0104192919010195-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here. What did she say?

0104192919010196-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My mission is to take $map:02020004$ from Tairen.

0104192919010197-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. As we have begun sharing resources, securing $map:02020004$ and the supplies housed there will benefit both Humanitas and the Alliance. Can I count on you to assist our friends?

0111105319010669-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent. Contact me once you arrive in $map:02020004$.

0104192919010200-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Contact me once you've arrived in $map:02020004$.

0104192919010201-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Contact me once you've arrived in $map:02020004$.

0104192919010202-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$ to Captain Veliche, I've arrived in $map:02020004$.

0104192919010203-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Very good. I've bridged in Humanitas to discuss the operation.

0104192919010204-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like to begin, by thanking you both for assisting us with a matter that has little to do with you. As we've discussed, $map:02020004$ is a Tairen-occupied town of considerable strategic interest to Humanitas.

0104192919010205-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our interests lie in the town's warehouse, for the Tairen have stockpiled a wide variety of supplies there that are of immense value to our organization.

0104192919010206-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our previous attempt to capture the warehouse was nearly a success, until the Tairen received reinforcements from the capital.

0104192919010207-Kritias_2018_12-.name: At present, we cannot take $map:02020004$ without risking heavy casualties or compromising our defenses. I would like you to subdue the Tairen forces defending the area, so we can secure it with no loss of life on our side.

0104192919010208-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Once the area is secured, we will share the liberated supplies with the Alliance, as per the terms of our agreement.

0104192919010209-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Understood. Well $MyPCName$, I leave it to you. Demolish the $npcNamePlural:25020401$ and $npcNamePlural:25020402$ on site, and the Tairen should have no choice but to retreat.

0104192919010214-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our sensors are detecting movement. It seems the enemy has begun their retreat. Excellent work, as always.

0104192919010215-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You've impressed me again, $MyPCName$. These supplies should last us for some time, thank you.

0104192919010216-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Were you always this pressed for supplies?

0104192919010217-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Before your people arrived, we were waging a battle on two fronts—the Tairen on one side, and the Kharon on the other. We managed to hold our own, but resources were tight—especially when dealing with Tairen's new generation of soldiers.

0104192919010218-Kritias_2018_12-.name: When those you call the forces of darkness arrived in our land, it seemed our long battle was finally lost.

0104192919010219-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Fortunately for us, your Sky Fortress arrived to even the odds. I know it comes a bit late, but I'd like to express our gratitude for your aid.

0104192919010220-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I more than anyone understand the pressures you must have been under as the leader of your people. I'm glad we have reached an arrangement that serves us all.

0104192919010221-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I know I may have been difficult when we first met. I'm sorry.

0104192919010223-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wait... Our equipment is detecting an uptick in encrypted radio chatter. I believe our enemy may be regrouping for a counter-offensive.

0104192919010225-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hah. Ever confident. Very well, dispatch the enemy forces.

0104192919010228-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uh oh, I think you made them angry... I'm detecting a huge spike in aetherine energy nearby. Could that be their commander?

0104192919010229-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A large spike in aetherine energy—in $map:02020004$? That must be a $npcName:25020405[gender:0]$! It's too dangerous, $MyPCName$! Get out of there!

0104192919010230-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Alliance doesn't retreat in the face of danger.

0111105619010670-Kritias_2018_12-.name: How confident are you in your odds of success?

0111105619010672-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I believe in you, $MyPCName$. Show this Tairen commander the might of Sky Fortress and the Maple Alliance.

0104192919010233-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The aetherine energy signature has vanished from our sensors! That means $MyPCName$ was victorious!

0104192919010234-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Truly incredible. I don't know how to thank you for your aid.

0104192919010235-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We're allies. Helping each other is what we do.

0104192919010236-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's been a long mission, $MyPCName$. Why don't you return to $map:02020041$ and get some rest?

0104192919010237-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That idea doesn't sound half bad.

0104192919010239-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then I'll see you here. $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, I'll contact you on a separate channel to discuss supply logistics.

0104192919010240-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your mission is over. Return to base.

0104192919010241-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your mission is over. Return to base.

0104192919010242-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was starting to get worried about you, $MyPCName$. Are you hurt?

0104192919010244-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As thanks for your efforts, Humanitas has made an extremely generous gesture and sent us half of the supplies liberated from $map:02020004$.

0104192919010245-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As a result, our efforts to find local sources for all of our everyday needs have been significantly eased. Any fears of last-resort plans like resupplying in the mainland can be put to rest.

0104192919010246-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The crew has asked me to relay their gratitude to you.

0104192919010247-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ is the one who made good on her promise to send the supplies. She's the one they should be thanking.

0104192919010248-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hah. You're too humble. In any case, good work. Go and rest up for your next mission.

0107211319010249-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What's the word, Captain? Do you have any special missions for me?

0107211319010250-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Special missions? No. Thanks in part to your own excellent work, I don't have any missions that require your special skills at the moment. I'll let you know if that changes. Thanks for checking in.

0107211319010251-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you're looking for something to do, I've got a mission for you!

0107211319010253-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's a strange rumor the ship's crew have been tossing around.

0107211319010254-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Since there wasn't any urgent spy work that needed my attention, and I'd already finished reading Nairin's diary from front to back, I decided to look into the rumor. And you'll never guess what I found!

0107211319010255-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They're here. I'll give you a hint—it concerns an old friend of ours. A winged beast with a face only a mother could love.

0107211319010256-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I really don't know what you're talking about.

0107211319010257-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm... Have you really made it this far on your good looks alone? Well then, why don't you go to $map:02020013$ and see for yourself.

0107211319010258-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you still can't figure it out, then give me a call.

0107211319010259-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Didn't Schatten ask you to go to $map:02020013$?

0107211319010260-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and push the talk button).</font>
$MyPCName$ to Schatten. I'm here.

0107211319010261-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey there cutie! Did you figure it out?

0107211319010262-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No. I'm going to need a little more to go on. Also, this seems like a misappropriation of Alliance resources.

0107211319010263-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmph! You're no fun. A winged beast with a big ugly face?

0107211319010264-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Who else but could I have meant but $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$?

0107211319010265-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You saw $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$, here? Why didn't you report this to me?!

0107211319010266-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Weren’t you listening? I just did. I saw him flying around $map:02020013$ with my own two eyes. Who knows what he's doing in Kritias or what he is plotting. But if we leave him to his own devices, he's going to become a problem for us eventually.

0111110919010673-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You hear that, Kitten? The Captain agrees! You need to track down $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ and figure out what he's doing here!

0107211319010268-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to track down $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ and figure out what he's doing in Kritias.

0107211319010269-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need to track down $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ and figure out what he's doing in Kritias.

0107211319010272-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I didn't find $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$</font>, but I did run into a $npcName:25020906$.

0107211319010274-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here, I took a picture. I'm sending it now...

0107211319010275-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's a $npcName:25020906$ all right, no doubt about it.

0107211319010276-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ is here and he brought his lackeys.

0107211319010277-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not necessarily... The $npcNamePlural:25020906[gender:0]$ have had two masters. Either one's presence here spells trouble. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ run a sensor sweep! Use the existing profile for $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$'s biosignature.

0107211319010278-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Aye, Captain! Tasking sensors now...! I've got something! I'm detecting a signature matching $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ in $map:02020017$!

0111110919010674-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just as we feared. We need to warn Humanitas. Switch over to their frequency. $MyPCName$, I want you to go to $map:02020017$ while we formulate a strategy.

0107211319010281-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is Captain Veliche for Humanitas, can you hear me?

0107211319010282-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Loud and clear, Captain. What seems to be the matter?

0107211319010283-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm calling to warn you that we have acquired evidence that $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ has come to Kritias.
