0107211319010285-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Imagine a giant, angry, fireproof monkey with wings and a wicked scythe.

0107211319010286-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, I believe we've seen the creature you describe. That monster arrived just after the seal on Kritias was broken. Our soldiers risked their life to discover his purpose here.

0107211319010288-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He said he was searching for a "new power." Our troops reported he was gathering aetherine, and something called "lapenshards."

0107211319010289-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't quite understand what these lapenshards are, though.

0111111319010675-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Lapenshards are gems that echo the power of the Lapentas—giant crystals that govern the very nature of our reality. We have not determined precisely how they made their way to your land.

0111111319010676-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see. Well, we cannot allow such power to fall into the hands of a beast like that.

0107211319010290-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems we are in complete agreement.

0107211319010291-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems we are in complete agreement.

0107211319010292-Kritias_2018_12-.name: One thing is certain. If $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ gains the power he seeks, he will be a danger to both our people alike.

0107211319010293-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've been tracking his location. I'll send you the coordinates of his lair.

0111111319010678-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, travel to $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s coordinates at once and engage $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ in battle. We will send forces to assist you as soon as we can.

0107211319010294-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s coordinates at once and engage $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ in battle. We will send forces to assist you as soon as we can.

0107211319010295-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$'s coordinates at once and engage $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ in battle. We will send forces to assist you as soon as we can.

0107211319010296-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Captain, can you hear me...? Hello?

0107211319010297-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(Your radio makes a sad whine when the talk button is pressed.)</font>

0107211319010298-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uh oh... I think the battery's starting to go. I'd better return to $map:02020041$ and make my report in person.

0107211319010299-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think my radio is dead... I'd better return to $map:02020041$ and make my report in person.

0107211319010300-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think my radio is dead... I'd better return to $map:02020041$ and make my report in person.

0107211319010301-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! When I didn't hear from you, I started to worry. Thank heavens you're safe.

0107211319010302-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sorry about that, something was up with my walkie-talkie.

0107211319010303-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Was it damaged in battle? I'll make sure you're issued a new one. As for your mission—what happened? Is it over? Did you defeat $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$?

0107211319010304-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It wasn't easy, but I took him down.

0107211319010305-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You never cease to impress, pumpkin. I guess we can consider $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ officially spanked.

0107211319010306-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's not celebrate just yet. Defeating $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ may have been easy, however...

0107211319010307-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ was here, then we may be facing <i>another threat</>.

0111111519010679-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We should contact $npcName:11003853[gender:0]$ just to be safe. In any case, good work, $MyPCName$.

1031125219009918-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$, exactly the person I was hoping to speak with. $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$'s transport has arrived in Kritias and is en route to $map:02020041$ as we speak.

0124162319010800-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I had intended to hold our briefing after $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$ arrived, but as time is of the essence, we'll have to conduct it by radio. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$, please patch us through.

0124162319010801-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Connection established! This is Alliance mobile command to $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$, do you copy?

0124162319010802-Kritias_Inferno01-.name:
H-hello? What an interesting device. Do I put this part on my ear? You know, I never had to mess about with this sort of techno-nonsense in the Knights. And what do I do with this fuzzy bit? Hello?
<font color="#909090">(You hear a series of uncomfortably loud thumps and clicks as $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$ fumbles with the microphone.)</font>

0124162319010803-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Hello, $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$? You've got to put the ear-shaped hook around your ear, and the fuzzy microphone bit in front of your mouth. No—not inside your mouth! Agh! There, that's better.

0124162319010804-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Ah, it's just like old times.

0124162319010805-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Ahem. Before anything else, I'd like to thank you for coming so quickly after we called.

0124162319010806-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Don't mention it. If he is here, everything else can wait. Speaking of "here," this place is unusual. I've never felt anything quite like this aura.

1031125219009919-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Don't mention it. If he is here, everything else can wait. Speaking of "here," this place is unusual. I've never felt anything quite like this aura.

1031125219009920-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: You know, in one of my family's tomes there's a description of an aura like this. I myself was skeptical about it, but it seems it really exists. Perhaps my ancestor was sensing a visitation by a being of this land?

0124162319010807-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: It was from a volume of the Daybringer's Chronicles—that was what they called him, my ancestor. If I remember correctly, he served the goddess back when the Sages were still alive. In any case, there was a chapter in his book where he mentioned sensing a presence that was "not of his world." The experience really rattled him.

0124162319010808-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: ...Returning to the matter at hand, do you sense $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s aura in this land?

1031125219009921-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: ...Returning to the matter at hand, do you sense $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s aura in this land?

1031125219009922-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: ...Returning to the matter at hand, do you sense $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s aura in this land?

0124162319010809-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: As distinctive as $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s energy is, it's a bit hard to sniff him out from the overwhelming alien aura of this place. It will take me a little while to re-calibrate.

0124162319010810-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I won't be able to say for certain until I've arrived in $map:02020041$ and searched the surrounding areas from top to bottom.

0124162319010811-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: You've just arrived on a foreign continent, and your first instinct is to go traipsing into the wilderness alone?! Do you even know how dangerous this place is?!

0124162319010812-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: For once, I'm in agreement with $npcName:11004313[gender:0]$. $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$, you are not yet familiar with the dangers that lurk here.

0124162319010813-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: That's not to say I'd have you sit on your hands. Instead, I suggest $MyPCName$ serve as your eyes and ears in the field. What do you say, $MyPCName$?

0124162319010815-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Good. After we first asked $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$ to travel to Kritias, $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ began working on a portable detector using the data we have gathered on $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ to date.

0124162319010816-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I want you to use the detector to narrow down $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s potential location, and coordinate with $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$ remotely to refine your search. Any questions?

0124162319010818-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Good. It appears that the detector is currently pointing towards $map:02020003$. Why not start your search there?

1031125219009924-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: It appears that the detector is currently pointing towards $map:02020003$. Begin your search there.

1031125219009925-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: It appears that the detector is currently pointing towards $map:02020003$. Begin your search there.

1031125219009926-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: $MyPCName$. I forgot to mention something before you left.

0124162319010820-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'm watching a live feed of the detector's data, and I may ask for your help to help calibrate the device from time to time.

0124162319010822-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Hmm? No, I just want to make sure the device is working correctly. In fact, unless you're currently surrounded by several Infernogs, I believe I'm getting false positives from the aetherine signatures of nearby Tairen and Kharon soldiers.

0124162319010823-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: If you could reduce the number of $npcNamePlural:25021504$, $npcNamePlural:25021505$ and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in the area, I should be able to isolate their aetherine signatures and modify the detector to ignore them.

1031125219009927-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: If you could reduce the number of $npcNamePlural:25021504$, $npcNamePlural:25021505$ and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in the area, I should be able to isolate their aetherine signatures and modify the detector to ignore them.

1031125219009928-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: If you could reduce the number of $npcNamePlural:25021504$, $npcNamePlural:25021505$ and $npcNamePlural:25021502$ in the area, I should be able to isolate their aetherine signatures and modify the detector to ignore them.

1031125219009929-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Captain! Now that the interference has been eliminated, the detector is reading one biosignature loud and clear!

0124162319010825-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Not far from $MyPCName$'s location! It looks like he's somewhere in the vicinity of $map:02020018$.

0124162319010827-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Captain, we need a plan before we send our favorite hero off to battle $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$. Our last foolproof plan fell notably short.

0124162319010828-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: You're right. We need to formulate a new strategy. $MyPCName$, you're to return to base for now.

0124162319010829-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Hello! Hello?! Am I finally on the right frequency? Can you all hear me?

0124162319010831-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm headed your way. Meet me at $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$'s current location! I've finally done it! I've found a way to kill him!

0124162319010832-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: You found a way to kill him?!

0124162319010834-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: A power from outside our world, aetherine! It doesn't operate the way normal magic does—I'm certain it can break through $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$s defenses and truly wound him!

0124162319010835-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I borrowed some processed aetherine from $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$'s lab on a hunch, and I decided to have a few sips, Now I feel a new power flowing within me! This power... it can kill him! I've never been more certain!

0124162319010836-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Hold on just a moment! You took aetherine from $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$'s lab and drank it?!

0124162319010837-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: That was incredibly reckless. You could have died! $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$, $MyPCName$, you are both to return here at once!

0124162319010838-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Captain, we'll never know if it works unless we test it.

0124162319010839-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: It's too dangerous! The Alliance needs both of you—alive!

0124162319010840-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Trust me, Captain. At the first sign the aetherine doesn't at least horribly maim $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$, we'll zip out of there like a Koborc on fire.

0124162319010843-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Very well. Then I order you to defeat $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ and return safely.

1031125219009930-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Very well. Then I order you to defeat $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ and return safely.

1031125219009931-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Very well. Then I order you to defeat $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ and return safely.

0124162319010846-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: We're both safe. Not only that, but our $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ problem is finally over.

0124162319010847-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: What a relief. I'll debrief when you arrive in $map:02020041$. Return as quickly as you can.

1031125219009933-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'll debrief when you arrive in $map:02020041$. Return as quickly as you can.

1031125219009934-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'll debrief when you arrive in $map:02020041$. Return as quickly as you can.

1031125219009935-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'm glad to see you safely returned. But where is $npcName:11004555[gender:0]$?

0124162319010848-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: He refused to come back with me.

0124162319010850-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Maybe he wanted to make sure $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ is really dead. It's been his family's sworn duty for I don't know how many generations to protect Maple World from that sort of evil. I don't imagine it will be easy to let go.

0124162319010851-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I wouldn't be surprised if he was still there standing over the body, sword ready, waiting to see if it twitches.

0124162319010852-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I think Condor's right. He wants to be sure this is finally over.

0124162319010853-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Is that so? I suppose he needs time to come to grips with things. Well, this turn of events calls for a celebration.

0124162319010854-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: You've done an amazing thing, $MyPCName$. Truly. Though our work here is far from over, it's important to enjoy these victories when they come.

0124162319010855-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Tonight Maple World is safe. Take the day to gather with those you hold dear and celebrate life. Tomorrow, our work continues.

1031125219009936-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: A great deal has happened since we arrived in Kritias. Your triumph over $npcName:23090006[gender:0]$ and $npcName:23000150[gender:0]$ was nothing short of astonishing.

0124162319010856-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Yeah, I guess I am pretty great.

0124162319010857-Kritias_Inferno01-.name:
<font color="#909090">(She gives an unexpected chuckle.)</font>
Now that the most imminent threats to Maple World have been addressed, it is time to finally resume our exploration of Kritias.

0124162319010858-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Of course, there are still a number of obstacles that will stand in our way.

0124162319010860-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Such as Kharon and the soldiers of Tairen.

0124162319010861-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: The best course of action to address their interference is a preemptive strike. As luck would have it, we an ally with a part to play in this fight.

0124162319010862-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: In light of your many achievements and your good relations with Humanitas, I would like you to lead the operation.

0124162319010864-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Excellent. Proceed to $map:02020009$ and await further instruction.

1031125219009937-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Excellent. Proceed to $map:02020009$ and await further instruction.

1031125219009938-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: This joint operation represents a new chapter in the relations of our peoples, and will surely inflict a devastating blow against our enemies. I'd like to thank all of you for your cooperation, especially $MyPCName$.

0124162319010865-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: There's no need for that. Our objective is one and the same.

0124162319010866-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: While you were dealing with that monster from your realm, Humanitas was gathering intelligence on Tairen.

0124162319010867-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: We've discovered that $map:02020009$ is one of the Kharon's primary bases of operations. By striking here, we can cripple them in a single blow!

0124162319010868-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: The elite soldiers of Tairen go through a prolonged and specialized training period, which means it takes quite some time to replace those who fall in battle. The Kharon however have much less exacting standards. They regularly supplant their ranks with conscripted exiles.

0124162319010869-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: This is what makes them of such strategic value to the Tairen. They further the Tairen agenda without the shedding of any Tairen blood. For their services, the Kharon are handsomely rewarded.

0124162319010870-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Today we attack the Kharon with such ferocity that they have no choice but to reconsider their arrangement. We will show them that Humanitas is far better positioned to win this war of attrition. And at the very least, we will force them to adopt a defensive posture, buying Humanitas a much needed respite from their onslaught.

0124162319010871-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: The time has come to strike back! Unleash your wrath against any $npcName:25021601$, $npcName:25021602$, or $npcName:25021603$ that crosses your path!

1031125219009939-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Unleash your wrath against any $npcName:25021601$, $npcName:25021602$, or $npcName:25021603$ that crosses your path!

1031125219009940-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Unleash your wrath against any $npcName:25021601$, $npcName:25021602$, or $npcName:25021603$ that crosses your path!

1031125219009941-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: We're detecting a significant reduction in aetherine signatures in the vicinity. Excellent work.

0124162319010872-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Thanks to you, Kharon military strength has been drastically diminished. We must capitalize on this momentum.

0124162319010873-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: While you were fighting, our scans of the area identified an object of interest.

0124162319010874-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Have you seen the large drill there? It seemed unlikely that Kharon could construct and maintain such a device on their own, so naturally Humanitas has been investigating the matter. Using the sensor array on your Sky Fortress, we were able to confirm the device is being operated remotely by Tairen.

0124162319010875-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: We haven't determined their purpose for placing the drill their, however, its presence presents a unique opportunity. If we access the device manually, we should be able to decrypt their signal and obtain the Tairen access code!

0124162319010876-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Once we have obtained this code, we can use it to gain entry to countless Tairen facilities for espionage, or sabotage—at least until they detect the intrusion and generate new access codes.

0124162319010877-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: $MyPCName$, go to the drill and initiate a connection between the device and Sky Fortress. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ will work with Cat Sith to decrypt the access code.

1031125219009942-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Go to the drill and initiate a connection between the device and Sky Fortress. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ will work with Cat Sith to decrypt the access code.

1031125219009943-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Go to the drill and initiate a connection between the device and Sky Fortress. $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ will work with Cat Sith to decrypt the access code.

1031125219009944-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: It's done! We've secured the access code.

0124162319010878-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: $MyPCName$, could I ask another favor of you?

0124162319010879-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Our reconnaissance teams tell us that $npcNamePlural:25021604$ at that location are transporting $itemPlural:30001257$ supplied to them by the Tairen. If you were to deprive them of this vital resource, it would seriously hamstring the mobility of their forces and their ability to power their weapons of war.

0124162319010880-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Will you seize the $itemPlural:30001257$ on our behalf?

0124162319010881-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Hobbling Kharon will allow our own expeditionary forces to explore Kritias more safely. Are you up to the task?

0124162319010883-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Excellent. Then go relieve those $npcNamePlural:25021604$ of their $item:30001257$.

1031125219009947-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: We have one final assignment for you before you return to base.

0124162319010885-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Now that the enemy forces in the area have been crippled, we have been afforded a unique opportunity.

0124162319010886-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Somewhere under the $map:02020009$ is a control center that oversees all ecological experiments in the area. By gaining access to and redirecting the facility's primary controls to our computers, we can find out what sorts of experiments they're running, and perhaps use them to our own ends.

0124162319010887-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: As Sky Fortress's radar was unable to penetrate the $map:52100108$, we don't know what sort of defenses they may have in place. But if there's anyone I trust to carry out this mission, it's you.

0124162319010888-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Gain entry to the $map:52100108$ and redirect the primary controls.

1031125219009948-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Gain entry to the $map:52100108$ and redirect the primary controls.

1031125219009949-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Gain entry to the $map:52100108$ and redirect the primary controls.

0124162319010889-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I can hear you. What is your status?

0124162319010890-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: The control room was under guard, but I managed to access and redirect the primary controls.

0124162319010891-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I never doubted you for a moment. It's been a long mission—return to base.

1031125219009953-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: Another job well done. Humanitas has been waiting to thank you for your hard work.

0124162319010892-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: $MyPCName$! I'm glad you've returned safely. I was starting to worry.

0124162319010894-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'd like to thank you—on behalf of both your Alliance, and Humanitas. As a result of your efforts, we can finally travel beyond $map:02020013$ without meeting insurmountable resistance.

0124162319010897-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: No matter what awaits us, there is no challenge we cannot overcome together.

0124162319010898-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: If we are to take Sky Fortress deeper into the heart of Kritias, the crew has a lot of work ahead of them.

0124162319010899-Kritias_Inferno01-.name: I'll let you know as soon as preparations are complete. But for now, there are other missions that need your attention. Dismissed.

0107211319010309-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I'm glad you're here. You must have felt it too—a dark aura so similar, and yet so different.

0107211319010310-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm not sure what you mean.

0107211319010311-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Come now, there's no need to be so humble.

0107211319010312-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What exactly are you talking about?

0107211319010313-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This darkness feels similar to that of foes we have combated in days past, but with subtle differences. Nevertheless, all of my experience and all of my learnings as a templar tell me this is a threat that cannot be ignored.

0110151219010621-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have my suspicions as to its source, but even as a High Templar there are some Lumiknight secrets I simply cannot share with you. However...

0107211319010314-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If you were to discover the darkness's source on your own, well, I could hardly be blamed for your learning its secret. I sense it emanating from somewhere on the outskirts of $map:02020030$. Go there and have a look about.

0110183719010618-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're not coming? But I don't even know what I'm looking for.

0110183719010619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Surely you jest! $map:02020041$ relies on me to protect it from dark psychic forces and threats both seen and unseen. I also coordinate Lumiknight operations in Kritias; I can hardly be expected to do that remotely.

0110183719010620-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You sigh and then stare blankly at Mason for several long seconds.)</font>
Well, I guess I'll be off then.

0110183719010621-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry. I'll do everything in my power to ward off the darkness from here. You should set out for $map:02020030$ now if you want to reach it before nightfall.

0107211319010315-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry. I'll do everything in my power to ward off the darkness from here. You should set out for $map:02020030$ now if you want to reach it before nightfall.

0107211319010316-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and attempt to contact Alliance HQ.)</font>

0107211319010317-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I trust you've arrived in $map:02020030$ by now. Ready to set up the device?

0107211319010318-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Device? You never mentioned any device.

0110151019010619-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He means the Shadow Matter Detectors I built. I put several of them in your bag the last time we spoke. You didn't see them in there?

0110183719010622-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
What? I don't remember that. When did that happen?
<font color="#909090">(Incredulous, you rummage through your backpack only to discover a handheld device with a screen and several blinking lights.)</font>

0107211319010319-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That device was developed by Sky Fortress's R&D department. Like a digital third eye, it pierces the veil between our world and the astral plane, where light and dark energies hover over us like clouds of colored smoke.

0110183719010623-Kritias_2018_12-.name: W-what? That's not remotely how it works! My device is based on actual science!

0107211319010320-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...In any case, the instructional manual says it can detect the power of darkness with a high degree of precision.

0107211319010321-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You need only distribute them throughout the area, and the devices will do the rest.

0107211319010322-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Distribute the Shadow Matter Detectors around $map:02020030$.

0107211319010323-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Distribute the Shadow Matter Detectors around $map:02020030$.

0107211319010324-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You pick up your radio and attempt to contact Alliance HQ.)</font>

0107211319010325-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your work has already borne fruit. Our detectors have pierced the veil and glimpsed the darkness beyond.

0107211319010326-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No wonder it felt unusual... This darkness is not magical in nature... According to our detectors, it's radiating on the EM spectrum.

0107211319010327-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The way it fluctuates in amplitude, it almost looks like... a transmission. Uploading detector data to Cat Sith for analysis.

0110183719010625-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! It is a transmission! It looks like machine code. So much data... It's almost like we're watching a single entity pulling the strings of a vast number of machines!

0110183719010626-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see... Then perhaps this "transmission" is controlling the machines in $MyPCName$'s vicinity as we speak?

0110183719010627-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We already have an eye witness in $map:02020031$ who said that Turka somehow took control of all of the Tairen machines in the area... That can't be a coincidence. Maybe he got his hands on some kind of control device?

0107211319010328-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We must understand the method by which the forces of darkness have somehow digitized their evil.

0107211319010329-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, please go to $map:02020031$ and dismantle some of the machines there for analysis.

0107211319010330-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, please go to $map:02020031$ and dismantle some of the machines there for analysis.

0107211319010331-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, please go to $map:02020031$ and dismantle some of the machines there for analysis.

0107211319010332-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, how are things going over there?

0107211319010333-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've busted up a bunch of mechanical soldiers, but I haven't found anything out of the ordinary.

0107211319010334-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... Strange. But there must be some special mechanism by which these machines are being controlled. After all, none of the wildlife seems to be affected.

0107211319010335-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's quite curious that the forces of darkness have tailored their usual approach to villainy for Kritias—rather than corrupting the local lifeforms, they have corrupted the machines, which are proving far more formidable soldiers.

0110183719010629-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, we have no greater technology expert at our disposal than $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$. Let's see what she thinks about all this.

0107211319010336-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have no greater technology expert at our disposal than $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$. Let's see what she thinks about all this.

0107211319010337-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have no greater technology expert at our disposal than $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$. Let's see what she thinks about all this.

0107211319010338-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you're ready to turn to actual science to tackle the problem! So, I've been analyzing the energy readings recorded by our Shadow Matter Detectors.

0107211319010339-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This is a visualization of the data we've collected.

0110183719010630-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like a high-density network...

0107211319010340-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're not completely wrong. From what I can tell, we're seeing one cluster of a neural network.

0107211319010341-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh! Sorry... Think of it as an advanced form of distributed computing modeled after the human brain, capable of carrying out a number of complex tasks simultaneously by dividing the work up among clusters of artificial neurons.

0107211319010342-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Which is to say, an artificial brain that could potentially manipulate countless mechanical soldiers like limbs! This transmission is providing specialized commands to each machine in the network... How could one person ever control such a network alone?

0107211319010343-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps the one pulling the strings is not human at all.

0107211319010344-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I agree that no human, no matter how remarkable, could control these machines in this fashion. But I don't believe a human is to blame.

0107211319010345-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I agree that no human, no matter how remarkable, could control these machines in this fashion. But I don't believe a human is to blame.

0107211319010346-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to Humanitas, Tairen is an extremely advanced society—both in terms of magic and technology. And they are governed by an artificial intelligence. It stands to reason an AI powerful enough to control a whole kingdom could also control these machines.

0110183719010632-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Could Kritias really be so beyond us technologically?

0107211319010347-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need to learn more about whatever being is controlling all these machines using the power of darkness. Perhaps $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ could help us.

0107211319010348-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work, $MyPCName$. Return to $map:02020041$ and we'll try to get in contact with her.

0107211319010351-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$—I was just trying to reach you telepathically.

0107211319010352-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Your timing is excellent. I have $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ on the line to discuss the unique darkness we encountered.

0107211319010353-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$, as I was saying—we believe that all of the corrupted Tairen machines are being controlled by a single entity.

0107211319010354-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Considering its transmission resembles a neural network, we can think of only one entity capable of such a feat.

0107211319010355-Kritias_2018_12-.name: After analyzing the data you sent us, we can confirm that the machines being controlled by this signal are only a small part of Tairen's forces. And needless to say, there would be no reason for $npcName:11004432$ to hack her own soldiers.

0107211319010356-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The network was clearly compromised by a third party. Likely someone from outside of Kritias. Tairen's military networks are secured behind layer after layer of firewall. If someone from your world was able to co-opt them, then your technology is clearly more advanced than we believed.

0107211319010357-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, when our engineers analyzed the signal, they were baffled by the bits of data they managed to decrypt...

0110183719010633-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The transmission includes $npcName:11004432$'s unique credentials. I don't know how our hacker managed to fake them...

0107211319010358-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What can you tell us about $npcName:11004432$?

0107211319010359-Kritias_2018_12-.name: She is an android who controls not just Tairen, but virtually all of Kritias. She is a heartless machine who views people as a commodity. Humanitas will not rest until she is deposed!

0107211319010360-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wait... Do you feel that surge of darkness? We need to investigate its source. I'm afraid our discussion will have to wait.

0108202519010361-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Can you feel that surging darkness?

0108202519010362-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm certain this dark aura belongs to a powerful entity that means us all ill. Deireadh can feel it too... Look at the blade tremble.

0108202519010363-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Deireadh tells me the owner of this aura is filled with endless malice. The sword yearns to unleash its righteous wrath and cleanse the world of this evil.

0108202519010364-Kritias_2018_12-.name: For the blade to get become so incensed, the source of this evil must be a dangerous individual indeed.

0108202519010365-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, you must investigate this darkness at once.

0108202519010367-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Deireadh points in the direction of $map:02020001$. I suspect we'll find our answers there.

0108202519010368-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Deireadh points in the direction of $map:02020001$. I suspect we'll find our answers there.

0108202519010369-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm not seeing any obvious signs of a dark force at work.... Maybe I should've borrowed Mason's magic sword.

0108202519010370-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... Maybe I should see if anyone here has seen anything out of the ordinary?

0108202519010371-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... Maybe I should see if anyone here has seen anything out of the ordinary?

0108202519010374-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. What did you learn about the dark aura I sensed?

0108202519010375-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I spoke with a crewman named $npc:11004458[gender:1]$ who relayed eye witness accounts of a ghost dressed in black.

0108202519010376-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A ghost...? Deireadh would have never have mistaken some mere specter for malignant presence it indicated to me.

0110183719010634-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No, I'm certain the darkness we seek is immensely powerful. But we do know one individual that fits that description. I suspect it was Turka your witnesses saw.

0108202519010377-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to the eyewitnesses, this "ghost" was muttering something about obtaining power by sacrificing a soul—whatever that means.

0108202519010378-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm... This is a matter of great concern. Sacrificing a soul? Soul magic is the darkest type of magic—more foul even than blood magic. I must consult my arcane tomes on the subject.

0108202519010379-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey there, dumpling! I was listening in on your conversation, and I thought you might be interested to know that one of my undercover agents has sighted your "ghost" in $map:02020006$.

0108202519010380-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What a fortunate development! $MyPCName$, please proceed to $map:02020006$ and look into this.

0108202519010381-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What a fortunate development! $MyPCName$, please proceed to $map:02020006$ and look into this.

0108202519010382-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What a fortunate development! $MyPCName$, please proceed to $map:02020006$ and look into this.

0110224419010656-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No sign of Turka, but lots of Daemon Army underlings.

0108202519010383-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, don't look at me. My agents know better than to report intel they haven't personally vetted. At least unless they want me to... discipline them.

0110213219010638-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If not Turka, someone there must be in command of those Daemon forces.

0108202519010385-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll find a higher ranking Daemon to have a "chat" with.

0108202519010386-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll find a higher ranking Daemon to have a "chat" with.

0108202519010387-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll find a higher ranking Daemon to have a "chat" with.

0110183719010636-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sigh... If only you were a High Templar like myself, we could simply communicate telepathically, instead of relying on such unreliable machines.

0108202519010389-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In any case, have there been any developments?

0108202519010390-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
No one was feeling very chatty, but I did find some orders on one of the bigger Daemons. Here, I'll send you a picture.
<font color="#909090">(You snap a photo of the orders with your PDA and transmit it to Mason.)</font>

0108202519010391-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... Let's see. At first glance, these orders seem fairly mundane.

0108202519010393-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These orders were penned by Daemon Field Commander $npcName:23000301$... Gah!

0108202519010394-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Calm down Deireadh! Stay your wrath! The blade trembles with rage... Could this $npcName:23000301$ be responsible for the darkness I felt?

0108202519010395-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We can rest assured we won't find who we seek in $map:02020006$. Deireadh is pointing a different direction now... Toward the $map:02020034$

0108202519010401-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sense that $npcName:23000301$ is no longer at $map:02020006$.

0108202519010402-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I sense that $npcName:23000301$ is no longer at $map:02020006$.

0108202519010403-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wait. We know nothing about this $npcName:23000301$. It is reckless to engage an enemy without knowing their strength.

0108202519010404-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Return to base and we will discuss our next steps.

0108202519010405-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I should return to base for now.

0108202519010406-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I should return to base for now.

0108202519010407-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Step by step, our investigation draws inexorably closer to its end. But one task yet remains.

0108202519010408-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I understand that you want to deal with $npcName:23000301$ immediately.

0108202519010409-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But we must first learn what we are up against.

0114101519010708-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmm... I didn't want to resort to this...

0108202519010410-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I must open my mind and gaze into the Eye of Providence—borrowing of its divine power. The authority to perform such a feat is limited to a select few, even among the High Templar. Luckily, I am counted among them.

0110213219010640-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...I have no idea what you are saying.

0110213219010641-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Eye of Providence was created by the goddess of light herself. It may be a mere echo of her power, but it has the ability to show those permitted anything they should wish to see.

0114101519010709-Kritias_2018_12-.name: If any of that were true, it would be very impressive.

0110213219010642-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Quiet please. It will take all of my focus to peer through the Eye.

0110213219010645-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Phew... I managed to glimpse $npcName:23000301$ using the Eye of Providence. However, I could not get as close as I would have liked, for fear of being assaulted in my astral form.

0110213219010646-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a good thing I volunteered for the Kritias expedition. I shudder to think what would happen had I not been here to help.

0108202519010412-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Gazing through the Eye of Providence, I discovered that $npcName:23000301$ possesses a dark and terrible power. But I also saw that there was one among us capable of obliterating that power. I remain uncertain as to whether you are that individual...

0108202519010413-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But with the level of your abilities, we must at least try.

0108202519010414-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Forget abilities! You're sending $male:him,female:her$ off alone? What if $male:he,female:she$ gets hurt? Huh?!

0108202519010415-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry Cadet. Unlike some people, I'm not afraid to get my hands dirty. I'll fight by your side.

0108202519010416-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Didn't the Empress entrust you with the defense of $map:02020041$? There's no cause for concern. I'll be watching over $MyPCName$ from here.

0108202519010417-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I won't have a cadet die on my watch!

0108202519010418-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Don't worry Condor, I can take care of myself. After all, I learned from the best.

0108202519010419-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Fine... Go and be a hero. But you'd better come back safe! That's an order!

0108202519010420-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Eye of Providence showed me that $npcName:23000301$ is at the $map:02020032$.

0108202519010423-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Alliance Command, do you read me?

0108202519010424-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I take it you've arrived at the $map:02020032$? Then please activate the Precision Darkwave Analyzer Nairin gave you.

0110213219010649-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Activate the what? Nairin never gave me anything like that.

0110213219010650-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a device that tracks and identifies unique configurations of dark power. I built it exactly to the Captain's specifications! I put it in your bag before you left!

0110213219010651-Kritias_2018_12-.name: W-what? I think we need to have a conversation about personal boundaries...

0110213219010652-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, are you picking anything up on the device?

0108202519010425-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uhh... There's a frowny face on the screen, and below that it says "Error 408—unable to connect to host device."

0108202519010426-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That can't be. The Darkwave Analyzer is perfect! It should be able to connect to our network from anywhere in Kritias!

0110213219010653-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Uh... Nainai... Maybe I should have told you this earlier, but one of those sprout guys chewed through some wires on your computer.

0108202519010427-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahh! Why are you just telling me this now? $MyPCName$, please give me a few minutes! I'll get the equipment replaced!

0108202519010428-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, in the mean time I'll see about reducing the number of Daemon Army soldiers in the area.

0108202519010429-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll contact you by radio once the device is repaired.

0108202519010430-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While we're waiting for Nairin to repair the machine, why not reduce the number of Daemon soldiers at the $map:02020032$?

0108202519010431-Kritias_2018_12-.name: While we're waiting for Nairin to repair the machine, why not reduce the number of Daemon soldiers at the $map:02020032$?

0108202519010432-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, can you hear me? It seems the device was damaged beyond repair.

0110213219010654-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The captain designed it herself, and we never even got to use it...! I'm so ashamed...

0108202519010433-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I peered once more through the all-seeing Eye of Providence and discovered $npcName:23000301$'s location. $map:02020016$.

0108202519010435-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A High Templar of the Lumiknights does not lie.

0108202519010436-Kritias_2018_12-.name: However, I won't be able to call upon the Eye of Providence again. My strength, much like the goddess's generosity, is not boundless.

0108202519010437-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I must recharge my energies. And you must travel to $map:02020016$ to deal with $npcName:23000301$, before our quarry eludes us again.

0108202519010438-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020016$ to deal with $npcName:23000301$, before our quarry eludes us again.

0108202519010439-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020016$ to deal with $npcName:23000301$, before our quarry eludes us again.

0108202519010440-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Are you ready to form a pact with $npcName:23400071$, and all that entails?

0108202519010441-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes my liege. I am ready to wake the stone god, so that he might share with you his bountiful power.

0108202519010442-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And you understand what $npcName:23400071$ requires in exchange?

0108202519010444-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And you understand what that means?

0108202519010446-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You will obtain the power to conquer not just this land, but all of Maple World!

0108202519010447-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Paika, I have always been grateful for your unwavering loyalty, but...

0108202519010448-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Surely loyalty alone cannot account for your willingness to make this sacrifice. No one offers their soul for another. Even I would not pledge my soul for him.

0108202519010451-Kritias_2018_12-.name: My soul has always been yours. And as my soul falls into the fiery abyss, your secret will be buried forever.

0108202519010450-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But why would you sacrifice yourself for me?

0108202519010453-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've pledged my life to you, $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$. If you do not believe me, then take it now.

0108202519010452-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But if you end me here, you will have no soul to offer $npcName:23400071$.

0108202519010455-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But if you deceive me, you will be met with a terrible fate the likes of which you cannot begin to imagine.

0108202519010458-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm here, and $npcName:23000301$ is too. I can feel the chill of his dark aura.

0108202519010459-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, l feel it too. You should know, the Eye of Providence has whispered to me of $npcName:23000301$'s intentions...

0108202519010460-Kritias_2018_12-.name: They involve a bargain with a horror of old.

0110232619010657-Kritias_2018_12-.name: An ancient demon in a body of stone which feeds on negative emotions. $npcName:23400071$...

0114101519010710-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
A difficult battle awaits you. To ensure you are not swallowed by darkness, I will conjure a protective sigil for you at the entrance to $npcName:23400071$'s temple. Step through it before you enter.
<font color="#909090">(You hear Mason chanting quietly under his breath.)</font>

0108202519010461-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
To ensure you are not swallowed by darkness, I will conjure a protective sigil for you at the entrance to $npcName:23400071$'s temple. Step through it before you enter.
<font color="#909090">(You hear Mason chanting quietly under his breath.)</font>

0108202519010462-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
To ensure you are not swallowed by darkness, I will conjure a protective sigil for you at the entrance to $npcName:23400071$'s temple. Step through it before you enter.
<font color="#909090">(You hear Mason chanting quietly under his breath.)</font>

0108202519010463-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, a great trial is upon you. Do you have the resolve to face it?

0108202519010465-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The time has come to find out whether you are the one destined to put an end to $npcName:23000301$'s machinations. Now is the time we strike.

0108202519010466-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is time to put an end to $npcName:23000301$'s machinations. Now is the time we strike.

0108202519010467-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It is time to put an end to $npcName:23000301$'s machinations. Now is the time we strike.

0108202519010468-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just as I anticipated—you are the one the Eye of Providence foresaw would vanquish this darkness.

0108202519010469-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I saw $npcName:23000301$'s darkness vanish from this world and knew the deed had been done..

0108202519010474-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I still don't understand what $npcName:23000301$ was trying to accomplish by summoning $npcName:23400071$.

0108202519010475-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I witnessed a conversation through the Eye of Providence that might shed some light on that matter... $npcName:23000301$ intended to offer his soul to $npcName:23400071$ in exchange for power. But... that power was not for $npcName:23000301$.

0108202519010479-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:23000301$ wanted $npcName:23400071$'s power for $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$... But I have never heard of any among the forces of darknesses willingly giving their life for another...

0114101519010712-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm afraid we are left with more questions than answers. Nevertheless, all that matters is we have averted catastrophe.

0114101519010713-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With $npcName:23400071$'s power, $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ would have been a danger to the entire world.

0108202519010480-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ may have lost this battle, but I doubt we've seen the last of him. He still has plans for Kritias.

0114101519010714-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We all need to be ready.

0123155819010716-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Lumiknights' full resources have been devoted toward tracking down $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$, yet we've made no real progress. The whole affair is frustrating to say the least.

0123155819010717-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Deireadh grows impatient with every moment justice is delayed.

0123155819010718-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We could always try gathering information the old-fashioned way. Knocking some heads.

0123155819010719-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well... It's a crude plan, but it's not like our current endeavors are baring fruit. Are you volunteering for the job?

0123155819010722-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hate to butt in, but it seems like you both may be missing an important detail.

0123155819010723-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We already know $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ has somehow managed to hack a large number of Tairen's mechanical soldiers and place them under his control.

0123155819010724-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Rather than blindly slaughtering Daemon Army troops—as fun as that sounds—why not see if you can track the signal controlling those robots back to its source?

0123155819010725-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But I'm just an expert in tactics and espionage, what would I know?

0123155819010727-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have reports of hacked sentries at the $map:02020017$. Why not start your investigation there?

1031125219010010-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! $npcName:11004316[gender:0]$ told me you're trying to track Turka down using the signals from his hacked machines. You're going to need someone tech savvy to analyze the data. Need some help?

0123155819010729-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll monitor all signals coming in and out of the area. Go and pummel some $npcNamePlural:25021202$ to force them to call home for instructions!

1031125219010011-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You heard Nairin. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021202$ so we can track their calls for help.

1031125219010012-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You heard Nairin. Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021202$ so we can track their calls for help.

1031125219010013-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kritias's technology never ceases to impress!

0123155819010731-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The speed and volume of the data they're transmitting... It's light-years beyond the tech we have back home.

0123155819010732-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Even their magics are quite advanced. This land is quite a fascinating place.

0123155819010733-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I don't believe we've gathered enough data for analysis yet.

0123155819010734-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ and produce some, won't you?

1031125219010014-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ so we can analyze the resulting data transmissions.

1031125219010015-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Defeat $npcNamePlural:25021205$ so we can analyze the resulting data transmissions.

1031125219010016-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! I've had some luck triangulating the network's central node—the source of the transmissions!

0123155819010735-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The only problem is, it's still on the move.

0123155819010736-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've estimated its trajectory based on its current speed and heading. I'm sending you intercept coordinates, but you've got to hurry!

0124174019010900-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is this our first meeting since $npcName:11004431$'s daughter escaped my grasp?

0123155819010738-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That encounter was quite revealing... I feel I can finally see clearly who I am.

0123155819010739-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What do you mean? And what are you plotting? Answer me!

0123155819010740-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The machines are pitiful. Soon they will all be under my command.

0123155819010743-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You have once again ruined my plans to conquer this land, and now I intend to make you pay.

0123155819010744-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I leave you with this parting gift.

1031125219010020-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I leave you with this parting gift.

1031125219010021-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I leave you with this parting gift.

0123155819010748-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There was some kind of interference—we lost radio contact. Are you all right?

0123155819010750-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm relieved to hear it. Nairin is tracking the source of the interference as we speak.

0123155819010752-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good. I'll see you when you arrive.

0123155819010753-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You relay everything that happened in $map:02020033$.)</font>

0123155819010755-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What is he up to now?

0123155819010756-Kritias_2018_12-.name: And what did he mean when he said he could finally see clearly who he was?

0123155819010757-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have no idea, but it didn't seem like the usual Turka we love to hate.

0123155819010760-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Perhaps this is all some elaborate ruse to confuse us? At times like these, it's important to remain skeptical.

0123155819010761-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In the mean time, there's nothing stopping $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ from trying to find another sacrifice for his bargain with $npcName:23000073$. I say we track $npcName:23000073$ down and send the demon back from whence he came.

0123155819010763-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent. I'll make the necessary preparations. For now, good work.

1031125219010026-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Ah, $MyPCName$. I was hoping to speak with you.

0123155819010764-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Between consulting a number of ancient tomes and the Lumiknights' investigation, I have learned some important details about $npcName:23000073$.

0123155819010766-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: $npcName:23000073$ is an ancient demon that was sealed away alongside Kritias. It seems a special ritual was required to summon him.

0123155819010767-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: According to a tome sent over by a library in Victoria Island, $npcName:23000073$ was once summoned in Maple World...

0123155819010768-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Naturally, I dispatched the Lumiknights to investigate the altar where this ritual was conducted. After analyzing the scene, we were able to use what we learned to determine $npcName:23000073$ current location.

0123155819010770-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: $npcName:23000073$ is within the $map:02020034$. I want you to go there.

1031125219010027-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: $npcName:23000073$ is within the $map:02020034$. I want you to go there.

0123155819010772-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: $map:02020034$ was built over an $map:02000426$—that's where you'll find $npcName:23000073$... Of course, you'll have to get past an army of mechanized soldiers to get there.

0123155819010773-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Defeat the $npcNamePlural:25020801$, $npcNamePlural:25020803$, and $npcNamePlural:25020805$ nearby to clear a path.

1031125219010029-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: You must forge a path forward. Good luck.

1031125219010030-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: You must forge a path forward. Good luck.

1031125219010031-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: I'm detecting a significant reduction in noise on the sentries' communication frequency. I take it you've accomplished your task?

0123155819010775-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Not quite yet... $npcName:23000073$ is immensely powerful. So much so that primitive cultures believed him a god. We need to take steps to weaken him.

0123155819010776-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: You will find a number of totems throughout the reactor plant. $npcName:23000073$ draws power from these totems. Therefore, your duty is clear.

1031125219010034-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Have you destroyed all the totems?

0123155819010780-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Then all that remains is defeating $npcName:23000073$... Even in his weakened state, the demon will prove a powerful adversary...

1031125219010035-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Have you destroyed all the totems?

1031125219010036-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Have you destroyed all the totems?

0123155819010783-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Resist all you like. You only hasten your demise.

0123155819010784-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Sadly, I have more important matters to be concerned with than indulging you in this futile exercise.

0123155819010786-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: It's too bad really. I so enjoy watching you struggle. Goodbye.

1031125219010040-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: $MyPCName$, are you all right? I felt a great disturbance.

0123155819010791-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Good. I'll see you when you arrive.

1031125219010041-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Good. I'll see you when you arrive.

1031125219010042-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Good. I'll see you when you arrive.

0123155819010792-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: I never doubted you would overcome that ancient demon—but it remains a very impressive feat.

0123155819010794-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: Though $npcName:23000073$ has been dealt with, there is still something that worries me.

0123155819010796-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: This all started with a data transmission composed of dark energy, which $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ used to commandeer Tairen's mechanized force...

0123155819010797-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: But we are no closer to understanding how such a thing is possible, and how this transmission was generated.

0123155819010798-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: I suppose all that matters is that we have foiled $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$'s latest scheme. Perhaps the answers I seek will be revealed in time.

0123155819010799-Kritias_Zakum01-.name: In any case, I am grateful once again for your unflinching heroism.

0108202519010481-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Welcome to $map:02020041$, $MyPCName$! Isn't it strange seeing each other in an unfamiliar setting?

0108202519010482-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We haven't been in Kritias long, but a lot's happened!

0108202519010484-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This land is a new frontier, full of unidentified flora and fauna. People from throughout Maple World are already flocking to Kritias to pioneer this uncharted territory. In time, they could prove a valuable source of information and resources for us!

0108202519010485-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In the mean time, we have to do whatever we can to make sure they have the tools they need to survive and thrive here. Luckily our survival training and wilderness experience makes the Green Hoods perfectly suited for mapping this uncharted terrain and identifying safe food sources!

0108202519010486-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our newest crop of pioneers have already arrived. What do you say to serving as $map:02020041$'s unofficial ambassador and checking in with each of them?

0111193819010681-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Excellent! I'm sure it'll go a long ways toward helping them settle in. Plus, you may see some familiar faces!

0108202519010487-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Get a move on, ambassador, there's no time to lose!

0108202519010488-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We have a lot of new arrivals in town. $MyPCName$, why don't you go welcome them to $map:02020041$?

0108202519010489-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So, how are our friends settling in?

0111194419010682-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's a mixed bag, but overall they seem excited to be here.

0108202519010490-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Really? Well that's good. Let's see... There are some other people on our arrivals list I think you're acquainted with.

0108202519010491-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ a visit next?

0108202519010492-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ a visit next?

0108202519010493-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004323[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004324[gender:0]$ a visit next?

0108202519010494-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I hope you had an nice time catching up! Now, there are a few more names on my list...

0111194419010683-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004331[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$. They've been giving everyone a hard time since they arrived, spouting gibberish and asking for research data we don't have.

0108202519010495-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay them a visit and see how they're settling in?

0108202519010496-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004331[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$ a visit next?

0108202519010497-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004331[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$ a visit next?

0108202519010498-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh, $MyPCName$! While I've got you here, there's something I could use your help with.

0108202519010499-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've heard there's a substance found here called "aetherine" that's supposedly the cornerstone of Kritian civilization.

0111200419010685-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've heard something to that effect as well.

0108202519010500-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So... Do you think you can get your hands on some Aetherine Crystals? Whatever you're doing now can wait. I'm just dying to study the crystals—for the Frontier Foundation of course.

0111200419010686-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Right! We want to study the aetherine for the Foundation! Not out of some personal curiosity. So you'll help us right? For the Foundation?

0108202519010501-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I heard Aetherine Crystals can be found all throughout Kritias. We don't need much, just a small sample. Thanks!

0108202519010502-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I heard Aetherine Crystals can be found all throughout Kritias. Would you bring back some for us to study?

0108202519010503-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I heard Aetherine Crystals can be found all throughout Kritias. Would you bring back some for us to study?

0108202519010504-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm detecting aetherine energy signatures near you... What's going on? What happened to greeting the new arrivals?

0108202519010506-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Studying aetherine is key to understanding Tairen and the development of civilization on Kritias. We can't go handing it off to everyone who wants to gawk at it.

0111200419010688-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let me guess. $npcName:11004331[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$ put you up to this, didn't they?

0108202519010507-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That aetherine belongs to the Alliance, understood?

0108202519010509-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll take that aetherine off your hands. But in the mean time, could you check up on $npcName:11004329[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11004330[gender:1]$?

0108202519010510-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sure they'll be happy to see you.

0108202519010513-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As for $npcName:11004331[gender:1]$ and $npcName:11004332[gender:1]$, they'll be getting an earful from me!

0108202519010514-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004329[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11004330[gender:1]$ a visit next?

0108202519010515-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Why don't you pay $npcName:11004329[gender:0]$ and $npcName:11004330[gender:1]$ a visit next?

0108202519010516-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I think that's about everyone! Now, could you swing by with that Aetherine Crystal you found?

0108202519010517-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Could you swing by with that Aetherine Crystal you found?

0108202519010518-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Could you swing by with that Aetherine Crystal you found?

0108202519010520-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't believe you, just humoring everybody's requests without a second thought. What if they'd asked you to do something dangerous?! You need to learn to embrace the power of "no."

0111200419010689-Kritias_2018_12-.name: ...Does that include requests coming from you?

0108202519010521-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahem. All I'm saying is you can't let people walk all over you.

0108202519010522-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, how did greeting all the new arrivals go? Are they adjusting to life in Kritias?

0108202519010523-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There were a wide variety of motives and feelings about being here, but overall I think they'll do fine.

0108202519010524-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's wonderful to hear. In an unfamiliar new frontier like this, we have to work together more than ever.

0111200419010690-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I look forward to your continued assistance!

0109164619010527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Due to the nature of our responsibilities here, the Green Hoods have been working alongside Humanitas, and our people have been relaying some disheartening things. It seems that between fighting Tairen and Kharon, Humanitas's resources are stretched thin.

0109164619010528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As much as I'd like to ask the captain about providing reinforcement, we have our own troubles to worry about...

0109164619010530-Kritias_2018_12-.name: So I got to thinking, maybe we could provide our support in an unofficial capacity to help lighten their load!

0109164619010531-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What do you mean by "unofficial support?"

0109164619010533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you! I knew I could count on you!

0109164619010534-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like you to travel to $map:02020001$ and reach out to Commander $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ on Humanitas's radio frequency. She should be happy to hear from you.

1031125219010063-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Travel to $map:02020001$ and reach out to Commander $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$ on Humanitas's radio frequency.

0109164719010525-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You adjust your radio to Humanitas's communication frequency and press the talk button.)</font>
This is $MyPCName$ of the Maple Alliance calling for Commander $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$. Please respond.

0109164719010526-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(After several moments of silence, your radio crackles.)</font>
$MyPCName$, it's good to hear your voice.

0109164719010527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We don't have any joint operations with your people scheduled for today. Is something the matter?

0109164719010528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I was passing through $map:02020001$, and I thought you might like some help with your Kharon problem.

0109164719010529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $map:02020001$? Our operations in the area have been hindered by the Kharon presence there... But how did you hear about that?

0109164719010530-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ said you could use some assistance.

0109164719010533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah, you mean Sky Fortress's second-in-command. I see she is as kind as she looks.

0111201719010693-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, if you're up for thinning Kharon's ranks in $map:02020001$, we'll take any help we can get. Thank you.

1031125219010065-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm counting on you to suppress the Kharon incursion in $map:02020001$.

1031125219010066-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm counting on you to suppress the Kharon incursion in $map:02020001$.

0109164819010525-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You activate your portable radio.)</font>
$MyPCName$ to Humanitas command, do you copy?

0109164819010526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been eagerly awaiting your call, $MyPCName$.

0109164819010527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've dealt a crippling blow to the Kharon forces in this area. They should be too busy licking their wounds to give you much trouble, at least for a while. Is there anything else I can help you with?

0109164819010528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: As a matter of fact, there is. The Kharon incursion interrupted a vital mining operation we were performing in $map:02020001$.

0111202119010694-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There is a very valuable ore there that's used to stabilize Aetherine Crystals, allowing us to extract pure aetherine.

0109164819010529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We need that ore. You should be able to find several exposed veins of it that our mining operation managed to unearth.

0111202119010695-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. You'll be able to identify the ore by its brilliant green glow.

1031125219010068-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. You'll be able to identify the ore by its brilliant green glow.

1031125219010069-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Thank you. You'll be able to identify the ore by its brilliant green glow.

0109164919010525-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, can you hear me? How's your mission going?

0109164919010526-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've just finished securing some ore Humanitas requested.

0109164919010527-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's great, $MyPCName$! I knew you'd be able to help them!

0111210819010696-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Umm... I'm sorry to do this, but there's one more thing I could use your help with...

0109164919010528-Kritias_2018_12-.name: According to members of Humanitas, Tairen is propping up Kharon's operation. They're supplying Kharon with supplies and labor in the form of exiles. In exchange, Kharon attacks Humanitas.

0109164919010529-Kritias_2018_12-.name: That's awful! There's got to be something we can do to throw a wrench in the Tairen's terrible schemes!

0109164919010530-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, we could sneak into the nearest Tairen base and destroy their supplies.

0109164919010533-Kritias_2018_12-.name: No, it's brilliant! Go ahead and get started!

0111210819010698-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The nearest Tairen base is $map:02020004$. Go there and deal a blow to their operation by destroying the supplies they've prepared for Kharon!

0109164919010535-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tairen's closest base is $map:02020004$. If you want to cripple their efforts to supply Kharon, that's the place to go.

0109164919010536-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Tairen's closest base is $map:02020004$. If you want to cripple their efforts to supply Kharon, that's the place to go.

0109164919010537-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You made it inside their base! Do you see anything that looks like supplies?

0109164919010538-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see some crates over there.

0109164919010539-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Crates? What do you think is in them?

0109164919010540-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can't tell from here, but they're heavily guarded. There's a red label with a picture of a skull and crossbones on the side...

0109164919010542-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, whatever's in those crates, we can't let Kharon get hold of them!

0109164919010543-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Roger. I'll blow them all up and let the goddess sort it out.

0109164919010547-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll check in after I've finished destroying the crates.

0109164919010548-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll check in after I've finished destroying the crates.

0109164919010549-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, we're detecting additional forces converging on your location! What is your status?

0109164919010550-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I haven't quite finished what I came for.

0109164919010551-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sigh. That's unfortunate, but it can't be helped. Fall back for now. I don't want you getting cut off behind enemy lines.

0109164919010552-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I can take out the rest of the supplies, I just need a few more minutes.

0109164919010553-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I believe in you, but we need to avoid attracting any more attention than necessary. If the Tairen decide to send reinforcements from the capital, we'll have done Humanitas more harm than good.

0109164919010555-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Then return to $map:02020041$. I'll be waiting!

0109164919010559-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you made it back safely.

0109164919010560-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I just heard from $npcName:11004395[gender:1]$. She's extremely grateful for what you've done.

0109164919010561-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad I could help out.

0109164919010562-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Kritias is a beautiful place... It's such a shame it's full of so much conflict.

0109164919010563-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's nothing we can do besides keep fighting for a brighter tomorrow.

0109164919010564-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're right, $MyPCName$. The Green Hoods will do our part! Here's to a brighter tomorrow!

0109164919010565-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey there, $MyPCName$. How have you been? Now that things have settled down in $map:02020041$, it's time to commence our primary mission!

0109164919010566-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Studying Kritias! Don't tell me you forgot...

0109164919010568-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Anyways, our first step is analyzing the local flora to identify potential food sources, medicinal plants, and plants with other uses.

0109164919010569-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like you to gather some samples for me from the vicinity of $map:02020013$. Are you up to the task?

0109164919010570-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go to $map:02020013$ and investigate the local plant life.

0109164919010571-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It looks like you've arrived. Do you see any plants there that can't be found in Maple World?

0109164919010572-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see something over there that looks pretty different...

0109164919010573-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just as I suspected! Could you bring me back a sample?

0109164919010577-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you collected any plant samples yet?

0109164919010578-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Have you collected any plant samples yet?

0109164919010579-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You sniff at the plant and a sweet, familiar aroma fills your nose.)</font>

0109164919010581-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
It couldn't hurt to eat just one...
<font color="#909090">(You pick a piece of fruit and bite into it. And then another. And another.)</font>

0109164919010582-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, what's going on? Did you find anything interesting in the plant samples you've collected?

0109164919010583-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(You choke down a mouthful of fruit and wipe your mouth.)</font>
It tastes just like $item:30000232$.

0109164919010584-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm writing this down. "Plant specimen tasted like..." Wait, WHAT?! You ate it?

0109164919010585-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What, it smelled like $item:30000232$! It tastes pretty good, too.

0109164919010586-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You're on a mysterious continent from somewhere beyond Maple World, and you put an unidentified plant in your mouth because it smells like $item:30000232$? Are you crazy?! You could end up in the hospital, blasting out both ends! Or what if the plant has hallucinogenic properties?!

0109164919010587-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hey there Cadet! What's all this about a delicious hallucinogenic berry? You're bringing back enough for the rest of the crew, right?

0109164919010588-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What?! Absolutely not! We have to test the samples to make sure they're safe!

0111210819010700-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hmph! There's no need to snap at me about it! Forget it. I'm going somewhere less yelly.

0111210819010701-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sigh. Well, if the fruit were toxic I supposed we'd know by now. Still, it's odd finding a fruit so similar to one from Maple World. I wonder if there's some kind of unknown link between Kritias and our world.

0111210819010702-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, there's more work to be done! I need you to take some soil samples.

0111210819010703-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like to study the soil found at the $map:02020051$. Shall we go have a look?

0109164919010589-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you mind bringing me some soil samples from the $map:02020051$?

0109164919010590-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Would you mind bringing me some soil samples from the $map:02020051$?

0109164919010592-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah good, you've arrived! Now, I'd like for you to sample the soil in the area for analysis.

0109164919010593-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What's the best way to go about that?

0109164919010594-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've discovered an old drill in the middle of the area capable of analyzing soil, and transmitting the data off-site. By re-tuning the drill's frequency, we should be able to send that data to Sky Fortress for study.

0111212119010704-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Not only will the resulting soil sample tell us how deep the pollution there runs, but it will provide a window to study conditions in Kritias dating back through time, as each layer of soil is older than the last! Cool, right?

0111212119010705-Kritias_2018_12-.name: In some ways, this drill will reveal the history of Kritias! Well, shall I explain how to use the drill?

0109164919010595-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
All right! Turn on the drill and it should start transmitting a soil analysis immediately.
<font color="#00aaef">(You need a $item:30001278$ in order to operate the Gigantic Drill. $itemPlural:30001278$ can be purchased from the faction shops in $map:02020041$.)</font>

0109164919010596-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All right, go ahead and start the drill!

0109164919010597-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All right, go ahead and start the drill!

0109164919010598-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The drill is operating at full efficiency. Receiving soil analysis now...

0109164919010599-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, I'm getting some weird rumbling from your microphone... Wait, Sky Fortress is detecting seismic activity localized at your position... Something's coming out of the ground!

0109164919010600-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sky Fortress is detecting seismic activity localized at your position... Something's coming out of the ground!

0109164919010601-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sky Fortress is detecting seismic activity localized at your position... Something's coming out of the ground!

0109164919010603-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've been trying to reach you over the radio! What just happened?

0109164919010604-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A giant mechanical worm-thing popped out of the ground and tried to kill me.
