0109164919010606-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's okay, I ended up winning.

0109164919010608-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you're safe. I want to hear all about this in person! Please return to $map:02020041$.

0109164919010611-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Welcome back, $MyPCName$. I'm afraid that we weren't able to salvage any usable data from before the soil analysis was interrupted.

0109164919010612-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm glad you weren't hurt. So tell me, what was that out there?

0109164919010613-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The thing I encountered was too big to bring in, but I can tell you what happened...

0109164919010614-Kritias_2018_12-.name: A summary of events will be fine.

0109164919010615-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Nairin stares, jaw agape, as you finish your riveting tale.)</font>
Attacked by a giant mechanical worm?! What other surprises does Kritias have in store for us...?

0109164919010616-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, the more we know about this creature, the better prepared we'll be. Thank you for your report.

0109164919010617-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll start brainstorming ways to deal with our mechanical monstrosity, in case it rears its ugly head again!

0124202519010901-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The Green Hoods are starting to feel more at home in Kritias, but we can't let our guard down! There's still lots to investigate, and lots that could go wrong.

0124202519010902-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">($npcName:11004315[gender:0]$ often seems eccentric, but she has a realistic outlook on things.)</font>

0124202519010903-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's something I'd like to investigate. According to reports from members of our expedition, there are ancient structures found in Kritias that bear a striking resemblance to the ancient ruins found on Victoria Island.

0124202519010904-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Isn't that interesting? A link between our own civilization and one from another world! We have a fascinating mystery on our hands!

0124202519010905-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our expedition located one such structure but weren't able to find a way inside. That's why I've decided to call in my secret weapon to finish the job—you! The structure is located in $map:02020003$. I'll radio you once you arrive!

0124202519010906-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020003$. I'll radio you again once you arrive!

0124202519010907-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$! Did you make it there safely?

0124202519010908-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I'm here, but the place is crawling with enemy forces.

0124202519010909-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh no... That's going to interfere with our investigation efforts.

0124202519010910-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You'll have to run the Tairen troops off before we can get started. Drive out as many $npcNamePlural:25021504$ and $npcNamePlural:25021505$ as you can!

0124202519010911-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Drive out as many $npcNamePlural:25021504$ and $npcNamePlural:25021505$ as you can!

0124202519010912-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Drive out as many $npcNamePlural:25021504$ and $npcNamePlural:25021505$ as you can!

0124202519010913-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good work! I think we should be able to begin our investigation of the structure without being disturbed.

0125151919010800-Kritias_2018_12-.name: First, I'd like you to get some shots of the structure. We've already set up a camera at a good vantage on site.

0124202519010914-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Go ahead and take some pictures of the largest structure!

0124202519010915-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You haven't told me where the camera is yet.

0124202519010916-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! Sorry, I forgot you can't see Cat's-Eye-View I've got displayed on my tablet which is streaming from our Cat's Eye satellite.

0124202519010917-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sending you the GPS coordinates for the camera now. Once you've found it, please go ahead and take some photos of the structure to send to Sky Fortress.

0124202519010918-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sending you the GPS coordinates for the camera now. Once you've found it, please go ahead and take some photos of the structure to send to Sky Fortress.

0124202519010919-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm sending you the GPS coordinates for the camera now. Once you've found it, please go ahead and take some photos of the structure to send to Sky Fortress.

0124202519010920-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You snap a series of pictures of the structure, then press the "DATASYNC" button to transmit them to Sky Fortress.)</font>

0124202519010921-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh! Thanks! Your pictures are coming in now.

0124202519010923-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hehe... That's right! Our tech team has been working overtime to launch a series of surveillance and communication satellites to aid our operations in Kritias.

0124202519010924-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Our data team has been going out of their minds dealing with the influx of new data from the satellites.

0124202519010925-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But it's a necessary effort. Manually mapping the continent on foot would be a huge nightmare—one forces on the ground are very grateful to avoid.

0124202519010926-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But enough shoptalk, let's have a look at those pictures!

0124202519010928-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's just as I was told. There are a ton of architectural similarities between this structure and the ancient ruins of Victoria Island.

0124202519010929-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's no way this could be a coincidence. From the shapes they used to the construction methods, there's just too many similarities. Just look at those arches, for example...

0124202519010930-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have even more questions now than when we started...

0124202519010931-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've got to know more! Let's find out what the interior of the structure looks like.

0124202519010932-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sky Fortress's radar is detecting the presence of an underground passage... I want you to check it out. I'll send you the GPS coordinates.

0124202519010934-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course! I've planned for exactly this contingency! The last time you were here, I slipped a Firefly into your bag. It's a signal amplification device our team whipped it up. Oh! Also, I left you three kinds of trail mix in a plastic baggie, in case you get hungry!

0124202519010935-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(What a wholesome invasion of personal privacy...)</font>

0124202519010936-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Initiating Firefly calibration now... Wow, look at that! Your signal's coming in loud and clear. We should be able to read you fine up to a depth of at least 50 meters.

0124202519010937-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sky Fortress's radar is detecting the presence of an underground passage... I want you to check it out. I'll send you the GPS coordinates.

0124202519010938-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here are the GPS coordinates of the underground passage. I'll contact you again as soon as you're inside!

0124202519010939-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Here are the GPS coordinates of the underground passage. I'll contact you again as soon as you're inside!

0124202519010940-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$, your signal's still coming in strong. Can you hear me?

0124202519010941-Kritias_2018_12-.name: What's that sound? An alarm?! Why would some random building need an alarm system?

0124202519010942-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I doubt whoever thought this facility was worth securing is still around, but still... You'd better find a place to hide. Engaging the ground-penetrating radar...

0124202519010943-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm detecting a large chamber at the end of the corridor. That seems as good a hiding place as any! And maybe you'll find something inside that can explain what this place is.

0124202519010944-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm detecting a large chamber at the end of the corridor. That seems as good a hiding place as any! And maybe you'll find something inside that can explain what this place is.

0124202519010945-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'm detecting a large chamber at the end of the corridor. That seems as good a hiding place as any! And maybe you'll find something inside that can explain what this place is.

0124202519010946-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I've found some old books in here.

0124202519010947-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have to know what's written inside! And you need to get out of there before any more Tairen soldiers come snooping around! Please return to $map:02020041$ with the books!

0124202519010948-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have to know what's written inside! And you need to get out of there before any more Tairen soldiers come snooping around! Please return to $map:02020041$ with the books!

0124202519010949-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I have to know what's written inside! And you need to get out of there before any more Tairen soldiers come snooping around! Please return to $map:02020041$ with the books!

0124202519010951-Kritias_2018_12-.name: These books must be important if the facility where they were found had a security system!

0124202519010952-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Hehe... I can't wait to see what's inside...
<font color="#909090">(She grins mischievously.)</font>

0124202519010953-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
<font color="#909090">(Your radio crackles and Schatten's voice comes out.)</font>
What's going on over there? The last time I saw Nainai make a face like that, she was looking through her secret bookshelf.

0124202519010954-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! W-what do you mean s-secret bookshelf?!

0124202519010955-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You know, the one in your quarters hidden behind the painting of Henesys. It's where you keep those gossip magazines with the fashion tips, and the shirtless pictures of Blake.

0124202519010956-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Ah! Sorry, I think you're breaking up! Technical difficulties!
<font color="#909090">(Nairin taps frantically on her tablet, and then the radio channel goes dead.)</font>

0124202519010957-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, I have no idea what $npcName:11004314[gender:1]$ was talking about just now!

0124202519010958-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahem! Anyways, I'll have these books analyzed. Who knows what secrets they hold?

0124202519010959-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll run them through the linguistic database we got from $npcName:11004395$ and see if we can translate the contents!

0125151919010802-Kritias_2018_12-.name: This could be a while. Why don't you take on some more missions in the mean time?

0124202519010960-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We've managed to translate roughly 30% of the text of the books you brought me.

0124202519010961-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The translation is going slower than you might expect due to the difficulties of matching the characters and words used by the Kritian writing system to those in our own. But the process speeds up with every pairing we find.

0124202519010962-Kritias_2018_12-.name: From what we've been able to decipher so far, these books seem to be a journal or written record.

0124202519010963-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We don't know who the author is, but they've written about Kritias in great detail.

0124202519010964-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Of course we have no way of knowing whether this is a historical account or a work of fiction. I've reached out to Humanitas about corroborating the validity of the contents, but they say they have more urgent problems...

0124202519010965-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well, knowledge waits for no one! I don't see any reason why we can't do our own sleuthing in the meantime. There's a location the author mentions on numerous occasions as a place they like to go and write. These "skylocked islands of shimmering white..."

0124202519010966-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I remember a place that meets that description... Ugh, where was it? Let me pull up a topographical map of Kritias on my tablet!

0124202519010969-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes, that's it! $map:02020018$! You can see the floating islands clear as day.

0124202519010970-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Good eye! You've got a knack for this kind of work, don't you?

0124202519010971-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020018$ and we'll see if we can't verify more of what's written in these books.

0124202519010972-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Head to $map:02020018$ and we'll see if we can't verify more of what's written in these books.

0124202519010973-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I see you've made it to $map:02020018$! Your signal is coming in clear thanks to the Firefly.

0124202519010974-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let me run some scans of the area through Cat Sith's analysis subroutines.

0124202519010976-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Wow! That place is absolutely jam-packed full of aetherine!

0124202519010977-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Do you think the aetherine is somehow responsible for $map:02020018$'s floating islands?

0124202519010978-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Judging by the feed I'm getting from Sky Fortress's long-range reconnaissance lens, $map:02020018$ seems like a perfect match for the place described in the books.

0124202519010980-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's see what else this book has to tell us...

0124202519010981-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's see what else this book has to tell us...

0124202519010982-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let's see what else this book has to tell us...

0124202519010985-Kritias_2018_12-.name: When I first took a look at the books, I noticed there were some pages missing. I didn't realize they were from the section about $map:02020018$...

0124202519010986-Kritias_2018_12-.name: But the way these pages were so neatly torn out... It seems intentional.

0124202519010987-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Maybe it was information the author wanted to hide? Or maybe he was just planning to rewrite the section later?

0124202519010988-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It could be important information about $map:02020018$...

0124202519010989-Kritias_2018_12-.name: We'll never know what was on those pages unless we manage to find them.

0124202519010990-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahh! Not knowing what they said only makes me more interested.

0124202519010991-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I want to know what I'm missing!

0124202519010992-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'd like to see what the missing pages say too.

0124202519010993-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Huh? What are you doing accessing an encrypted Green Hoods frequency?!

0124202519010994-Kritias_2018_12-.name: After I finished reading Nainai's diary, I was feeling bored, so I thumbed through the translations she left sitting out. I'm curious how our mysterious author's story ends.

0124202519010995-Kritias_2018_12-.name: W-what?! You read my diary?! Is that why it was out on my desk?!

0124202519010996-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh yes, all the juicy bits. Especially the ones about the captain...

0124202519010997-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
Ahh!!! Scrambling frequencies...!
<font color="#909090">(You hear the sounds of furious tapping over the radio, and suddenly the background noise of Schatten's microphone vanishes.)</font>

0124202519010998-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hahaha! Ha ha ha! What a jokester. Anyway, please forget about Schatten's silly stories... We've—we've got work to do!

0124202519011000-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ahem! Now! If our mystery author discarded the pages while he was writing, and he did most of his writing here, there's the slimmest chance the pages are still here. And with Cat Sith's brainpower...

0124202519011001-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay. Since I've already analyzed the materials the book is made from, and we know it was exposed to serious levels of ambient aetherine energy, I might just be able to use Sky Fortress's sensors to track down... There! I'm sending you some GPS coordinates. Go and see if they lead to our missing pages!

0124202519011002-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay. Since I've already analyzed the materials the book is made from, and we know it was exposed to serious levels of ambient aetherine energy, I might just be able to use Sky Fortress's sensors to track down... There! I can't believe that worked! I'm sending you some GPS coordinates. Go and see if they lead to our missing pages!

0124202519011003-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay. Since I've already analyzed the materials the book is made from, and we know it was exposed to serious levels of ambient aetherine energy, I might just be able to use Sky Fortress's sensors to track down... There! I'm sending you some GPS coordinates. Go and see if they lead to our missing pages!

0124202519011004-Kritias_2018_12-.name:
I think I found our missing pages. I'm sending them to you now.
<font color="#909090">(You pull your PDA out of your bag and snap some photos of the documents to send to Nairin.)</font>

0124202519011005-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You really found the missing pages? I can't believe that worked!

0125195919011060-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yup. They were sitting at the bottom of a bunch of urns.

0124202519011006-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hidden—right under our noses! That must make what's written on these pages even more important than I imagined!

0124202519011007-Kritias_2018_12-.name: I'll run these images through our translation matrix and see what I can find out.

0124202519011008-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay, so I'm just skimming here, but it looks like this journal was written by a royal mage of Kritias...

0124202519011012-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004431$, Claudia's father and famed sage of Maple World? That $npcName:11004431$?

0124202519011013-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Yes! That's right! So there's some rants about the other mages he worked with, and then something about making up his mind about his plans to "leave" and then...

0124202519011014-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh no, the next part is still missing... And it was just getting serious!

0124202519011015-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Just point me to the rest of the missing pages.

0124202519011016-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Let me take a look at our sensors... Ah, yes, there are more pages! But they're... moving?!

0124202519011017-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Okay, so after overlaying our sensor readings over images from our Cat's Eye Satellite, I've been able to determine the missing pages are in the possession of the $npcNamePlural:25021703$ or $npcNamePlural:25021704$ in $map:02020018$!

0124202519011018-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well what are you waiting for? We have to find out how the story ends! Go recover the missing pages, by force!

0124202519011019-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well what are you waiting for? We have to find out how the story ends! Go recover the missing pages, by force!

0124202519011020-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well what are you waiting for? We have to find out how the story ends! Go recover the missing pages, by force!

0124202519011021-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(You snap pictures of the new pages and transmit them to $npcName:11004315[gender:0]$.)</font>

0124202519011023-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All right, I'm running the new pages through the translation matrix now.

0124202519011024-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All right, I'm running the new pages through the translation matrix. now.

0124202519011025-Kritias_2018_12-.name: All right, I'm running the new pages through the translation matrix. now.

0124202519011030-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Sooo... How's it going over there?

0125195919011061-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Ah! I'm sorry. The new pages use a lot of characters that aren't in our translation matrix, so Cat Sith has been running a comparative analysis.

0124202519011031-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Oh! The analysis just finished. Hmm.

0124202519011032-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It seems like the new pages discuss events in Kritias.

0124202519011033-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There's something about a social upheaval, and then $npcName:11004431$ says he has no choice but to leave Kritias.

0124202519011034-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He wrote that he was very sad, and that he was leaving Kritias for "an earthly paradise" he had discovered.

0124202519011035-Kritias_2018_12-.name: He went on to say that he would prevent the "despot of Kritias" from discovering that earthly paradise. I wonder... Do you think he's talking about Maple World?

0124202519011037-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hm... So $npcName:11004431$ was a royal mage of Kritias, but something happened that disillusioned him about the Kritian government, enough that he found his way to Maple World...

0124202519011038-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Given the similarities between the structure we investigated in $map:02020003$ and the ancient ruins in Victoria Island...

0124202519011039-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It would be reasonable to conclude that $npcName:11004431$ was a pioneer of modern Maple World society.

0124202519011040-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $npcName:11004431$ brought the torch of Kritian civilization to Maple World.

0124202519011041-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Remember what $npcName:11004395$ told us? That "social upheaval" that caused $npcName:11004431$ to leave Kritias... That must've been when $npcName:11004432$ took over Tairen.

0124202519011042-Kritias_2018_12-.name: His journal doesn't say, but that sounds likely. He must have been seriously upset to leave his entire world behind.

0124202519011043-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now that we've reassembled $npcName:11004431$'s journal, head back to $map:02020041$ and we'll discuss our next steps!

0124202519011044-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now that we've reassembled $npcName:11004431$'s journal, head back to $map:02020041$ and we'll discuss our next steps!

0124202519011045-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Now that we've reassembled $npcName:11004431$'s journal, head back to $map:02020041$ and we'll discuss our next steps!

0124202519011046-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Welcome back, $MyPCName$. While I was waiting for you to get back, I uploaded the latest data from our Kritias expeditions to Cat Sith and had it re-analyze $npcName:11004431$'s journal with its new context.

0124202519011047-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Unfortunately, I wasn't able to uncover any more about $npcName:11004431$'s decision to leave Kritias or his journey to Maple World.

0124202519011048-Kritias_2018_12-.name: The only new translation produced by the analysis was from his final entry, where he says that he had fallen in love with the "earthly paradise."

0124202519011049-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Is the $npcName:11004431$ of Kritias really the same sage who sacrificed himself so long ago to save Maple World from destruction?

0124202519011050-Kritias_2018_12-.name: With his abilities, he could've just returned to Kritias—or fled to yet another world! Why would he stay and fight for a foreign world barreling toward a terrible fate?

0124202519011051-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It just doesn't make any sense...

0124202519011052-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's not like you to be so serious...

0124202519011053-Kritias_2018_12-.name: $MyPCName$ is right, there's nothing to be gained by getting worked up over the past.

0124202519011054-Kritias_2018_12-.name: There are plenty of people who rely on you in the here and now.

0125195919011062-Kritias_2018_12-.name: It's time to set your personal curiosity aside and focus on your duties! Am I understood?

0124202519011056-Kritias_2018_12-.name: You look pretty cheerful for someone who was just scolded.

0124202519011057-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Hehe... That wasn't a scolding. That was just the Captain's way of cheering up her crew!

0124202519011058-Kritias_2018_12-.name: <font color="#909090">(She might not show it in the most obvious ways, but $npcName:11004312[gender:0]$ really does care for those under her command.)</font>

0124202519011059-Kritias_2018_12-.name: Well then, there's work to be done! On to the next assignment!
